These sorts of events include cocktail parties, semi formal weddings, holiday parties, and bar mitzvahs, just to name a few. A semi formal dress should reflect your sense of fun and flair. .zmarion_s_fashion_articles.semi_formal_.description:
Semi Formal Dresses

Many occasions call for you to be dressed well, but not totally formal. These sorts of events include cocktail parties, semi formal weddings, holiday parties, and bar mitzvahs, just to name a few. A semi formal dress should reflect your sense of fun and flair. This could mean a flouncy skirt, a back-baring strapless top, or a shorter mermaid cut.

You never want to look over- or under-dressed at a semi-formal function, though. A great rule to follow is, "If the sun is out, so is your knee and if the sun is down, so should your hemline be" (below the knee). A standard little black dress in either hemline offers you a simple way to affordably dress up without looking pretentious.

At GreatLookz.com, we offer simple, clean cut semi formal dresses with spaghetti straps, halter tops, criss cross straps, and more. We have above the knee cuts as well as tea length dresses to ensure your comfort in whichever dress you choose. As well, if basic black is not your style, we also offer these dresses in gorgeous colors that are really "in" this year like red, blue, lavender, burgundy, and many more.

When the occasion calls for a great semi-formal dress, we've got tons to choose from at GreatLookz.com.Whatever you want, we've got it and can help you match your body type with the perfect dress to achieve the optimal mix of sexy and classy. Give us a call today at 877-755-4920 for more details on our semi formal dresses.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.beret_hats.meta_description: The beret has proved itself a popular and beloved fashion accessory, adopted by different societies through time. .zmarion_s_fashion_articles.beret_hats.description:
Beret Hats

The beret has proved itself a popular and beloved fashion accessory, adopted by different societies through time. Berets were originally worn in ancient Greece as military headgear, and they were introduced to the modern world by the Basques, who live in the Pyrenees Mountains. Over the years, revolutionary groups and trend-setting fashion icons alike have adopted the beret as their own.

How you wear your beret says something about your personal sense of style and even your mood. A beret worn close to the face conveys a demure feeling, while a beret worn slightly to the side says you can be whimsical and fun. If you're going for a dramatic look, cover your forehead completely with your beret.

Besides being an extremely versatile fashion accessory, berets are affordable. When you shop online at Greatlookz.com, you can find a wide selection of colors and styles to choose from. Our stylish wool beret comes in a variety of colors, and it retails for under $15.

If you're looking for a fancy beret for a special event or theme party, we've got those too. Want to impress your friends at the next cocktail party? Slip on one of our shimmering sequin berets, and watch them stare in envy. Our sequin berets come in a variety of colors including red, purple, gold, white, navy, green and royal blue. Just because we sell our items online doesn't mean you can't call and order directly from us. We're open during regular business hours, and we always answer our phones. Call us today at 1-877-755-4920!

.apparel.skirts.meta_keywords: long skirts, broomstick skirts, full skirts, gypsy skirts
.apparel.skirts.meta_description: Your internet source for long skirts.  Gypsy style skirts, silk skirts, full skirts and broomstick skirts.
.apparel.skirts.description2:
Long Skirts

The skirt is a fashion staple that has undergone dramatic changes over time. During the Renaissance, women wore gowns with gathered skirts that opened in the front to reveal layers and layers of petticoats. Heavily textured fabrics and layer upon layer of undergarments created the bulky look that was popular for many years to come.

During the post-WWII era, high fashion houses took advantage of the hunger for something new and once again re-invented the skirt. Christian Dior created what became known as the New Look around 1947; this look included long, wide skirts, and a cinched waist. These full skirts were popular for more than their sheer femininity; they were also a joyful reaction to the end of WWII fabric rationing. After Dior's New Look, skirts continued to evolve, reaching new heights in the 1960s when British designer Mary Quant introduced the miniskirt.

While Dior's full-skirted look isn't seen very often these days, long skirts are still quite popular. A long skirt paired with a fancy blouse makes for an excellent formal outfit. Take that same long skirt and throw on a t-shirt, and you have a great outfit for weekends or less formal events. At Greatlookz.com, we love helping our customers create memorable outfits that are as stylish as they are versatile.

If you're looking for the perfect long skirt, we have plenty to choose from. Our swing style long skirt with Lycra is flying off the shelves right now. It's the perfect skirt for dancing, and it comes in one of this season's hottest colors--camel. Our long black rayon skirt with lace and beaded trim is the perfect skirt for mixing and matching. Take a look through our online inventory to get some great ideas for your next big event, or call us at 1-877-755-4920 and we'll help you pick just the right skirt.
.apparel.skirts.description: Buy long skirts, gypsy skirts and straights skirts here.

GREATGEM/cart.bottomtext:
Most orders ship out the next BUSINESS day. For example, if you order on a Friday, your order will ship the following Monday (or Tuesday if Monday is a national holiday). We will notify you by phone or email if an item is out of stock. Please note that we cannot ship FEDEX to a post office post.

Standard Shipping is via First Class Mail. This will take from 5 to 10 business days, depending on location. (We ship from Phoenix, Arizona) Priority Mail takes approximately 3 to 5 days. If you need a package by a certain date, please choose one of the FedEx Express options as these are guaranteed to arrive in the number of days shown below:

If you would like to choose an express Fed Ex Shipping option, simply add the product called FedExShipping to your cart, add your zip code and update the cart and this will estimate the Fed Ex shipping costs for you. You can place your express shipping order online and the order will leave our warehouse the next business day, via your Fed Ex shipping choice. Please note that FEDEX GROUND is SLOWER than the post office.

International Customers - Please note that after you enter your address you will get an exact shipping quote BEFORE you are asked to pay for your order.
GREATGEM/cart.toptext:
All FedEx Express orders must be placed by 1:00 p.m. Pacific Standard Time if you want your order to be shipped on the same day. If you order after this deadline and still need your package to be shipped that day, please call us - we will ship as many emergency orders as we possibly can. If you have any questions or concerns you may reach us toll free at 877-755-4920, or by fax at 602-218-5975.

All invoices will be processed through our parent site Greatlookz.com.

.parosols.lace_parasols.description2:
Beautiful lace parasols, stunning ostrich trimmed parasols, fun and flirty weatherproof umbrellas, parasols for baby showers and weddings and even gorgeous fans filled with mystique; you can find all of these and more at GreatLookz.com.

The lace parasol harkens back to the Victorian era, when women not only wanted a way to keep the sun off of their fair skin, they wanted an elegant accessory to compliment their outfit.

GreatLookz sells a varied selection of paper and lace parasols in numerous sizes from different cultures and time periods, so you can find just the right look for your outfit or event. Our replica Victorian, Chinese and Japanese parasols beautifully capture the eras they represent. With the use of high quality materials, the parasols are best used to shield your skin from the rays of the sun. Although they are surprisingly durable and some even offer weatherproofing, many of our parasols are not suitable for wind or rain due to their delicate paper or lace construction.

We pride ourselves in providing great customer services and unique items that you just canât find anywhere else. With the range of shapes, colors, and designs we provide, we can assist you in finding the one that is right for your needs. Whether you are looking for a parasol to accessorize a costume, wedding, event, or would just like to have one, call us today at 877-755-4920 and one of our friendly representatives will be happy to help you choose the perfect Victorian lace parasol.

STEVE6/homepage.description:
Welcome to Parasol Passion. We offer the finest selection of designer parasols & fans. We also offer hundreds of gloves and hats to complement your outfit. Please visit our main site [[Greatlookz.com]:popup=http://greatlookz.com] if you cannot find what you are looking for.


Parasols have been used for thousands of years not only as protection from the sun, but more importantly as a fashion symbol.  It is believed that the Chinese inspired the widespread use of parasols in Victorian era. Today, parasols are a hot fashion accessory used not only in weddings, parties, and costumes, but also on the runway.


Parasol Passion carries all types of parasols, from traditional Battenberg Lace to the Chinese Paper style. Large sizes are best for women, while medium fits girls well.  The small sizes make fantastic table decorations and party favors.

.z.greatloanz.a1.description2:
USA Mortgage has numerous opportunities to invest in commercial mortgages for "trophy commercial real estate" all over the United States. The current ecomomy provides excellent opportunities for foreign investors looking for good returns on commercial mortgages. Call Greg Burckle at 602-282-3804 for current opportunities.

The Tampa Bay Business Journal reports the following on 01/14/08:

A weak dollar and desire to diversify portfolios is drawing foreign investors to the U.S. commercial real estate market. During 2007, foreign investors pumped more than $45 billion into office, retail, industrial, multifamily and hotel properties nationwide, nearly double the sum of 2006, according to data from New York-based Real Capital Analytics. In the Bay area, foreign investment reached $1.1 billion last year. "The decline of the dollar as much as it has gives a great advantage to foreign investors," said Larry Richey, senior managing director of Cushman & Wakefield's Tampa office. Nearly $14 billion of foreign investment nationwide went into office buildings.

Ocala.com reports on January 20, 2008:

Overseas Investors Buy U.S. Holdings at a Record Pace Last May, a Saudi Arabian conglomerate bought a Massachusetts plastics maker. In November, a French company established a new factory in Adrian, Mich., adding 189 automotive jobs to an area accustomed to layoffs. In December, a British company bought a New Jersey maker of cough syrup. For much of the world, the United States is now on sale at discount prices. With credit tight, unemployment growing and worries mounting about a potential recession, American business and government leaders are courting foreign money to keep the economy growing. Foreign investors are buying aggressively, taking advantage of American duress and a weak dollar to snap up what many see as bargains, while making inroads to the worlds largest market. Last year, foreign investors poured a record $414 billion into securing stakes in American companies, factories and other properties through private deals and purchases of publicly traded stock, according to Thomson Financial, a research firm. That was up 90 percent from the previous year and more than double the average for the last decade. It amounted to more than one-fourth of all announced deals for the year, Thomson said. During the first two weeks of this year, foreign businesses agreed to invest another $22.6 billion for stakes in American companies more than half the value of all announced deals. If a recession now unfolds and the dollar drops further, the pace could accelerate, economists say.
.z.greatloanz.a1.caption2: This is a great time to invest in commercial mortgages on "trophy" U.S. properties.
.z.greatloanz.a1.caption: Call us for excellent investment opportunities.  Greg Burckle at 602-282-3804.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.unique_prom_.description:
Unique Prom Dresses

The prom is about expressing your style in your own way. A unique prom dress can help you do this. One interesting style that is hot this year is the asymmetrical dress. Built with one strap, this sort of gown is very flattering and visually mesmerizing.

Another unique way to play with asymmetry is through hemlines. Now, dresses are being cut with flouncy and layered hemlines that offer varying lengths all in one dress. This sort of hemline is spectacular for women who want to bring drama and attention to a fabulous pair of legs or darling shoes.

At GreatLookz.com, we offer tons of unique prom dresses that are designed to help you stand out in the crowd. Our Mermaid Crystal Organza Gown is one of the most breathtaking dresses we sell. This prom dress is truly eye-catching. The mermaid shape is flattering to nearly every body type, and we offer this dress in sizes up to a 44. Most prom dress retailers don't even come close to this size range and can't offer you the matching shawl like we can, so we're proud to offer this excellent and unique prom dress to all our shoppers.

For the adventurous prom-goer, try our Romantic Old Fashioned Prom Dress. Inspired by the Civil War era, this gown will make you feel like a real princess all night long. It features a stretch swirl bodice and shimmer skirt, available in a rainbow of bright colors. The corset is constructed with a lace inset and the dress features long split sleeves for added affect. You can order online or by phone at 877-755-4920.

To buy unique prom dresses click on the greatlookz logo shown below" Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.z.finale_gloves.cotton_gloves.description2:
The Matte Finish CottonLovers Collection

CottonLovers is a unique fabric developed by Finale with a top USA fabric knitting company. Years of product development and trial and error went into the design of this matte finish cotton blend cloth. One face of the fabric is a very special stretch polyester yarn and the other face is matte cotton. The finishing process is exclusive and is a proprietary product of Finale's. The patent #4,987,614 refers to the unique sewing process of all gloves made by Finale from this fabric.

No other glove manufacturer has the sewing controls on their product nor are they capable of instituting Finale's level of quality; in fact, our patent prevents them from even trying. Most of the CottonLovers styles offered on this web site are available at all Nordstrom, Jessica McClintock Bridal and Neiman Marcus stores as well as select Vera Wang Bridal Boutiques in Barney's plus thousands of upscale bridal stores.

All styles are available sizes A (6 - 6 1/2) and B (7 - 8). Please be careful to specify size and color when ordering. CottonLovers gloves are a stretch cotton blend (40% cotton, 60% polyester). Finale's CottonLovers Supreme gloves are 100% cotton.

We would like to know the actual date you will be wearing the gloves so that you will not be disappointed with a late delivery. Please provide an accurate WEAR DATE that allows us enough handling time to process your order. Not everyone is wearing their new gloves tomorrow.

.fancylinens.lace_aprons.description2:
Vintage Aprons

Admit it. You always had a secret envy of June Cleaver and her spotless house and oh-so-cute aprons. Okay, even if you didn't, you can appreciate the gorgeous vintage style aprons from the 1960s. Detailed and designed with embroidered flowers and cute patterns, these aprons are experiencing a major comeback in today's home fashions.

While Victorian-era aprons were long, knee-length creations, vintage '60s aprons offer a shorter style. These styles tie at the waist, with no over-the-neck halter or top section. They span from the waist to the mid-thigh, creating just enough surface to protect your clothes from spills. They are perfect for hosting an afternoon luncheon, but should be removed before eating.

Affordable and fun, our vintage aprons are available in a variety of colors at GreatLookz.com. Once size fits all, and most include two pockets for functionality's sake. They tie at the waist and are made of 100 percent cotton. Machine washable and spill friendly, our vintage aprons can be used time and time again to bring joy--and a kitschy fashion sense--to your kitchen duties.

We also offer other aprons with special embroidery, floral decorations, and fruit appliques. You can browse our selection online 24 hours a day, seven days a week, and 365 days a year. When you place your order, we take care of it right away to get your items to you in a timely manner. If you have any questions, please give us a call at 877-755-4920.
.fancylinens.lace_aprons.description: Find a little taste of the past with our battenburg lace aprons.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_pett.description:
Wedding Petticoats

Proper etiquette for wedding gown wear calls for undergarments that will enhance the bride's natural figure and improve the fit of her wedding dress. Corsets, hosiery, and other underclothing should all work with the dress, not create bulges or wrinkles on the outside. In this vein, a good petticoat can work wonders to fill out the skirt of your wedding gown and to accentuate the beauty of your entire wardrobe.

Petticoats are slips that are worn under skirts to add volume to their outer appearance. Some wedding gowns already have petticoats sewn directly into the lining, so they don't require an extra slip. However, many gowns do not come with this feature, so finding the right petticoat that works with the style of your dress is important.

We sell a variety of petticoats at GreatLookz.com for use with wedding gowns. Whether short or long, petticoats provide a layer between you and the dress that creates the illusion of fullness and body. If you want to achieve an extremely voluminous look, you may consider wearing two petticoats.

Modern petticoats are not meant to be seen, as a rule. Because of this, it is important to hem the petticoat (or layer of crinoline) at least two to three inches shorter than the hem of your gown. That way, it won't stick out as you're walking down the aisle or enjoying your reception. If you ever have any questions or concerns about our petticoats or any of our other hundreds of items, feel free to call us up at 877-755-4920 during business hours. Our friendly customer service representatives will be happy to help you.

To purchase wedding petticoats click on the greatlookz logo shown below: Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.long_formal_.meta_description: Your source for long formal dresses.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.long_formal_.description:
Long Formal Dresses

When it comes to dressing up for formal events, the length of your dress is one of the most important considerations. A longer dress is perceived as more formal than a short dress or a skirt and a fancy blouse. (Remember the fashion furor Sarah Jessica Parker started when she wore a miniskirt to the Academy Awards in 2001?) The fabric you choose is also important. Sheer fabrics and sleek lines are surefire ways to amp up your glamour factor.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer an excellent selection of long formal dresses for proms and other special events. For young women, we offer classic styles such as A-line skirts and spaghetti strap gowns, and we customize them to fit your exact needs. You won't find dresses like ours at your local mall, making your prom dress a true original.

We also offer an amazing selection of bridesmaids' dresses to choose from. If you want your wedding day to go off without a hitch, plan ahead and order your bridesmaids' dresses by calling us at 1-877-755-4920 for a consultation today. We offer everything from metallic dresses to classical backless dresses with a hint of shimmer.

While other retailers ignore the demand for larger-sized formal dresses, we offer a complete line of plus-size dresses. If you're heading off to the prom or a formal event, or are in need of a form-fitting bridesmaid dress, we offer most of our designs in sizes from 14 to 44. We even custom-fit your dress upon request for the ultimate in comfort and style.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_ev.meta_keywords: Plus Size Corsets,Plus Size Evening Dresses,Plus Size Formal Dresses
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_ev.meta_description: Whatever your dress size, you should always have options for a nice evening out or a formal function. When choosing an evening dress, you should take into account your body type, best features, and budget. Gone are the days when larger women have to drape themselves in lots of cloth to cover their bodies. Now, fashion trends suggest that accentuating your best features allows you to dress glamorously regardless of size.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_ev.description:
Plus Size Evening Dresses

Whatever your dress size, you should always have options for a nice evening out or a formal function. When choosing an evening dress, you should take into account your body type, best features, and budget. Gone are the days when larger women have to drape themselves in lots of cloth to cover their bodies. Now, fashion trends suggest that accentuating your best features allows you to dress glamorously regardless of size.

To find your best features, examine your shape. If you have a large bust, it is important to get measured for the correct bra size. Modern fashion magazines estimate that nearly 80 percent of us are wearing the wrong bra size because we've never been properly measured. Also, avoid thin spaghetti straps or complicated necklines, as they will only accentuate a large chest.

For women with large hips and thighs, experts recommend avoiding skirts that are clingy. Stick with materials that give and flow over your hip area elegantly. If you have a large tummy, look for supportive fabrics that suck you in, to create the illusion of a smaller waistline.

A stunning evening gown is not a pleasure reserved for women sized in the single digits. At GreatLookz.com, we offer a plethora of plus size evening dresses for women of every taste, style, and shape. With bridesmaid and formal gown sizes up to 44, you can quickly and easily order online or give us a call at 877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.lace_tablecl.description:
Lace Tablecloths

If you're holding a dinner party or a special family gathering, you want to get everything right--from the tablecloth to the table setting. When setting the table for a special event, it's important to find a centerpiece that isn't too high. Nothing's worse than watching guests strain to see one another over a centerpiece that's too large or too high. In addition, if you're holding a formal dinner, it's a good idea to use place cards. This helps to prevent that awkward moment when guests try to figure out who should sit by whom.

When it comes to ordering a tablecloth, it's important to find an item that matches your dishes. If you're dishes are intricate in pattern or design, it's a good idea to go with something simple like a white lace tablecloth. It's also important to consider the size and shape of your table. At Greatlookz.com, our tablecloths are designed to fit round, square and rectangular tables with accuracy and precision. For sizing information by phone, call us today at 1-877-755-4920.

Our Battenburg hand embroidered lace tablecloth in solid white is perfect for everyday use, as well as special occasion use. White tablecloths complement any china pattern, even those that are cream-based. White is also a multi-seasonal color, as appropriate in December as it is in August.

If you're looking for something with a little more zing, check out our line of floral lace tablecloths. These tablecloths feature delicate flowers in an assortment of colors. They're perfect for families and they're easy to clean. These tablecloths even come with six matching linen napkins, making it a snap to set a coordinated table.

Return Policy

Return Policy Exchanges Exchanges are easy! Simply enclose a copy of your invoice with your unwanted items and a note indicating exactly what you would like instead. If you are unhappy with an item for any reason, we have hundreds of items from which you can choose an exchange. Merchandise may be exchanged under the following conditions. All merchandise must be exchanged within 30 days of receipt and in the original packaging as received, unused & undamaged. The customer pays return shipping to our location. There are no additional shipping charges or restocking fees for exchanges. *Please note that there are no exchanges on hosiery items or bodystockings. Returns Please enclose a copy of your invoice with your return. * Refunds will be delayed on packages received without invoices or order numbers. A restocking fee will be deducted from your refund for any returns. The fee is 15% of the price of the items that are returned. Refunds are issued within one week from the date we receive your return. The balance will be credited to your charge account. We do not offer refunds on formal dresses, sunglasses, hosiery, bodystockings, or clearance items. (All clearance items have CLEARANCE in the title). There is no refund for shipping charges. International Sales All Customs Fees, Duties, or Tariffs are the responsibility of the customer. This applies to the original purchase and shipment and to product return shipments. Packages that are undeliverable or refused by the customer will not be refunded for shipping charges. We accept credit cards, checks, money orders PayPal, Amazon checkout or Google checkout
Shipping Policy:
All items are shipped within 72 hours. Rush delivery available on request (an additional fee may apply) For international shipping we offer US Postal Service which has delivery confirmation but no tracking numbers. Delivery times are not guaranteed and may take up to 5 weeks. More expensive and faster is FedEx International which has tracking and is guaranteed. All Shipping costs for domestic or international are shown at checkout after you have entered your shipping address and before you are asked to pay for an order.

.dressy_gloves.glovesingirlssizes.meta_keywords: Girls gloves, young ladies, floral lace gloves, satin gloves, short glove, wrist length glove, white fancy glove
.dressy_gloves.glovesingirlssizes.description2:
Flower Girl Gloves

The adorable flower girls are always a highlight of any wedding--whenever you look at wedding photos, the charm and innocence of their smiles bring back memories of that special day. The tradition of having a flower girl is fairly recent, compared to other wedding traditions. The flower girl, first seen in weddings sometime during the Middle Ages, carried wheat in her hands as a symbol of fertility.

If you're planning a wedding, you know how difficult it can be to remember every last detail. One detail you don't want to forget is those adorable little flower girl gloves. The look on the flower girl's face as she beams with pride in her dress is enough to make anyone smile. Little girls love to play dress up, and giving her a pair of beautiful gloves to complete her outfit will create a lasting memory for you both.

Flower girl gloves can be difficult to find if you don't know where to look. Many bridal stores specialize in adult gowns and accessories. Children's clothing stores often don't have the ample selection of bridal gloves for girls that you'll need to create just the right ensemble.

At Greatlookz.com, we know how important it is to find flower girl gloves and other accessories that match the overall look and feel of your wedding attire. We offer short, wrist-length gloves in lace and crochet patterns, and we offer longer gloves for a more formal look. Little girls love pearls, and our wrist-length white gloves offer adorable faux pearl beading. Check them out online or call us today to order--we can be reached during business hours at 1-877-755-4920.

.z.greatquotez.pricing_information.meta_description: Browse our extensive collection of quote mugs, quote t-shirts, quote- of - the day, quote collections, proverb posters, quote products , free quotes, annual quote subscription , quote of the day collection, and much more.
.z.greatquotez.pricing_information.description2: Here are but a few sample of the many different types of posters & memorabilia you may purchase.
.z.greatquotez.pricing_information.description:
Annual Subscription:

You may access our data base up to 20 times per year for an annual subscription price of $199. Simply pick out the topic(s) you are interested in and notify us and we will send you a printed copy, a cd, a poster, or a download with all the quotes we have on that topic. You can see the categories and topics we have listed on the front page. Just click on the button you want and our listings will appear.

When you are ready to order, you can do so online with your credit card, or you can call Marion at (602) 218-5976 for personal assistance with your order. Allow 2 business days to fill your order. Please specify how you would like to receive your quotes. Please be aware that mailed, printed versions take longer to get to you than downloads to your email box.Click here to Order the Annual Subscription


Special Research Services:

Bob Kelly our editor-in-chief, will personally research your special request. If you're looking for just the right quote, if your looking for something in a foreign language, something from ancient times, or rare and unusual ones, call him at (480) XXX-XXXX and he will quote you the price for the research needed. Your quote is always on a not to exceed basis and if the time it takes to do the research is less, we bill you the lesser amount.Click here for more information about Special Research services

One Time Usage:

You may opt to have up to two topics sent to you for a one time charge of $20. This includes all the quotes we have in our collection on a particular topic. We send you the quotes on a cd, printout, poster, or as a download. You may get up to 200 quotes for this price on a single topic. For some topics (such as love, friendship, etc.) there are hundreds of additional quotes and we will notify you of the exact number we have in our collection. You will be charged an additional 8 cents for each additional quote over 200. Please specify your preference in the shopping cart.Click here to Browse our collection of quotes

Coffee Mugs with Quotation of your choice:

Pick out your favorite quote and send it to us and we will have it printed on a nice, ceramic coffee mug. This is a great tool to motivate company personal. Pricing is $20 for the first mug and $15 for each additional mug. If you order more than 50 mugs, the price is $12 each.Click here to Order Coffee Mugs

Wall Signs with Quote(s) of your choice:

We can print your favorite quote on a heavy poster stock paper size up to 24" by 36".Pricing is $40 for the first poster and $20 for each additional poster plus shipping and handling. This is great for companies who want to motivate their personnel and to express company values. If you' like your company logo, pictures, or clip art on the poster, please send that along with your order. Click here to Order Wall signs

Tee-Shirts:

What a wonderful way to express a favorite quote! Simply send us the quote you want and specify whether you want the quote on the front, back, or both sides and what color you want the lettering to be. Tee shirts are high quality cotton and available in small, medium, large, and extra large size. Please specify size. At this time, we only offer tee shirts in white, however we will soon offer pastel shades. Price for the first tee-shirt is $25 and each additional shirt (with the same quote) is only $20. If you order 50 copies or more, call for special quantity. Click here to Order Tee-Shirts

.z.greatloanz.assisted_living.meta_keywords: Assisted Living Facility Mortgages and Loans
.z.greatloanz.assisted_living.meta_description: Your source for Assisted Living Facility Mortgages and Loans.
.z.greatloanz.assisted_living.description2:
USA Mortgage Corp. will make loans on Assisted Living Facilities using the following criteria:

  • Amoritization: Up to 30-year maturity, up to 40-year amortization.

  • Loan fees: From 1% to 2% of the loan amount (depends on the loan amount, difficulty of the loan, location and condition of the property).

  • Interest Rate: Fixed starting at 10 Year Treasury Bill of plus 250 bps.

  • Security: First Deed of Trust.

  • Loan-to-value: Up to 80% or allowable debt service with reasonable expenses which include acceptable amounts included for reserve for replacement and management expense (90% of all debt).

  • Debt Service Coverage: A minimum of 1.20:1 on debt - 1.10:1 minimum total debt. At funding, debt service is based on the current rents and income annualized and the appraiser's vacancy/credit loss and expenses. All appraisals must be dated less than 12 months prior to the closing.

  • Maximum Loan: $7.5 million
.z.greatloanz.assisted_living.caption: <h3>Brokers Welcome.  We pay commissions.
.z.greatloanz.assisted_living.page_title: Assisted Living Facility Mortgages and Loans

.z.greatwritingcourses.arizona_classes.description2:
Writing the Romance Novel
A Practical Course for Creating and Selling Your Book

Falling in love is a defining moment in  the experience of life. Stories of romance have held a major market share of the publishing industry for over three decades, with no sign of popularity fading. Each of us has a unique story to tell about the human experience of finding, and loving a mate. Some are funny, some are sad, some are bittersweet. All contain the highest highs of  human emotion and, also the lowest lows of human heartbreak. Betrayal, forgiveness, compassion and understanding all figure in a tale of love and romance. And, of course there is passion. It is the life blood of romance and the reason why at any age, sixteen or sixty, human beings hunger for romance in their lives

Fiction is the study of what it means to be a human being. If you have ever thought about writing your own story of love and romance, join us, and learn the skills and tools you need to write a viable piece for sale and profit. Each class will feature an important skill and tool to master, plus vital feedback on your own writing and progress. Taught by Dr. Pamela R. Goodfellow, former owner of Goodfellow Press, a Northwest fiction house and professor of fiction writing courses for 20 years, theses classes will give you the information and help you need to make your dream a successful reality

Classes Forming Now

	Six week sessions, drop in for one class or sign up for all six!

Two locations, convenient for everyone in the Valley
Scottsdale and Gilbert

Evening and weekend classes available, class size minimum is four students. Get your group together and we will schedule a class just for you.

Class format consist of lectures, Interactive exercises, printed handouts, feedback and discussion

What you learn here will pave the way for future novels!

.fancylinens.meta_description: Greatlookz: Your online source for fancy imported linens with battenburg lace, bed linens, table linens, luxury linens, placemats, tableclothes, tatting lace doilies, cotton embroidered tablecloths, embroidered cocktail napkins, lace aprons & handmade floral handkerchiefs.
.fancylinens.description2:
Fancy Linens - Aprons, Handkerchiefs, Tea Towels

Its nearly impossible to look through the wonderful items at Greatlookz and not find something your heart truly desires.

Choose from an absolutely elegant selection of fancy imported linens, lace tea towels, handmade tea towels, embroidered lace aprons, tea cosies, piano covers, fancy handmade lace handkerchiefs, sheer white floral handkerchiefs, embroidered tea towels, embroidered tablecloths, linens with battenburg lace, linens with tatting lace, floral embroidery, tuscany lace bedcovers, and more. Our lacy aprons are some of our most popular items.

Vintage Linens

When you think of vintage, you may think of clothing, cars, or hairstyles. However, vintage products are much more prevalent in other areas than you may realize. For example, vintage linens are a huge trend in the home decorating industry. The category of linens includes placemats, napkins, sheets, handkerchiefs, and more.

Today, many new items are infused with a vintage flair or are styled to resemble linens of the Victorian and Civil War eras, and handkerchiefs are no exception. They can be made in any size, from 10 to 20 inches in square size. Many feature scalloped edging as well as floral embroidered patterns. The key when shopping for vintage linens is to look for modern construction with a sturdy feel.

At GreatLookz.com, we've got a large selection of vintage reproductions handkerchiefs for formal and casual use. One handkerchief with real vintage flavor is our Cotton Handkerchief with Blue Floral Embroidery. It features a hand embroidered blue and sage green floral arrangement in the midst of a delicate white background. Made of 100 percent cotton fibers, this item is easy to wash and care for and should hold up to the test of time.

We also offer handmade Tatting Lace Doilies in assorted sizes. Created from beige tatting lace, these doilies offer vintage style and grace of years past. They are timeless treasures that are both extremely beautiful and wonderfully functional at the same time. Feel free to give us a call to talk about our selection or place an order at 877-755-4920.

.z.greatloanz.raw_land.description2:
Land Financing Programs

(including land loans, land development loan and limited cash out refi's)

USA Mortgage Corp. offers land loans and financing programs for residential or commercial developments.

Land loan sizes can range from $500,000 to $5,000,000 on properties nationwide, and at almost any stage of the entitlement process, including raw land without any entitlements or fully entitled land for:

  • Acquisitions
  • Acquisition & Development
  • Development, only (land development loan)
  • Lot Sales Programs
  • Refinance, no cash out
  • Refinance, WITH cash out
  • Purchase
  • High Leverage Financing
  • Participating Debt
  • Hard Money/Fast Funded Loans
  • Joint Ventures
  • Development Agreements
  • Non-recourse Loans

Interest rate and terms vary widely for land loans and can only be quoted after a complete understanding of the project. It is therefore imperative that you discuss the financing opportunity with Jeff Pordes or Greg Burckle at 800-254-9659 ext 133.

Below you will find some information on land loans that we trust will encourage you to call.

Real estate capital / equity is available in as many formats as "31 Flavors" has ice cream: Joint Venture, Limited Partner, Mezzanine Financing, Junior Debt, Participating Mortgage, etc... It all comes down to the same purpose... to bridge the gap between available debt financing and the cost to build, buy, renovate, and develop your real estate projects.

USA Mortgage Corp. is pleased to offer both institutional and private capital for Real Estate projects enabling our Clients to make the best choice in capital structuring (real estate equity) for the following types of properties:

  • Residential & Commercial Land Developments
  • Residential Housing Developments
  • Commercial Developments
  • Valued Added Commercial Properties
  • Credit Tenant & Single Tenant Properties
  • Condo Conversions
  • Apartment Projects
  • Industrial Parks
  • Retail Properties
  • Office Buildings

GREATGLO/homepage.description:
If you thought that gloves were a must have simply to keep the hands warm during the winter season only: look out! Greatglovesonline.com has a dazzling selection of styles, colors, fabric and trims eagerly awaiting you!

Gloves are available in varying lengths, from wrist to opera length for both casual and formal occasions. A stylishly impressive array of unique gloves points us in the direction of hard to find fingerless and half finger styles as well as dress mitts and arm warmers (for the particularly fashion adventurous)! A distinctive theme that exists for the fall/winter seasons gloves boasts that there are wonderfully unique choices for just about every age, taste and budget!

The seasons most elegant lace, satin, sheer tulle, silk, fishnet or velvet awaits weddings, cocktail parties and other evening or formal events. Chenille, polyesters and cotton knits offer classic comfort for casual outdoor occasions such as sporting events, or simply taking a refreshing walk in the crisp cool air of autumn. Trims such as funky animal prints and festive fringe embellish some of the most contemporary glove styles. Elegant beads, feminine embroidered flowers, faux pearls, sparkly sequins, crystals and fun furs adorn many of the more sophisticated glove styles. In addition to traditional black, brown and white gloves, exciting hues such as emerald green, purple, red and metallic gold and silver eagerly await the glove connoisseur for the impending holiday season!

.z.greatwebsitez.about_us.meta_description: For more information on Greatlookz call 877-755-4920
.z.greatwebsitez.about_us.description:
Our History: Marion Kiesling started her website business over 6 years ago. It was not a dramatic start - headquarters was the living room and the first product was a fluttering butterfly hair clip that sold for $1.99. The business was done nights and weekends around her day job. One thing lead to another and soon she was launching 1000 auctions a day on eBay. She hired a designer to build a website - it was horrible at best and very difficult to use or manage. Three software systems later she tried Zoovy, built a better website, started making money and eventually all but eliminated the auctions as a way of making sales. She now has 18 websites, a thriving business on Amazon and her own warehouse in Phoenix, Arizona.

Marion's Resume: MBA. UCLA 1977

BA University of the South 1975 Phi Beta Kappa

Married with 5 children

Marion spent 25 years working for 3 different large homebuilders. Her last job was with Castle and Cooke as their Vice President of Sales and Marketing for the Mainland United States. Her expertise is in sales and marketing and figuring out ways to make products that are appealing to the consumer.

In 2003 Marion started working fulltime in her own business. This is when the website really started to takeoff. Ecommerce is the modern equivalent of taking a wagon train across the United States. There are lots of challenges in a constantly changing environment. Marion enjoys staying on the cutting edge and sharing the excitement and new discoveries with others. She currently has 18 websites with several more under development. For more information call 877-755-4920

.miniatureteasets.meta_keywords: silk nightgowns,satin night gowns,silk camisoles,jacquard waist cinchers,jacquard corsets,French corsets,lace long gowns,chiffon long gowns,camisole and panty sets,sleeping garments,undergarments
.miniatureteasets.description2:
Plus Size Corsets

A corset is one of the most feminine undergarments you can wear, no matter your size or shape. Although men and women use them for various purposes, corsets were primarily popularized in the early to mid-1800s for use by women. This was a time when an "hourglass" figure was revered and supremely sought after, especially in high society. Even now, the meaning is still the same: a curvy woman with accentuated an bust and hips due to a very small waist--all created by a well-designed and gorgeous corset.

By supporting the bust completely (as opposed to straps on a bra which can cut into the skin), a corset can take undue pressure of the back and shoulders--who knew? In this way, they also help to foster excellent posture, lending you natural grace and elegance. Last, corsets benefit plus size women by accentuating their natural curves that may not be fully supported by other garments.

For plus size women, our corsets at GreatLookz.com can be beneficial in a number of ways. First, corsets work to hold in the mid-section. They can literally trim inches off of your visible waistline, creating a dramatically sexy look for both day and evening attire. Second, corsets can also reduce back pain for women with large bustlines.

We carry up to size 44 (XXX Large) and also offer waist cinchers in plus sizes as well. When it comes to placing your order, questions about sizing, or anything related to our hundreds of products, give us a call directly at 877-755-4920. We love to speak to our customers and your feedback is welcomed!
.miniatureteasets.page_title: Elegant plus size corsets, corset tops, bridal corsets  jacquard waist cinchers, jacquard corsets, waist cinchers

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.ladys_handke.description:
Ladys Handkerchief

Lace handkerchiefs have long been associated with romance. Many centuries ago, refined ladies would drop their lace handkerchiefs before gentleman suitors to let them know they were interested. Handkerchiefs were also used to communicate romantic intentions. For example, drawing a handkerchief across your face was the equivalent of whispering, "I love you." Twirling your handkerchief in your right hand was a way of letting someone know you loved another.

In the 19th century, children played a romantic game called Drop the Handkerchief. Children would form a circle, and a young girl would drop her handkerchief behind a boy. The boy would then try to catch her before she made it back to her spot in the circle. The prize for catching the girl was a kiss.

When you shop at Greatlookz.com, you can find a wide selection of unique women's handkerchiefs from which to choose. If you're planning a special luncheon, a delicate white handkerchief embroidered with an initial is a great way to let the society ladies know you've arrived. If you're looking for a way to add a subtle touch of softness to your business attire, a handkerchief is a simple accessory that lets your personality show.

If you're looking for the ultimate feminine accessory, check out our line of sheer handkerchiefs with flowers. One of our best sellers is our sweet, sheer handkerchief with pink and peach roses. If you like flowers, you'll love our blue floral handkerchief, featuring gorgeous blue flowers and bold green leaves. You can find out more about these best-selling items by calling us today at 1-877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.long_skirts.meta_description: The skirt is a fashion staple that has undergone dramatic changes over time.  During the Renaissance, women wore gowns with gathered skirts that opened in the front to reveal layers and layers of petticoats.  Heavily textured fabrics and layer upon layer of undergarments created the bulky look that was popular for many years to come.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.long_skirts.description:
Long Skirts

The skirt is a fashion staple that has undergone dramatic changes over time. During the Renaissance, women wore gowns with gathered skirts that opened in the front to reveal layers and layers of petticoats. Heavily textured fabrics and layer upon layer of undergarments created the bulky look that was popular for many years to come.

During the post-WWII era, high fashion houses took advantage of the hunger for something new and once again re-invented the skirt. Christian Dior created what became known as the New Look around 1947; this look included long, wide skirts, and a cinched waist. These full skirts were popular for more than their sheer femininity; they were also a joyful reaction to the end of WWII fabric rationing. After Dior's New Look, skirts continued to evolve, reaching new heights in the 1960s when British designer Mary Quant introduced the miniskirt.

While Dior's full-skirted look isn't seen very often these days, long skirts are still quite popular. A long skirt paired with a fancy blouse makes for an excellent formal outfit. Take that same long skirt and throw on a t-shirt, and you have a great outfit for weekends or less formal events. At Greatlookz.com, we love helping our customers create memorable outfits that are as stylish as they are versatile.

If you're looking for the perfect long skirt, we have plenty to choose from. Our swing style long skirt with Lycra is flying off the shelves right now. It's the perfect skirt for dancing, and it comes in one of this season's hottest colors--camel. Our long black rayon skirt with lace and beaded trim is the perfect skirt for mixing and matching. Take a look through our online inventory to get some great ideas for your next big event, or call us at 1-877-755-4920 and we'll help you pick just the right skirt.

.faq_for_rentals.description:
How do I rent from Greatlookz?
1. Search our selection of girl's dresses, christening outfits or boys tuxedos and suits. Select the color and size that you need. In the "notes" section let us know what date you want your order to arrive (up to 6 months in advance). Your rental period allows you to keep it for 14 days. A fully refundable deposit of $25.00 will be charged at the time of reservation.
2. Receive the dress via FedEx.
3. Return is easy. When your rental is over simply pop it in the pre-paid, pre-addressed return envelope and drop it at any FedEx center or drop box. No need to worry about the dry-cleaningâwe take care of it! Your deposit will be refunded to your credit card as soon as we receive the garment back from you.
When should I book a reservation?
The sooner you book, the more selection you have. We accept reservations up to 6 months in advance. If you have a last minute fashion need we offer next day (except Sunday). Remember to schedule your dress to arrive 1-2 days before your event so you have time to complete your look.
How do I know my order will arrive on time?
We are going to do everything that we can to make sure your event is perfect. If your dress is not going to be available we will call and email to help you choose a good alternative. We guarantee delivery by 8pm on the day you select your order to arrive. FedEx tracking information will be emailed to you when your order ships, and delivery does not require a signature. If you would prefer that signature is required, please let us know.
Who cleans the dresses?
All garments are professionally dry cleaned before they are sent to you. Our garments are all in excellent condition. If you receive a garment that you are dissatisfied with please call us right away and we will remedy the situation. We can be reached at 877-755-4920.
Will the dresses need to be pressed upon arrival?
Our goal is to have each outfit arrive as wrinkle free as possible. Each dress is steamed and pressed before being sealed in plastic. Some fabrics simply wrinkle more than others, so if you receive a dress with slight creases please try steaming the garment on low heat or call us for advice. We can be reached at 877-755-4920.
What if I accidentally stain or damage the dress?
We understand that some wear and tear may be inevitable and beyond your control. Our dry cleaner can take care of most minor damage. Although very rare, significant destruction (the dress is torn apart at all the seams, you accidentally run over the dress with your car, the centerpiece catches fire and chars a hole into your dress and the dress cannot be repaired and we are unable to rent it to future customers, your credit card will be charged immediately for the retail price of the dress. Please remember, these are extremely rare occasions.
What if the dress doesn't fit?
We issue merchandise credits. If the outfit does not fit, call us immediately to process a return. Your unworn dresses must be postmarked back to us within 24 hours of initial delivery. Once we receive your return, we will issue a merchandise credit less the cost of shipping for a future rental or purchase. Make sure you call us before placing your next order, so we can ensure you have a more successful experience next time around.
How do I exchange my dress?
If you receive your dresses and need an alternate size or just change your mind and want a new look, give our staff a call right away so we can ship you another available style in the same price tier for just the cost of shipping.
How much does shipping cost?
Standard delivery is just $9.95.
Outside of Arizona, next-day or Saturday delivery costs approximately $35.00. Return shipping is on usâwe provide pre-paid, pre-labeled return envelopes to ensure your simple hassle-free return
Do you deliver outside the continental U.S.?
At this time, we only ship orders within the continental United States. Similarly, orders must be returned from within the continental U.S.
Do you ship to P.O. boxes?
Noâplease enter a valid residence, company or hotel address for a successful delivery.
Can you deliver to a hotel or another address besides my home?
If you are shipping to a hotel, please put the hotel name in the company field and the reservation guest as the attention. It must be a secure location, not a P.O. Box, and please make sure the hotel concierge is expecting your delivery.
Is a signature required for delivery?
Our FedEx packages do not require a signature for customers. However, FedEx may make exceptions to our request at their discretion. At the time of placing your order, you may request a "Signature Required".
What time will my dress arrive?
Deliveries are made between 8am and 8pm during weekdays and Saturdays. We provide tracking information so you can see when your package is out for delivery with FedEx.
How do I return my order?
We will take care of everything you need to make returning your rental entirely hassle-free! Simply follow theses 3 easy steps:
1. Check your invoice confirmation or your My Account page to confirm your rental return date.
2. Next, simply fold the dress(s) in the enclosed pre-paid return envelope. There is no need to iron or clean the dress, we will take care of any reasonable wear and tear. To return accessories without damage, please package the items back exactly how your received them.
3. Lastly, drop your return package at any "FedEx Drop Off" location. Make sure to drop off your package no later than noon on your return date. See FedEx.com for a location nearest you.
What if my rental ends on a Sunday or holiday?
Do not worry â just return it the next business day.
What if I return my order late?
Please be sure to always return your order on the scheduled return date because a delay can prevent someone else from looking fabulous at their event. A late return is subject to late fees (5% of the retail price per dress or accessory) for every day it is postmarked after the original return date.
Can I keep or purchase a dress?

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.lingerie_cor.description:
Lingerie Corsets

When most of us think of the history of corsets, we think of Victorian women who had to endure what seems like daily torture to uphold the era's demanding standards of beauty. According to some historians, the corset was nowhere near as uncomfortable as most of us might think. Back then, corsets were used to flatten the stomach area and lift the chest area.

Today, corsets are worn in bold new ways. Artists like Madonna showed the world you could wear a corset as a sexy stand-alone top. The burlesque era showed us how corsets could be worn to celebrate a woman's curves. The influences from this era are still seen today in modern lingerie designs.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer corsets that combine the elegance of the past with modern trends in fashion design. We offer a line of corsets and undergarments that celebrate the female figure. Many of our garments help to create stronger lines and they accentuate your natural curves. If you're looking for practical support or want something sexy to wear on your wedding night, we've got what you need.

We offer corset sets that include g-string underwear and garter belts. These sets make great gifts for romantic occasions, wedding showers, and other special occasions. Our form-flattering corsets are available in a variety of different styles and colors, and they come in sizes 32 to 44 to fit any body type. Call us at 1-877-755-4920 to order your special lingerie today.

.ztips.prom_etiquette.meta_description: The prom is a special event in every young woman's life, but it requires a bit of planning for magic to happen.  From the dress to the date to the dinner, there are plenty of ingredients that need to be just right for your prom experience to be magical.  Here are a few tips for making sure the night is one to remember.
.ztips.prom_etiquette.description:
Prom Etiquette

The prom is a special event in every young woman's life, but it requires a bit of planning for magic to happen. From the dress to the date to the dinner, there are plenty of ingredients that need to be just right for your prom experience to be magical. Here are a few tips for making sure the night is one to remember.

Any girl will tell you that selecting the wrong dress can make for a long night. A strapless dress with the wrong kind of support makes for a night of nervous energy and constant fidgeting. Heels that are simply too high can make movement next to impossible. A short dress can make it difficult to sit down during dinner. Always shop for a dress that suits your personality, and try to buy early in case you need to make adjustments or alterations.

Ask any woman who wore the same dress as a friend to the prom and she'll tell you it's a real bummer. A major prom night no-no is buying a dress from the mall. If you see a bunch of the same dresses on the same rack, you're in trouble; how many other girls will show up wearing the same thing? When you buy from Greatlookz.com, you have so many lovely dresses to choose from, dresses that will make you stand out from the crowd. Be sure to place your order early so you have plenty of time for alterations. Call us today at 1-877-755-4920!

The prom is your night to shine, to celebrate your individuality. You don't have to follow trends; feel free to set your own. If sleek matte jersey dresses are in style, don't hesitate to break the mold if you'd rather wear a lacy, vintage-inspired dress. At Greatlookz.com, we encourage you to be safe, have fun, and celebrate your individuality.

If you prefer pristine white, wear them as they are (except for Style 611-D which is only good for dyeing other colors). But if you want your personal color, and wish to dye these gloves, we include a Colortest strip of the glove material with each pair. Before you dye your gloves (with Rit, Tintex, or other household dye) to match your outfit, you can pretest any color on the enclosed strip of fabric. Should you want to test more than one dye color, simply cut the Colortest strip in half, thirds, etc.

.z.greatfoodz.2.description: What is the difference between preserves and marmalades? Preserves are almost identical to jam but has chunks of fruit. Jam is a thick puree mixture of fruit, sugar, and often pectin. Marmalade is similar to a preserve, but usually contains citrus fruit rind. And jelly is a clear, bright mixture made from fruit juice, sugar, and often pectin. Enjoy!

.z.greatshopz.fashionarticles.description:
How many gifts can you buy today for less than $10???  Greatsockz.com has an exciting assortment of lively sock styles, up to the minute colors and whimsical trims offering fashionably fun stocking stuffers and put a smile on your face gift ideas year round.

For as low as $3.99, you can pamper yourself or a friend with styles that include slipper socks, trouser socks, shorty socks and ankle socks that are as comfortably practical as they are pretty for everyday wear! No occasion is required to present our novelty themed socks featuring animal prints, toe socks, classical art socks and fishnet socks as memorable presents for a particularly special mom, teacher or that friend who has everything!  In addition to holiday gifts, consider purchasing a few fabulous pairs of socks as teachers gifts, birthdays gifts or Mothers Day!  Is your child part of an upcoming school talent show or involved in a theatre performance?  Search our sock catalog for hard to find sock styles that can complete a special costume with finesse.  

Uncover our lively selection of trims that include beautiful fabrics such as lace and sheer organza.  Beads, ruffles, animal print fabrics, satin bows, frilly ruffles, marabou trim and fringe are just a few of the many adornments that you will find on our refreshingly unique sock styles.  Although we do carry favorites like traditional white, black and beige colored socks, allow your imagination to run wild and consider some of our more cutting edge color selections such as lime, orange, coral, pink, purple and red.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.maternity_we.meta_description: Your source for maternity wedding dresses
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.maternity_we.description:
Maternity Wedding Dresses

Just because you're expecting doesn't mean you have to compromise style or comfort when it comes to finding a wedding dress. When you shop at Greatlookz.com, you'll find a wide selection of wedding dresses to choose from, no matter how far along you are in

your pregnancy. Are you thinking of a simple wedding, without the frills and fancy dresses? Look for a simple yet elegant gown in flowing fabrics, and highlight that simplicity with a bouquet of wildflowers or daisies. If you want to go all out, reverse the equation and glam it up with satin, heels and the velvety elegance of roses. No matter your approach, we'll help you find a gorgeous dress to fit your sense of style.

Rather than buying a dress off the rack, let us custom-fit your dress to make sure it looks perfect. If you're in your first few months, you may be able to cover up your bump by wearing a dress with an A-line skirt. The relaxed waist and flowing style make for an elegant look without drawing attention to your belly.

If you're further along, show off your bump with loving pride. Choose an empire-style gown that will cling softly to your curves, or go glamorous in silk or satin. We can help you find the right dress to fit your changing body, whether the wedding is in two weeks or two months. Call us today at 1-877-755-4920 for more information on all of our maternity bridal wear.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.hat_boxes.meta_keywords: Hand Held Fans,Hat Boxes,How To Tie A Scarf
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.hat_boxes.meta_description: Hat boxes serve a dual purpose--they protect your favorite hats, and can also work as lovely complements to your decor.  Greatlookz.com has a wide selection of sturdy and elegant looking hat boxes from which to choose.  You can choose from small, medium and large hat boxes, and you can even order a complete set of hat boxes in three different sizes.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.hat_boxes.description:
Hat Boxes

Hat boxes serve a dual purpose--they protect your favorite hats, and can also work as lovely complements to your decor. Greatlookz.com has a wide selection of sturdy and elegant looking hat boxes from which to choose. You can choose from small, medium and large hat boxes, and you can even order a complete set of hat boxes in three different sizes.

An important part of hat storage, hat boxes help keep your hats from being damaged during storage. Before you put your favorite hat away, be sure it's free from stains or dirt. Don't place the hat in the box with the brim-side down--this can alter the shape of the brim. Instead, place the hat in the box with the crown side down, and stuff the hat with tissue to help it keep its shape.

Our red hat box collection and our white hat box collection are our most popular storage items. The red hat box comes with an attractive purple braided handle. The white hat box collection comes with a gold trim and a braided gold handle. If you have any questions about sizing or colors, call us directly during business hours at 1-877-755-4920.

Our large boxes are six inches tall and 16 inches across. The medium hat boxes measure 15 inches across and are also six inches tall. The small sized boxes are 14 inches across. We also feature an exclusive collection of designer hat boxes for your Red Hat Society favorites. You can even use these beautiful boxes to store your favorite photos and other treasured keepsakes.

GREATPA1/homepage.meta_keywords: parasols, parasol umbrellas, nylon parasols, paper parasols. lace fans, battenburg parasols, battenburg fans, funeral parasol, wedding parasole
GREATPA1/homepage.meta_description: Your source for lace parasols in all sizes and colors.      Also find lace fans to match.
GREATPA1/homepage.description:
Victorian parasols were derived from their Chinese counterparts in the middle of the 17th century in France and England. The original idea of the parasol was invented during the Wei Dynasty of Ancient China, though, more than 2,400 years ago. The western version was eventually called an umbrella by most people, but the term "parasol" today refers to the Victorian or Asian version of the umbrella, which is traditionally more feminine and more ornate.

At GreatParasolz.com, we sell a wide variety of parasols from different cultures and time periods. We have replica Victorian parasols as well as Chinese and Japanese reproductions. Each is crafted with high-quality materials and are best used to shield skin from the rays of the sun, not the rain or wind due to their delicate lace or paper construction.

Our parasols come in a number of sizes. Our beautiful White Floral Lace Parasol comes in small (13 inches across), medium (20 inches across), and large (33 inches across). They are great for parties and feature nylon construction for surprising durability and convenient weatherproofing.

Our number one goal is to provide you with great customer service and items you just won't find anywhere else. We offer parasols of every shape, color, and design, and can help you choose the one that is right for your needs. Whether it is for a costume, a wedding, an event, or just to have, our friendly fashion order representatives can help you pick out perfect Victorian parasols at 877-755-4920.
GREATPA1/homepage.page_title: Buy Lace bridal parasols, nylon parasols and lace fans

.zzzz1.description:
Shipping Information:

The United States Postal Service is our Standard Shipping method.

We make every effort to ship your order the next business day after the order is placed. We are located in Scottsdale, AZ, so the time it takes for a package to arrive at it's destination depends on how far away you are from us - a rough estimate is a 2 to 10 days - sooner if you are located close to Arizona. The costs for this will vary from $2.75 for a small package to $20.00 for a hat box.

Priority Mail can take 3 to 5 days to arrive but is not guaranteed to arrive on time.

Fed-Ex

When you ship via FedEx. please enter your zip code in the box provided so that you can see all the FedEx options before you check out. Everything is shown on the web except the price for Saturday delivery - depending on location this can be $10 to $15 more than what is shown for overnite delivery.

Please note that a street address is required when using FedEx.

It is also the most ecomonic way for most large packages. Fed Ex Ground delivery times are base on distance. West Coast residents will get their package faster than East Coast residents - see diagram below for estimated delivery times.

For more specific questions please call us toll free at 877-755-4920.

International Shipments

Yes we do ship internationally to most countries. We offer 2 services for international shipments.

USPS First Class International Mail which can be used for any packages under 4 lbs. This services takes up to 30 days to arrive. There is NO tracking for this service, only delivery confirmation.

Fedex International Priority is also avialable for speedy delivery. Typical delivery times range from 1-5 days. There is full tracking available for this service.

How to Get a Quote on International Shipping

Enter your items into the shopping cart. Enter your full address into the cart. Make sure to change the country to your country! Go back to the cart and click on shipping options to see prices. Prices are based on the weights of the products and the ship to location.

Special Notes about International Shipments

Many countries charge duties on international shipments. The customer is responsible for paying all the duties to recieve the shipment. If your package has been delayed, check with your local post office. Many times, the post office will hold a package if the duties are not paid. Abandoned shipments will not be refunded.

If you feel your package has been lost, notify us and we will send a new one after 30 days have passed from the original ship date.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.fashion_glov.description:
Fashion Gloves

Trends come and go in the fashion world, but when you find the right pair of gloves, they'll always be in style. When it comes to romantic accessories, gloves have a long tradition of expressing love and devotion. Knights used to take a glove into battle as a token of love from a lady. In Victorian times, a lady handed her glove to a man to indicate acceptance of his marriage proposal.

Whether you're looking for a fancy pair of gloves to wear to a ball or you're looking for the perfect gloves to complete your costume for a theme party, Greatlookz.com has the best selection of gloves you'll find anywhere online. At Greatlookz.com, we bring the latest styles right into your home, and we make it easy for you to browse and order online.

While some designers have created looks this year that tend to favor rough edges, soft feminine gloves are always a classic. Among our best-selling items, you'll always find tea party gloves in classic white, and our extra soft black leather driving gloves.

Our buyers search high and low to bring you the best selection of fancy gloves. A new favorite among our customers is our ladies' wrist-length satin gloves. These gloves feature an attractive satin bow at the back of the wrist, and they're perfect for black-tie affairs and special dress-up parties as well. To order, simply call 1-877-755-4920.

.z.finale_gloves.satin_gloves.description2:
Finale's Satin Lovers glove collection is ideal for any social occasion. Shiny satin gloves can be worn by everyone in a bridal party (the Bride, Mothers-of-the-Bride/Groom, Bridesmaids, Flower Girls) even the guests. These beautiful gloves add elegance to the occasion. Shiny satin gloves are also an excellent choice for prom wear. Finale's shiny satin gloves are 91% nylon and 9% lycra spandex, so they truly are a one size fit. Several styles come in as many as 16 colors!

Finale's shiny satin gloves are available at Nordstrom, Jessica McClintock Bridal and Neiman Marcus stores as well as select Vera Wang Bridal Boutiques in Barney's plus thousands of upscale bridal stores.

We would like to know the actual date you will be wearing the gloves so that you will not be disappointed with a late delivery. Please provide an accurate WEAR DATE that allows us enough handling time to process your order. Not everyone is wearing their new gloves tomorrow.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_acces.meta_description: If you've ever planned a wedding, you know that an incredible amount of detail goes into the process.  Just when you think you've got all the bases covered, another detail crops up at the last minute.  If you're looking to find all your wedding accessories in one easy place, Greatlookz.com can help.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_acces.description:
Bridal Accessories

If you've ever planned a wedding, you know that an incredible amount of detail goes into the process. Just when you think you've got all the bases covered, another detail crops up at the last minute. If you're looking to find all your wedding accessories in one easy place, Greatlookz.com can help.

Few accessories are as important as the bridal bouquet. Bouquets have come a long way since Victorian times, when brides chose flowers based on their traditional sentimental meaning. Some bouquets, such as the concentrically circled Biedermeier, have gone out of fashion. Others, such as nosegays, remain popular for casual brides and bridal attendants.

Rather than spending a great deal of money on flowers that wilt and fade over time, consider buying a bouquet of amazingly realistic silk flowers. At Greatlookz.com, our customers rave about our stunning bouquet of ivory roses and hydrangeas. Mixed together in simple elegance, these flowers leave a lasting impression.

Your wedding night is undeniably special, as it kicks off the rest of your life as man and wife. If you want to give him a sight to remember, check out our three-piece bridal lingerie set. This set features a strapless camisole, elegant white thigh high stockings, and a matching veil. This set is the perfect gift for wedding showers as well.

Dressing up for your big day can be an overwhelming process. At Greatlookz.com, we've thought of everything. We offer everything from elegant beaded bridal purses to beautifully trimmed items for bridesmaids and family members alike. We even offer special gifts for wedding guests, such as adorable white parasols for the tables at the reception. Find out more by browsing our website, or by calling 1-877-755-4950.

.z.greatloanz.residential_mortgages.description2:
No Closing Cost++ Home Refinance Loan. Call Today to Combine Mortgage and Debt. FED CUTS RATE! CALL OUR SPECIAL RATE HOTLINE Best Rate and Fee Guarantee: USA MORTGAGE CORPORATION guarantees to provide the lowest interest rate (Annual Percentage Rate) and fees. For this guarantee, USA MORTGAGE will compare all fees defined as closing costs. In the event the applicant believes a competing lender has a lower Annual Percentage Rate and fees combination, the applicant must provide the competing lenders complete, system-generated Good Faith Estimate to Paramount Equity. The competing lenders Good Faith Estimate must include the lenders name and must be dated the same day that USA MORTGAGE provided an interest rate and fees quote. In the event that the Good Faith Estimate indicates a lower Annual Percentage Rate and fees combination for a loan program that is identical to the one that is being offered by USA MORTGAGE, and USA MORTGAGE has verified the accuracy of the competing lenders Annual Percentage Rate and fees, USA MORTGAGE has the option of either beating the lenders fees by $50 or paying the applicant $500 (maximum $500 per loan). USA MORTGAGE will pay the $500 once the borrower closes the loan with the competing lender and provides USA MORTGAGE with a copy of the signed Note and final HUD-1 Settlement Statement. Applicants must complete a credit application so that USA MORTGAGE can assess credit worthiness in order to determine which loan program, interest rate and fees the applicants are most qualified for. Odd days interest, impounding escrow accounts are excluded. Lender comparison must be based on a first mortgage loan with the same terms and conditions.

100% LTV VA Residential Loans in Arizona and California.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_hats.meta_description: The great thing about your wedding is that it can reflect as much or as little of your personality as you like. For many brides, that style is reflected in the dress and the accessories they choose. As an example, wedding hats offer an excellent alternative to traditional wedding veils. They can be large, small, simple, or complex--it simply depends on your gown, wedding theme, and personal fashion taste.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_hats.description:
Wedding Hats

The great thing about your wedding is that it can reflect as much or as little of your personality as you like. For many brides, that style is reflected in the dress and the accessories they choose. As an example, wedding hats offer an excellent alternative to traditional wedding veils. They can be large, small, simple, or complex--it simply depends on your gown, wedding theme, and personal fashion taste.

Choosing a hat should start with your dress. You probably won't want to wear a Victorian era hat with an ultra modern dress and by the same token, you probably wouldn't wear a cowboy hat with a regal type of gown. As well, a wedding hat doesn't have to be a large item.

We sell a matte satin Ivory Bridal Hat with a veil attached that's quite popular among brides. This hat is, for many, the perfect hat/veil combination--unassuming yet beautiful. It features a small headpiece trimmed in faux pearls, with a small veil in ivory attached at the back in two layers. Dainty and feminine, this is a great alternative to a large hat.

However, if a large hat is what you want, we've got that too! Garden weddings offer the perfect setting in which to wear hats like out Bridal Wedding Style Hat in Solid White. This hand-trimmed, large brimmed wonder measures 21 inches across and is accented with a gathering of tulle in the back. It is piled with gorgeous accents like ostrich feathers, roses, and beading. Truly stunning, this piece and all of our wedding hats offer unique options for your wedding ensemble. Call us today for details at 877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.lace_handker.description:
Lace Handkerchief

Throughout history, the lace handkerchief has been a symbol of elegance, sophistication and class. No other accessory has been embraced as a symbol of effortless elegance throughout time than the square lace handkerchief. Royal families and aristocrats in France, Italy, and Germany all wore handkerchiefs exclusively during the 1800s.

According to historians, handkerchiefs became uniformly square in shape due to a mandate by none other than Marie Antoinette. The French Queen was known for her style, and for whatever reason, she declared the square hankie the most perfect and attractive form. Since then, the square hankie has become the standard for style mavens and etiquette enthusiasts alike.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer classic lace handkerchiefs with intricately embroidered flowers and delicate designs. Our handkerchiefs are perfect for dressing up a fancy garden party outfit, or a smart pant suit. We also carry a complete line of fancy handkerchiefs for men. You might not end up in the society section of the newspaper, but you will make a lasting impression when you wear one of our classic white lace hankies.

If you're looking to dress to impress, a lace handkerchief is the perfect accessory. We know you have plenty of resources for all your fashion needs, and we work hard to earn your business. We always have someone on hand during regular business hours to answer any questions you might have about style, party attire, etiquette and even how to wear your fashion accessories. You can reach us at 1-877-755-4920.
