.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_tiar.meta_description: Tiaras, or diadems, were first worn in ancient Mesopotamia by royal women. Back then, they were high crowns made of fabric or leather that was shaped into a cylindrical shape that narrowed at the top to come to a point. Today, tiaras are most commonly worn by brides on their wedding days.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_tiar.description:
Wedding Tiaras

Tiaras, or diadems, were first worn in ancient Mesopotamia by royal women. Back then, they were high crowns made of fabric or leather that was shaped into a cylindrical shape that narrowed at the top to come to a point. Today, tiaras are most commonly worn by brides on their wedding days.

Modern tiaras are metal framed and accented by crystals and patterns of stones. They are typically lower, averaging about two to four inches high. These regal creations are often stunning and can complete your wedding gown like few other pieces of jewelry or accessories can.

One of the best things about being a bride (besides marrying the partner of your dreams) is that you are able to dress up like a princess for a day. No matter whether your style is regal and elegant, fun and trendy, or simple and classic, we have wedding tiaras at GreatLookz.com that can suit your wedding day look. We encourage you to call us today at 877-755-4920 to find out what we can do for you.

Or, you can shop online and peruse our different kinds of tiaras, including Our Pear Wedding Tiara, which is a great alternative to the traditional metal and crystal version. Made with sequins, beading and faux pearls, this creation is a gorgeous headpiece that will photograph beautifully and wear easily. One size fits most and it comes in bridal white. Other options, like our Heart Design Tiara, can enhance your elegance on your walk down the aisle. Feel free to browse our wide selection of wedding tiaras to find the creation that blends with your bridal ensemble.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.toe_socks.meta_description: Fashion trends this year are all about comfort and personal style, even in footwear. Socks with individual compartments for each one of your toes are aptly named toe socks and they are very popular among men and women of all ages. Especially in cold weather climates, these cotton feet warmers are ideal for keeping every little piggy warm.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.toe_socks.description:
Toe Socks

Fashion trends this year are all about comfort and personal style, even in footwear. Socks with individual compartments for each one of your toes are aptly named toe socks and they are very popular among men and women of all ages. Especially in cold weather climates, these cotton feet warmers are ideal for keeping every little piggy warm.

If you've never worn toe socks before, they truly are the equivalent of gloves for your feet. They have separate, stretchy pockets for each toe and create a snug fit for your feet that keeps them warm and cushioned all day long. Typically, they feature a long body, with a standard fit just below or at the knee.

At GreatLookz.com, we sell lots of animal print and fun toe socks to help you express your inner wild child. We've got leopard, cow, and zebra prints, as well as rainbow toe socks! Each pair is generously sized to stretch to fit most people, and are pleasantly soft and cushy.

These fun items make superb gifts for men as well as women of all ages. They are functional and fun, which makes them ideal gifts for practical folks as well as whimsical gift recipients. Young girls and even older grandmothers can enjoy the comfort and pleasure of toe socks. You can order toe socks on our website or give us a call to order directly at 877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.crinoline_pe.description:
Crinoline Petticoats

Crinoline petticoats were all the rage during the early 1830s. Crinoline is a linen material that's woven together using horsehair. When referring to petticoats, "crinoline" is the universally accepted term for a hooped underskirt frame.

Petticoats give shape and body to skirts, and they help to show off a woman's figure. In years past, women celebrated their curves and accentuated their femininity by wearing bouncy skirts with as many as six different petticoats underneath. Today, petticoats are worn for fun and fashion, and they're gaining in popularity thanks to innovative lingerie designers and private societies dedicated to the preservation of this classic feminine look.

Finding petticoats isn't as easy as you might think. Many lingerie stores simply don't stock these items because they don't sell as well as thongs and sexy nightgowns. GreatLookz.com is one of the best resources around for petticoats with classic features and a modern twist. You can shop online or place your order by calling a sales representative at 1-877-755-4920.

When it comes to modern petticoats, our most popular and versatile item is our ruffled sheer crystalline petticoat. This 15-inch, two-layer petticoat comes in black, pink, purple and white. It's great for special parties, dances, bridal showers, and just about any other dress-up event. Whether you're spending a romantic evening at home or you're dancing the night away under the stars, it's always more fun when you can feel the delightful swish of a crinoline petticoat.

.scarves_shawls.shawls.meta_keywords: Velvet shawls,crocheted shawls,Victorian lace shawls,lace shawl,floral print,beaded shawl,feathered shawl
.scarves_shawls.shawls.meta_description: Greatlookz: Find the perfect shawl from a selection of velvet shawls, feathered shawls, crocheted shawls, floral print shawls, Victorian lace shawls, Spanish lace shawls, beaded shawls.
.scarves_shawls.shawls.description2:
Crochet Shawls

When it comes to finding the key looks for 2006, one of the top trends is crochet. If you're seeking a crisp, classic look, you can't go wrong with a white dress paired with a crochet knit shawl. Wrap the shawl around your shoulders, and you've got the perfect outfit for those long day-into-evening outings.

At Greatlookz.com, we know how important it is for you to look your best all the time. We work with fashion designers to track the latest trends, and we deliver them right to your doorstep thanks to our convenient online service. If you prefer, you can order items by phone by calling us directly at 1-877-755-4920.

According to the fashion experts at the top shows in Milan, Paris and London, the hot look for this year consists of crochet accents. Bolstered by the boho-chic fashions of the past two seasons, crochet is making a serious comeback. With fashion-forward stars such as Sienna Miller seen with crochet-accented clothing and accessories, this handcrafted accent is a sure bet for this year.

So how can you work a little crochet into your wardrobe? Crochet shawls are the ultimate fashion accessory this year, and they're even better with patchwork designs or large panels. Singer and actress Jessica Simpson may be known for her Daisy Dukes, but she also made the silk crochet shawl an immensely popular alternative to the poncho. Jessica was photographed wearing a crochet shawl on tour, and now they're flying off the shelves all around the world.

Greatlookz.com offers plenty of ways to adopt this latest trend into your own unique style, including our gypsy-chic crocheted rayon shawl with fringe, as well as elegant beaded crocheted shawls. These shawls add a soft, feminine touch to any outfit, and their timeless beauty makes them ideal for year-round use.
.scarves_shawls.shawls.description: Greatlookz.com offers ladys scarves and shawls for every occasion. We carry a wide selection of womens velvet shawls, feathered shawls, crocheted shawls, Spanish lace shawls, Victorian lace shawls, and more. Please click the category links at the very top of the page to view our varied selection of scarves and shawls.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.womens_fashi.description:
Womens Fashion Accessories

If fashion is important to you, you know how essential it is to be aware of the latest trends in accessories. Putting together a finished look is all about selecting the right earrings, purses, belts, hats, sunglasses, socks, scarves and hankies. While there will always be hard and fast rules in the fashion world, taking risks can help you find a unique look that will have everyone asking where you found the inspiration.

If you're looking for a way to express your personality or stand out in the crowd, fashion accessories are the best way to achieve your goal. It's true what they say--the right accessory really does make the look. This year, some of the most popular trends in fashion accessories include large handbags with metallic detailing (such as grommets), aviator sunglasses, wide belts, and accessories featuring lace or crochet. When it comes to jewelry, you can expect to see a return to choker necklaces, chandelier and hoop earrings, and wood components.

At Greatlookz.com, we scour the fashion world for unique and original accessories, and we offer them at reasonable prices. If you're looking to define your look, there's no better place to start than our accessories department. Log onto our website to get started today, or give us a call during business hours at 1-877-755-4920.

We offer several specialty sites, featuring a wide selection of accessories such as hosiery, gloves, hats, fancy socks, and jewelry. If you're getting ready for a black tie event or you're attending a theme party, we've got accessories for every occasion. You don't want to show up looking like every other woman in the room. Shop with us, and find the unique accessories to let your unique beauty shine through!

.z.greatfoodz.76.description: What is extra virgin anyway? Traditionally produced extra virgin oils, made from the first pressing of olives, are essentially little more than the juice of the olive. Technically, "extra virgin" is a grade of olive oilusually indicating the highest quality and distinguished by its naturally low levels of free oleic acid. .zmarion_s_fashion_articles.womens_forma.meta_description: Your source for womens formal dressses and womens plus size formal dresses
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.womens_forma.page_title: Womens Formal Dressses, womens plus size formal dresses
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.womens_forma.description:
Womens Formal Dresses

Women's formal dresses this year are as varied as they are colorful. The little black dress is no longer the only standard. Chocolates, reds, and bright blues are splashing their way onto the fashion scene and should be incorporated into formal wear throughout the fall season.

No matter your size or shape, formal dresses require formal accessories and hairstyles. A corsage is acceptable for events such as balls, proms, and debutante events. Cocktail parties, weddings, and other formal occasions do not require corsages unless you are an honored guest, however. As well, trends this year is returning to formal hairstyles, inviting up-dos and ringlet curls as a standard for an elegant appearance.

GreatLookz.com offers a great selection of women's formal dresses for any occasion that fit virtually every style and budget. No longer will you have to run around town trying to find the "perfect" dress with no luck. We have full color and detailed photos of every gown we sell, so you can see everything about the dress before purchasing.

As well, we include detailed size charts that help women of every size find the perfect fit for their dresses. We suggest first using a tape measure to take your measurements, and then matching them up with our pre-made size charts to see where you fall. Keep in mind that dress sizes for formal gowns are often very different from department store sizes, so don't worry if you have to go up a size or two in your formal dress size; this is normal. If you ever need help getting the right measurements or finding your size, just give us a call at 877-755-4920. We're here to help!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.panama_hats.meta_description: Panama hats have been around since the 16th century, when Incas used fibers from the toquilla plant to produce hats. It wasn't until workers wore these during the construction of the Panama Canal that they became known as Panama hats. During the Spanish American War, the U.S. government ordered a supply of more than 50,000 Panama hats to protect the troops from the Caribbean sun.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.panama_hats.description:
Panama Hats

Panama hats have been around since the 16th century, when Incas used fibers from the toquilla plant to produce hats. It wasn't until workers wore these during the construction of the Panama Canal that they became known as Panama hats. During the Spanish American War, the U.S. government ordered a supply of more than 50,000 Panama hats to protect the troops from the Caribbean sun.

In America, the Panama hat received a big boost in popularity after President Theodore Roosevelt was photographed wearing one during the construction of the Panama Canal. Since 1901, Panama hats have often featured a signature black band originally meant to commemorate the death of Queen Victoria. In 1985, the Panama hat was named one of the "100 best designs ever" by the Conran Foundation.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer a wide selection of Panama hats and fine straw hats.
Nothing shows off your personality like a bright, bold hat. Our deluxe brim straw Panama hat is nothing if not bold. You'll be a vision of style in this stunning straw hat with a nine-inch brim. This hat comes in a variety of colors, including black, camel, white, and this season's hottest color, dark brown.

In addition to our flashy collection of Panama hats, we also have plenty of straw hats for those who want a more subtle look. These hats are great for everyday wear and sun protection; we also offer straw hats with charming floral accents, for a more feminine look. Check out all our hats online, or call us today at 1-877-755-4920 to place your order today.

.cphotocontest.description:
Greatlookz Photo Contest

What are the hallmarks of a winning image in Greatlookz photo contest? Technical quality, clarity and composition, but also a flair for the unexpected and the ability to capture a picture-perfect moment.

Enter photographs in any of our five categories wearing our Greatlookz products - Weddings, Proms, Special Occasions, Halloween, Birthdays - and compete to win gift certificates as well as the opportunity to have your work printed in one of our Greatlookz Catalogz. After reviewsing the contest rules and list of frequently asked questions, you will be fully prepared to enter the contest.

This contest is ongoing. On a monthly basis, Grealtlookz judges will post the best of the incoming entries for that month. Finalists will be announced approximately one week after the previous month. You will be notified by email. Good luck to everyone!

  • Copyright: You agree to the subsequent use of your photo material by the Greatlookz Inc, which reserves the right to publish the winning entry and the finalists, with the appropriate credit, in its Greatlookz Catalogs and printed publications as well as on its website.
  • Eligibility: Open to all photographers ages 18 and over, professional and amateur.
  • Entry Fee: Free.
  • Entry Deadline: Ongoing.

.apparel.tops.description2:
Silk Blouses

For any woman, a gorgeous silk blouse makes you look and feel great. The fabric itself a cooling and smooth material that creates a sensation of feather-light wear. As well, silk complements any body type or shape, hugging you in the right areas and flowing loosely across trouble spots.

Silk blouses offer a blend of sophistication and elegance that's ideal for day-to-night wear. However, be aware that workplace etiquette generally dictates that sleeveless blouses are only appropriate on casual Fridays. Long sleeved silk blouses are typically well accepted throughout the week, especially when paired with a nice blazer or jacket.

We offer several fabulous silk blouses of varying styles at GreatLookz.com. We believe you should have choice in your wardrobe and offer a range of products to choose from. That's why we carry hard to find and unique items like our handmade silk blouses. Made by skilled tailors, these silk creations feature distinct decorations like handmade embroidered flowers, designs, and appliques. They are made with long sleeves and covered buttons for a clean look all around.

When you're looking for a silk blouse with style and flair, you've come to the right place. Give us a call at 877-755-4920 to place your order. Or, shop online with us and have all your items shipped at the click of a button. Your satisfaction is guaranteed and we'll do everything in our power to make sure you are happy with all your orders from us.

.ztips.how_to_wear_a_scart.meta_description: Many women resist scarves because they simply feel they don't have time to learn how to tie them or wear them properly.  Fortunately for you, wearing a scarf has never been easier or more popular than it is right now.
.ztips.how_to_wear_a_scart.description:
How To Wear A Scarf

Many women resist scarves because they simply feel they don't have time to learn how to tie them or wear them properly. Fortunately for you, wearing a scarf has never been easier or more popular than it is right now.

If you're looking for an accessory to keep you warm during the cold winter months, a scarf is a great way to retain body heat. Find a classic wool scarf, or opt for a sportier fleece blend, and simply wrap it around your neck. A longer scarf is great for creating texture or a fuller look, while a shorter scarf is great for those cold winter nights when trapping heat is your main concern.

Silk scarves are also quite popular, and they look great year round. A larger scarf gives an outfit more depth when wrapped around the shoulders or tied around the neck. A smaller silk scarf creates a sporty look when tied off to the side, or a glamorous look when left long and lean. You can even experiment with your scarf to create a new look--who knows, you may even inspire a new trend!

At Greatlookz.com, we have the hottest new colors and the latest trends in scarves. Woven fabrics and crochet knit scarves are burning up the runways around the world, and we've got them in unique styles and colors just for you. Add one of these woven scarves to any outfit to create a romantic and distinctly feminine look. Order the hottest scarves of the season online, or place your order by phone by calling 1-877-755-4920 today.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.dress_gloves.meta_keywords: Dress gloves, dressy gloves, formal gloves
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.dress_gloves.meta_description: Your source for dress gloves, dressy gloves, and formal gloves.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.dress_gloves.page_title: Dress gloves, dressy gloves, formal gloves
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.dress_gloves.description:
Dress Gloves

Nothing says elegance like a beautiful pair of long gloves. It's not every day that you get to play dress up, so when you get the chance, why not go for it? At Greatlookz.com, we offer dress gloves in an assortment of colors, fabrics and lengths to match any dress and fit any occasion. Dress gloves were most popular in Victorian times, and the quality of a lady's gloves was indicative of her social status. Today, however, they are worn by anyone looking to add a touch of glamour and elegance to her outfit.

Gloves serve multiple purposes--they'll keep you warm, keep your hands clean, and they can even disguise unattractive hands (in the case of Vivien Leigh, who felt her hands weren't beautiful enough). If you're looking for something frilly and fun, we offer some of the most unique lace-trimmed dress gloves around. Lace is all the rage right now, and we've got plenty of it. Our elbow-length stretch lace gloves are always popular, and our red wrist-length gloves are sure to make a lasting impression.

If you're looking for a pair of show-stopping gloves, check out our shimmering metallic gloves in gold or silver. These 15-inch gloves are perfect for a theme party, or to match that special dress you've been dying to show off to the world. When you slip on these gloves, you can't help but turn heads.

We also sell a broad selection of classic dress gloves. Our smooth, matte finish opera-length gloves are the ultimate in elegance, and they come in classic colors such as ivory, black, white and red. Our collection of wrist-length satin gloves are perfect for an afternoon party, while our stretch elbow-length velvet gloves in classic black are perfect for a special night out on the town. Find out more about our collection of dress gloves and other fancy accessories by calling us today at 1-877-755-4920.

Coffee Mugs with Quotation of your choice:
Pick out your favorite quote and send it to us and we will have it printed on a nice, ceramic coffee mug. This is a great tool to motivate company personal. Pricing is $20 for the first mug and $15 for each additional mug. If you order more than 50 mugs, the price is $12 each.

Tee-Shirts with quotations:
What a wonderful way to express a favorite quote. Simply send us the quote you want and specify whether you want the quote on the front, back, or both sides and what color you want the lettering to be. Tee shirts are high quality cotton and available in small, medium, large, and extra large size. Please specify size. At this time, we only offer tee shirts in white, however we will soon offer pastel shades. Price for the first tee-shirt is $25 and each additional shirt (with the same quote) is only $20. If you order 50 copies or more, call for special quantity pricing.

ARIZONA/homepage.description4:
Time to Reduce Your Payments!

The average American gets a new mortgage every 5 to 7 years. Given today's historically low interest rates, why pay a higher rate for a 30-year fixed mortgage when you can pay a lower rate that better matches the length of time you'll keep your mortgage? You also have the option to lock your rate for another 5 years at any time during the initial fixed period, if and when your needs change.

USA Mortgage Stimulus Loan Program

Great Rates â With low rates and no rate buy downs, you could save thousands. Low Closing Costs â Unlike other banks, we don't have application charges, rate buy downs or other junk costs. See for yourself.

We can finance Canadian citizens purchasing residential property in Arizona.

Rates Guaranteed - Free 60 day rate guarantee for purchases and 30 days for refinances. To see how much you can save - Call Jeff Pordes at 800-254-9659 ext 133 or (602) 435-8762 direct for a no obligation consultation.

Mortgage Fee Comparison Chart:

Sample Rates and Payments:

For Loans over $250,000 and under $500,000

5/1 Program 75% LTV or less Interest Rate starts at 4.250% APR 4.911%

7/1 Program 75% LTV or less Interest Rate starts at 4.500% APR 4.761%

For Loans With Values of $500,000 or More:

5/1 Program 75% LTV or less Interest Rate starts at 5.000% APR 4.841%

7/1 Program 75% LTV or less Interest Rate starts at 5.250% APR 4.996%

Annual Percentage Rate based on a 30 year amortization of $500,000.

All Annual Percentage Rates include the cost of expenses paid at closing.

All the rates you see here are effective March 15, 2009 and can change without notice until you lock in your rate. Please remember, all loan applications are subject to credit and property approval as well as maximum loan limits.

Mortgage Banker Number: 0906537

.parosols.parasols.meta_keywords: Sun parasols, lace parasols, decorative parasols, victorian parasols
.parosols.parasols.description2:
Victorian parasols were derived from their Chinese counterparts in the middle of the 17th century in France and England. The original idea of the parasol was invented during the Wei Dynasty of Ancient China, though, more than 2,400 years ago. The western version was eventually called an umbrella by most people, but the term "parasol" today refers to the Victorian or Asian version of the umbrella, which is traditionally more feminine and more ornate.
 

At GreatLookz.com, we sell a wide variety of parasols from different cultures and time periods. We have replica Victorian parasols as well as Chinese and Japanese reproductions. Each is crafted with high-quality materials and are best used to shield skin from the rays of the sun, not the rain or wind due to their delicate lace or paper construction.
 

Our parasols come in a number of sizes. Our beautiful White Floral Lace Parasol comes in small (13 inches across), medium (20 inches across), and large (33 inches across). They are great for parties and feature nylon construction for surprising durability and convenient weatherproofing.
 

Our number one goal is to provide you with great customer service and items you just won't find anywhere else. We offer parasols of every shape, color, and design, and can help you choose the one that is right for your needs. Whether it is for a costume, a wedding, an event, or just to have, our friendly fashion order representatives can help you pick out perfect Victorian parasols at 877-755-4920.

.urban_cowboy_hats.meta_keywords: Urban cowboy hats, red cowboy hats, leopard cowboy hats, zebra hat, straw hat, Victorian hat, funky cowboy hats
.urban_cowboy_hats.description2:
Womens Cowboy Hats

Cowboy hats originated in the wild west of the United States as a means to keep the heads of cowboys cool while out working in the hot sun. They have different styles, including the Stetson, cattleman, and ten-gallon. They are usually made of felt or suede materials, and are valued best when "broken in," or when they've achieved a worn in look.

Cowboy hats are very trendy for the upcoming year, with variations on the traditional theme being created by many designers. These include color variants, including bright pinks and blues, as well as material varieties, like leather, microsuede, and straw. The sizes are typical, though, with a four to six inch brim being the standard.

When it comes to women's cowboy hats, there is no better place to shop than GreatLookz.com. We literally have dozens of cowboy hats in all kinds of materials, fits, shapes, and colors to choose from, and we encourage you to browse our extensive collection.

Square dancers and country line dancers are often looking for fun and inventive cowboy hats to add to their collections. For anyone who square dances, you know how important it is that your outfit be original and eye catching, especially in competitions. We offer such a wide variety of hats that you just might find a hat for every one of your outfits.

Shop online with us and discover our grand selection of women's cowboy hats for yourself. There is no end to the variety, and you'll find multiple colors, styles and prints, including leopard print, zebra print, cow print, fuzzy hats, sequin trim, and more. Please feel free to call us if you have questions about hat sizes or ordering at 877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.paper_paraso.description:
Paper Parasols

When most of us think of parasols, we think of Victorian ladies sipping tea at garden parties. Victorian beauties had multiple reasons for carrying parasols, however; not only were they fashionable, but they also helped ladies maintain their fair complexions. A fair complexion was a sign of refinement, and an indication that a woman didn't have to work outdoors. Parasols were so popular that women of the day often had them custom-made to match each of their different outfits.

Women in Japan use parasols to protect themselves from the damaging rays of the hot summer sun. Over time, these women begin to demand more colorful and fashionable parasols, starting a trend that spread throughout the world. Japanese parasols often feature dramatic and beautiful floral patterns.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer paper parasols for special events and for everyday use. Our purple Chinese paper parasol with butterfly beading is colorful, whimsical and fun. The white wooden handle is as sturdy as it is stylish. If you really want to turn heads, our black ostrich-trimmed parasol is bright and bold. A traditional Chinese paper parasol, this unique accessory is trimmed with luxurious black ostrich feathers, making it a dramatic statement for any occasion.

If you're looking for a fun accessory for a wedding or a garden party, check out our selection of paper parasols in assorted colors. Our solid white parasol with pink beaded fringe adds a soft touch and an elegant look for weddings and tea parties. Give us a call at 1-877-755-4920, and we'll help you find the right parasol and other accessories for your next big event.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.prom_tiaras.description:
Prom Tiaras

Whenever a young girl wants to dress up like a princess, the first thing she reaches for is her tiara. Tiaras, also historically known as diadems, are decorated headdresses historically associated with royalty. In modern times, tiaras are fashionable hair accessories that many young women love to wear to the prom.

Fashioned from a wire base, tiaras are then encrusted with crystals, jewels, and precious gems. For the typical prom attendee, these will be created stones that are much less expensive than the royal tiaras worn by the Egyptians in ancient times or the royal women of the Napoleonic era. They can reach a few inches high or be a modest one inch high, depending on the amount of drama you want to create in your look.

At GreatLookz.com, we offer all kinds of tiaras for prom goers who want to feel like a princess for a day. Tiaras typically are designed to raise up in the middle and taper off on the sides, and this is standard for most of the ones we offer as well. Our heart-shaped tiara is centered around a heart encrusted with crystals and adorning curves of crystals along the sides of the heart.

Our Royal Princess tiara is not quite as high, with a sophisticated design that complements any hair style. There is no one way to wear your hair with a tiara, and experts agree that wearing your hair down is just as acceptable as pulled back when sporting one of these fabulous prom accessories. If you have any questions about our tiaras, feel free to give us a call at 877-755-4920--we're here to help!

To purchase prom tiaras click on the greatlookz logo shown below: Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.girls_gloves.description:
Girls Gloves

Little girls love playing dress up, and they have plenty of opportunities throughout their lives. Accessories make a big impact, too--wearing gloves, hats and jewelry can truly turn an ordinary outfit into a memorable one. It can be hard to find children's sizes in gloves, especially formal gloves. While some companies only offer adult sizes, Greatlookz.com offers special gloves for smaller hands.

Whether you want lace gloves for a flower girl or full-length gloves for a costume, your little girl is sure to love the selection of gloves from Greatlookz.com. Gloves call to mind the regal style of princesses and queens of the past, which is why so many little girls want to wear them. Gloves are great for Halloween dress-up parties, and they're ideal for special school performances and extracurricular activities like dance recitals and theatrical productions.

Since crochet and lace are all the rage this year, we've made sure to keep plenty of different gloves in stock featuring these fabrics and designs. If you're looking for wrist-length gloves, our dainty crochet gloves for girls and our lace gloves for girls are both quite popular.

If you're looking for longer gloves for more formal events, we've got those too. We offer shimmering white dressy elbow length satin gloves and our long lace gloves in white or ivory. Of course, you want your little girl to stay young forever, but letting her dress up just like you will create lasting memories for you both. To order our girls' gloves, call 1-877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_veil.description:
Wedding Veils

Wedding veils became popular in times long past, when arranged marriages were common. Their purpose was to hide the bride from her husband (who she had probably never even seen before) until they were married and he then "took" her as his own. Nowadays, veils are simply a pretty tradition.

There are tons of veils on the market to choose from--we should know, we carry many of them! So where do you start? Here's a helpful guide to finding the right veil for you.

Don't wait until you've purchased your gown. Start trying on veils the minute you try on dresses--ones loads of tulle, one layer of tulle, ones with pearls, flowers, embroidery, and satin. This way, you'll know from the beginning what styles of veils look good on you and which ones don't, regardless of the dress you choose. If possible, try to wear your hair the way you will for the wedding (at least up or down) when trying veils on so that you have an idea of how it will really look.

Also, get to know the classifications of veils. Fingertip veils end (not surprisingly!) at your fingertips and can be simple or fancy. Short blusher veils end at the shoulders, while a mantilla is a Spanish-inspired delicate veil, and you might also try a ballet or waltz veil, which ends at your ankles. Similar to jewelry, veils should be kept simple during day ceremonies and can be more formal the later the wedding is.

Once you've found your dress, narrow down your veil choice to the one that complements your dress and doesn't hide any of its gorgeous detail. For example, if you have a stunning backless dress, you may not want to choose a long, three-layer veil that will obscure the back. As a general rule, the more elaborate the dress, the simpler the veil and vice versa.

If you have questions, give us a call at 877-755-4920. We have a staff of friendly representatives waiting to help you place your order. We love speaking to our customers and look forward to speaking with you.

.wedding__tiaras__veils.accessories.description2:
Bridal Accessories

If you've ever planned a wedding, you know that an incredible amount of detail goes into the process. Just when you think you've got all the bases covered, another detail crops up at the last minute. If you're looking to find all your wedding accessories in one easy place, Greatlookz.com can help.

Few accessories are as important as the bridal bouquet. Bouquets have come a long way since Victorian times, when brides chose flowers based on their traditional sentimental meaning. Some bouquets, such as the concentrically circled Biedermeier, have gone out of fashion. Others, such as nosegays, remain popular for casual brides and bridal attendants.

Rather than spending a great deal of money on flowers that wilt and fade over time, consider buying a bouquet of amazingly realistic silk flowers. At Greatlookz.com, our customers rave about our stunning bouquet of ivory roses and hydrangeas. Mixed together in simple elegance, these flowers leave a lasting impression.

Your wedding night is undeniably special, as it kicks off the rest of your life as man and wife. If you want to give him a sight to remember, check out our three-piece bridal lingerie set. This set features a strapless camisole, elegant white thigh high stockings, and a matching veil. This set is the perfect gift for wedding showers as well.

Dressing up for your big day can be an overwhelming process. At Greatlookz.com, we've thought of everything. We offer everything from elegant beaded bridal purses to beautifully trimmed items for bridesmaids and family members alike. We even offer special gifts for wedding guests, such as adorable white parasols for the tables at the reception. Find out more by browsing our website, or by calling 1-877-755-4950.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_petti.meta_description: Your source for long bridal petticoats and short ones too!
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_petti.description:
Bridal Petticoats

Petticoats have been worn by women throughout history to give the impression of a smaller waist and to flatter the bustline. By 1585, petticoats were considered a fashion staple by society ladies. The petticoat received a boost in sales in 1947, thanks to designer Christian Dior who helped to popularize the full-skirted look associated with the 1950s. Today, petticoats are still quite popular among women looking to create a classic and timeless look for their wedding day.

When it comes to selecting a petticoat to wear under your wedding gown, it's important to consider the length of your dress. The last thing you want to do is buy a petticoat that's too short, creating an unusual poof in your gown. If you buy a petticoat that's too long, you also run the risk of revealing it during dances and other movements.

If you're looking for a petticoat to give your dress more volume, it's a good idea to find one with multiple tiers. Some women prefer petticoats that feature tiers throughout, while other women prefer petticoats with tiers at the bottom. The placement of the tier determines where you will add volume to the overall look of your wedding dress.

At Greatlookz.com, we specialize in providing brides-to-be with everything they need to plan their weddings. We offer petticoats and lingerie for that special day, as well as exciting and unique bridal shower gifts for all those happily-ever-after days. When it comes to petticoats, our ruffled sheer crystalline petticoat is our best-selling item. You can view our entire collection online, or call us today at 1-877-755-4920 to place your order.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.hand_held_fa.meta_description: The Victorian era was all about decorum.  Attending something as basic as a garden party or a tea party required the right dress, gloves, hats, and above all else, the right manners.  When many of us think of Victorian-era parties, we think of women waving delicate hand-held fans.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.hand_held_fa.description:
Hand Held Fans

The Victorian era was all about decorum. Attending something as basic as a garden party or a tea party required the right dress, gloves, hats, and above all else, the right manners. When many of us think of Victorian-era parties, we think of women waving delicate hand-held fans.

Since it was often inappropriate for a young woman to speak openly with a young man, hand-held fans became the primary tool for flirtatious communication. If a woman wanted to say, "Follow me," she'd fan in front of her face with her right hand. Fanning with the left hand in front of the face was a way of saying, "Leave me alone." Drawing the fan across the forehead was a way of saying, "We're being watched."

The next time you attend a garden party, impress your friends with your knowledge of the secret language of hand-held fans. You can impress them even more by selecting a beautiful hand-held fan from Greatlookz.com.

Feather fans are a soft and graceful way to add elegance to a soiree. Our most popular fan, our marabou feather fan, features soft feathers in an assortment of different colors including pink, white, lavender, ivory and purple. For more information or help finding accessories for your next event, give us a call at 1-877-755-4920. Remember--be careful where you rest your fan. Resting it on your right cheek means "yes," while the left check means "no."

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_fo.meta_keywords: Plus Size Evening Dresses,Plus Size Formal Dresses,Plus Size Formal Wear
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_fo.meta_description: For plus size formal gowns, there are several key design elements that can help increase the fit of your dress as well as hide "trouble areas." One great rule to follow is to try to minimize large busts and accentuate the waistline for an hourglass figure. An ideal garment that will help you achieve this look is a corset. In vintage or modern designs, corsets work to support the chest while pulling in the waist, literally shaving off inches from your visible waist.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_fo.description:
Plus Size Formal Dresses

For plus size formal gowns, there are several key design elements that can help increase the fit of your dress as well as hide "trouble areas." One great rule to follow is to try to minimize large busts and accentuate the waistline for an hourglass figure. An ideal garment that will help you achieve this look is a corset. In vintage or modern designs, corsets work to support the chest while pulling in the waist, literally shaving off inches from your visible waist.

To hide your arms, you can wear a shawl in the same fabric and color as your formal dress. This can help you in a number of areas. A shawl can be worn over the shoulders to hide the upper arm area, or around the mid-section to disguise the tummy. This accent will also add flair to your outfit and increase your elegance and grace.

We offer tea party dresses, prom dresses, bridesmaid dresses and more for plus size women at GreatLookz.com. Each dress comes in an array of colors and we have a style that suits every body type. For those with large thighs, we have gowns that allow for "flow" below the waist to hide your trouble section. As well, for women with large bustlines, we offer v-neck dresses with supportive tops and corset designs for snug fits and an elegant overall look.

Our website is available 24/7, 365 days a year for online ordering and sizing. If you ever have any questions, feel free to call us at 877-755-4920. We love speaking to our customers, and our fashion experts can help you choose the style and size that is best suited for your individual needs.

.scarves_shawls.longscarves.meta_keywords: long scarf, long scarves, long silk scarves, long polyester scarf, coat scarf
.scarves_shawls.longscarves.meta_description: Your source for long scarves and elegant shawls in wool and silk.
.scarves_shawls.longscarves.description2:
Shawl Wraps

This year is all about mixing patterns. Solid silks with patterned shoes or accessories are what all the designers are previewing for this year's fashions. There's no better way to do this than to match your semi-formal or formal dress with a shawl wrap.

At GreatLookz.com, we sell matching shawls for many of our gowns in the same fabric and color as the dresses we carry. We also feature a la carte shawls that come in a variety of colors, designs, and fabrics. When paired with a simple black or red dress, these shawls make an ordinary outfit stunning.

They can be worn in a number of ways, and should be draped according to your body type. If you have a large chest or you're self-conscious about your arms, it's best to wrap the shawl around your shoulders and tie it in the front. Or, you can rest it on the napes of your elbows and pull it up to the bustline, wrapping the excess fabric around your forearms for security.

If your bottom half is your "trouble area," then you might want to wrap the shawl around your hips or stomach. Draped diagonally across either area and tied on the side will hide any figure flaws easily and gracefully. Unless you're ultra-daring, avoid tying a bow in the front or back of your dress or anywhere but on the side. Bows attract attention, so make sure to keep them in places you want to get noticed. For questions on these scarves or our other products, call us anytime during business hours at 877-755-4920.

.pantyhose__tights__thigh_highs.meta_keywords: sexy hosiery,pantyhose,thigh high stockings,fishnet,lace tops, back seams,zebra,exotic patterns,floral prints,animal prints,goth lace,bridal lace,queen sizes,nylons,thigh highs
.pantyhose__tights__thigh_highs.description2:
Plus Size Hosiery

Hosiery trends have changed over the years, and this year promises to bring lots of new styles to the forefront in lingerie and undergarments. Stocking, socks, hose, and other forms of hosiery should definitely be a consideration for your new outfits for the next season. Whether dressy or casual, hosiery can be worn by any woman who wants to feel sexy and put-together.

For plus size women, hosiery has presented problems in the past. These include poor fit, poor construction, and few sizes available for larger women. One trend in hosiery for women of larger sizes (and all sizes, for that matter) is fabulous fishnets. They give plus size women freedom from flimsy hose and add style and grace to all kinds of clothing choices.

Experiencing a resurgence since their mid-1980s popularity, fishnets are once again sexy and sophisticated. For the larger lady, fishnets provide sheer coverage without the feeling of being unsupported. You can wear these gorgeous hose and feel like you're covered yet sexy at the same time. They can be worn in a work setting under a long skirt for a peek of fun, or they can be worn going out with a skirt or even the longer, cuffed shorts that keep cropping up in this year's spring and summer lines.

At GreatLookz.com, we feature hosiery in all sizes, so you can find just what you're looking for. We also offer elegant stockings, thigh highs, tights, and patterned hosiery. Our bobby socks collection is flirty and whimsical, with styles in every taste. You will also enjoy perusing our selection of bridal hosiery if you're getting married or just want something different for a modern Goth look. Shop online or give us a call today at 877-755-4920.

.redhatszzz.meta_keywords: Pink hats,pink hat society,pink socks,cowboy hats,satin corset
.redhatszzz.meta_description: Greatlookz: A wide selection of pink hats for a Pink Hat Society, including pink bobby socks, pink cowboy hats, pink clothing, pink satin corsets, pink accessories, pink satin gloves, and more!
.redhatszzz.description2:
The Pink Hat Society is a fun and growing organization, designed for women under 50 to be a part of a social group that operates on fun and camaraderie. Affiliated with the Red Hat Society (for women over 50), the Pink Hatters are often identified by their elegant and even outrageous pink hats and other fabulous pink paraphernalia.

Until their 50th birthdays, these junior members must wear pink hats and lavender dresses. Upon the magical birthday, they graduate into red hats and purple dresses. Until then, Pink Hatters abound at every age. They wear pink hats, feather boas, pins, and more. The main goal of the Red and Pink Hat Societies is fun, so the more you can express your personality with your hats and accessories, the better! You can be a true individual with your own mix of pink hats. These hats can be worn at social functions, organization events, or simply around town to announce your affiliation.

When it comes to fun pink hats for ladies, GreatLookz.com is the only place to shop. We carry a huge variety of Victorian, modern, funky, and traditional "church" style pink hats. In all fabrics and styles, we can provide you and your whole group with amazing hats for every occasion. For your pink hat events, we even sell pink hat decorative note cards to be used as invites, place cards, or thank you notes. If you ever have any questions about our pink hats or other merchandise, feel free to call us toll-free at 877-755-4920. We look forward to hearing from you.
.redhatszzz.page_title: Pink Hats for the Pink Hat Society  Pink Socks, Pink Cowboy Hats, Pink Clothing, Pink Satin Corsets, Pink Accessories

.z.greatfoodz.1.description:
Looking for delicious unusual foods, delectable specialty foods, or mouth-watering gourmet foods? Youve come to the right place. Greatfoodz.com!

Greatfoodz carries a delightful variety of gourmet jams, jellies, and preserves, including raspberry peach champagne jam, cinnamon pear jelly, and jalapeno peach pecan preserves, apple butter, lemon curd, chai tea marmalade, and many more.

Have you ever wondered what the difference is between jam and jelly? Jelly is a clear bright mixture made from fruit juice, sugar and often pectin. Jam is a thick puree mixture of fruit, sugar and often pectin. Both are scrumptious. What is the difference between preserves and marmalades? Preserves are almost identical to jam, but has chunks of fruit. Jam is a thick puree mixture of fruit, sugar and often pectin. Marmalade is similar to a preserve, but usually contains citrus fruit rind. And jelly is a clear bright mixture made from fruit juice, sugar and often pectin. Click on the title of each item to see a full description. Enjoy the mouth-watering variety at Greatfoodz.com!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.top_hats.meta_description: Since the late Middle Ages and the Renaissance periods, top hats (or high hats) for men have been fashionable as formal attire. Top hats experienced a slowing of favor in the 18th century for a time. However, the introduction of the stove pipe top hat (think Abraham Lincoln) changed this, and top hats have remained popular to this day.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.top_hats.description:
Top Hats

Since the late Middle Ages and the Renaissance periods, top hats (or high hats) for men have been fashionable as formal attire. Top hats experienced a slowing of favor in the 18th century for a time. However, the introduction of the stove pipe top hat (think Abraham Lincoln) changed this, and top hats have remained popular to this day.

In the early centuries, a top hat signaled to other men and women that the wearer meant business--that he were a serious, on-the-level fellow. Now, top hats are a symbol of an occasion, such as a wedding, a prom, or even a historical reenactment. They are still considered "formal" attire and can really complete a tux or period costume like no other accessory.

Of course, the styles have been modified a bit, but the basic top hat is still around. At GreatLookz.com, we offer historical top hats as well as modern versions for your shopping convenience. For Victorian clubs and reenactments, we provide our Prince Charles Wool Felt top hat in black. Different from the modern top hat because of its rolled brim, this hat is made of 100 percent heavy wool and grosgrain on the band and trim. It is available in large only, which is approximately 24 inches around the inside.

Our modern classic top hats include our traditional Black Felt Top Hat and Deluxe Black Felt Top Hat. Both are constructed completely from heavy wool and have a classic grosgrain trim and band. The Deluxe, however, sports a red quail feather and a white silk satin inner lining for an extra touch of class and elegance. You can browse all our top hats online and place your order via the Web or by phone at 877-755-4920.

.apparel.formals.page_title: Formal Gowns and Dresses , wedding dresses in plus sizes
.apparel.formals.description2:
Red Formal Dresses.

Who needs a little black dress when you've got a little red dress? Fashion trends are changing, and this year, the little red dress is totally in style for every body type. Whether it's the prom, a wedding, or afternoon tea, a red dress is a must for the upcoming seasons.

You'll be stunned at how versatile a red dress can be all throughout the year and at any type of event. Whether an a-line, flouncy, mermaid, or halter style dress, the color red truly adds a heightened sense of elegance to any cut or fabric. Halters are flattering for plus size women, while mermaid shapes give thin women an hourglass figure instantly.

As well, the color allows you versatility in your accessories. For spring and summer, the trend is to wear non-coordinating shoes with bright colors and patterns. So, if you have a red dress, you can wear virtually any color shoe from black to brown to pink or orange if you want to. It's all about infusing your individual style with a standard classic. And for this year and many more to come, the little red dress is definitely the staple to add to your wardrobe.

At GreatLookz.com, we keep up on all the latest trends happening in fashion. This includes dress styles and accessories, and so we've bulked up on our stock stylish red dresses for every occasion. We have tea length and full length dresses in dozens of sizes to fit all our customers across the world. For more information, give us a call at 877-755-4920 or shop our collection of red dresses online.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_corse.meta_description: Although corsets aren't worn on a daily basis anymore, they are still an important part of a bride's ensemble.  For centuries, corsets were required for royalty and nobility in Europe.  In Victorian and Edwardian times, fashionable women wanted waists that measured between 16 inches and 20 inches.  Today's corsets aren't designed to achieve the wasp-waisted look popular in the early 20th century; instead, they are part of a special way to celebrate the wedding day.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_corse.page_title: Bridal corsets, plus size bridal corsets
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_corse.description:
Bridal Corsets

Although corsets aren't worn on a daily basis anymore, they are still an important part of a bride's ensemble. For centuries, corsets were required for royalty and nobility in Europe. In Victorian and Edwardian times, fashionable women wanted waists that measured between 16 inches and 20 inches. Today's corsets aren't designed to achieve the wasp-waisted look popular in the early 20th century; instead, they are part of a special way to celebrate the wedding day.

Many brides like the idea of hiding something special under their wedding dresses. Corsets also serve a practical purpose. This sexy lingerie helps to improve posture, and makes the blushing bride look slim and sleek in her wedding dress. Corsets can also create attractive decolletage, and eliminate unsightly rolls caused by pantyhose or strapless bras.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer a wide selection of satin corsets and fancy lingerie for your wedding day, your honeymoon, and for your life afterwards. If you're looking for a strapless corset, our pink Edwardian satin corset is one of our most popular items. With an exquisite floral tapestry design and an adjustable lace up back, this little number is sure to drive any man wild.

If you're looking for a sophisticated white corset for your wedding day, our white Edwardian corset comes with a matching g-string and detachable garters. You're sure to look your very best with this form-fitting and form-flattering number. Our satin floral jacquard corset set is another popular choice for wearing under more formal wedding gowns. You can find out more about these items (and the rest of our selection of bridal accessories) by calling us directly at 1-877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.linen_handke.description:
Linen Handkerchief

If you're looking for a way to add a soft touch to your everyday business suits, a linen handkerchief is a great accent piece. For years, men have expressed their style and taste through the handkerchiefs placed in the breast pockets of classic business suits. Working women can add a soft touch to their business suits as well with a fancy linen or lace-trimmed handkerchief.

There are plenty of different ways to fold a handkerchief. To create a three-point fold, take the handkerchief and fold it in half diagonally. Next, fold the left corner over to the right, and then the left corner over the right corner. Finally, fold the bottom half up and under, and tuck it into the breast pocket.

If you want to create a softer look, try folding your handkerchief into a reverse puff. Begin by holding the handkerchief in the center with the points facing down. Then, with your free hand pinch the handkerchief at the midpoint. Now all you have to do is fold the bottom half up and behind, and place the handkerchief in your breast pocket. The resulting fold looks delicate, like a flower.

Vintage-inspired linen handkerchiefs are all the rage this year, as fashion takes a turn back to romance and classic elegance. No other handkerchief fabric holds its shape quite like linen. If you want a vintage look with a crisp new flair, Greatlookz.com offers a selection of beautifully detailed linen handkerchiefs from which to choose. Give us a call at 1-877-755-4920 to order yours today!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_we.meta_description: Weddings are magical events. The best part of the ceremony is always when the beautiful bride comes walking down the aisle. For many brides, though, this is the scariest part as well! To feel and look your best, you want to make sure that your dress is elegant and classy, with a hint of your own style.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_we.description:
Plus Size Wedding Dresses

Weddings are magical events. The best part of the ceremony is always when the beautiful bride comes walking down the aisle. For many brides, though, this is the scariest part as well! To feel and look your best, you want to make sure that your dress is elegant and classy, with a hint of your own style.

There are many styles and fabrics to choose from: strapless, halter, a-line, empire waist, satin, silk, tulle, chiffon, and more. For larger women, covering the upper arm area is often a concern, so a shawl or gown with sleeves might also be an option. The key thing to remember is that your dress should accent your best features and hide those you aren't so happy with. For example, if you like your arms but not your thighs, a strapless gown with a full skirt is a prime option.

At GreatLookz.com, we work tirelessly to offer our customers great wedding gowns in sizes up to 44. Many retailers and designers don't carry sizes much above a 20, which we believe is unfair and unnecessary. We cater to our gorgeous plus size customers and believe that a bride can look stunning in any size!

Our wedding gown selection includes our L'Amour Satin A-line formal as a classic example of a stunning wedding gown. It features an eye-catching box neckline and a superb train for added drama. Available in 24 different sizes, we can find you the perfect size for your body.

We advise that all brides-to-be get properly measured before ordering, though, as these gowns are custom-created on an individual basis and cannot be returned or exchanged. Give us a call toll-free at 877-755-4920 and we can talk you through your decision. We know that your wedding day is one of the most important days of your life, and we want to make sure your wedding dress is memorable and stylish.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_veils.meta_description: Your source for bridal veils and tiaras
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_veils.description:
Bridal Veils And Tiaras

Your wedding day is one of the most important days of your life. Many women are photographed more on their wedding day than any other day in their lives. Selecting the right accessories is as important as anything else you do on your special day. The bridal veil is the oldest wedding tradition, dating back to Roman times. Back then, brides wore bright yellow veils, called flammeums. Over time, the yellow veil has been replaced by much more flattering bridal veils, elegant tiaras, and gorgeous floral headpieces.

One of the hottest trends in wedding attire is mixing in a splash of color with traditional wedding whites. Experts recommend mixing in color in unexpected places. A splash of color is a great way to express your fun side while maintaining the integrity and pristine look of traditional white.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer a wide selection of traditional and trend-setting bridal veils and tiaras. If you're looking to incorporate a bold splash of color, we recommend our exquisite three-tier tulle veil. This item is available in ivory or white with red accents. If you're looking for a more traditional veil, our one layer ivory tulle wedding veil is a popular choice for brides of all ages. This veil features an elegant white satin trim, giving you a textured look without adding bright colors.

Another popular trend in wedding attire is diamond or rhinestone hair accessories. Slip on our heart-shaped tiara, featuring solid rhinestones, or our royal princess and queen rhinestone tiara for a regal and sophisticated look. If you have any questions, you can reach us directly during business hours by calling 1-877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.guest_towels.description:
Guest Towels

Guest towels not only make your house guests feel special and welcome, but they also help to set the tone for the style of your bathroom. Guest towels fall into that special category of form and function. They're really out on display for everyone to look at, but more often than not they end up getting used as well.

If you're like millions of women, you like to change up your guest towels on a regular basis. Sometimes we just end up getting bored with the same old towels hanging in the bathroom, day in and day out. Guest towels are affordable enough to replace often, and they come in so many different styles you can't help but experiment with color and style. It's fun to switch out towels with the seasons--brighten up for spring, darken down for fall and winter.

Guest towels are also the perfect gift for bridal showers. If you're looking for a small token of appreciation, guest towels are always a hit. Also, if you're looking to sell your home, real estate agents recommend replacing your guest towels to give your bathroom a fresh, sparkling new look. Decorate for any event with holiday-themed guest towels.

At Greatlookz.com, we know value is as important to you as style, and we offer you both in one easy online location. You can place orders online or call us directly at 1-877-755-4920.

.wedding__tiaras__veils.plus_size_dresse.description2:
Plus Size Teen Prom Dresses

For teenagers, the prom is the quintessential "coming out" party, the most anticipated night of the year. For many young women, it is also the first real chance at dressing for a formal event, and there are a few things to consider. First, experts in the fashion industry suggest that every woman be measured properly before choosing the size for your dress. Even one half-size too small can make you look larger than you are, so keep this in mind when shopping.

As well, it is important to dress to match your skin tone. Choose from dresses in a variety of colors from ivory and light blue to burgundy and black to see what works for you. All of these colors accent skin types differently.

For example, fairer-skinned girls generally look better in medium tones, avoiding dark blacks (they will make you look paler) and pale, pale pastels (they will often wash you out). Bright medium colors like blues, reds, and neutrals are great. Darker-skinned girls can wear almost anything from black to ivory, but should typically avoid neutrals (beige, cream, etc.), as they are too bland for this skin tone and will make skin look sallow. At GreatLookz.com, we know how important the prom is and we work hard to provide you with the most stylish, affordable dresses around. We offer spaghetti straps, halters, mermaids, v-necks, and more, all custom made. For plus size teens, we also know that finding the right fit for your dress is very important. We offer sizes up to 44, so you don't have to worry about not finding your size. Give us a call at 1-877-755-4920 for sizing help.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.gambler_hats.description:
Gambler Hats

There's just something about wearing a hat that makes us all feel more flirty and sassy. Etiquette expert Emily Post once said, "It is impossible for a hatless woman to be chic." While the rules of hat etiquette have changed over the years, they're still as fun as ever. If you're looking for a hat that's as versatile as it is frivolous, you can't go wrong with a gambler hat.

A gambler hat is a great way to pull together any look, and it's the ultimate costume accessory if you're trying to dress the part. If you're attending a western-themed party or a poker party, just toss on a gambler hat and you're ready to roll. Go for a classic black gambler hat, or mix things up with a racy leopard print gambler hat for a wild night out on the town.

At Greatlookz.com, we know finding the right fit for a hat can be difficult. That's why we offer a selection of gambler hats with adjustable brims to help you modify your hat for fit and style. When you order from us, you never have to worry about returns or refunds because our hats fit every time.

A gambler hat is a fun way to express your personality, and it also allows you to spice up your outfit with impeccable style. If you have any questions about our products or you'd like to place your order with a live person, give us a call today at 1-877-755-4920.

Nous mettons à votre disposition des accessoires de mode difficiles à trouver sur le marché. Nous disposons à cet effet d’une grande sélection de gants formels pour vos mariages, bals divers, première communion, et toute sorte de cérémonies formelles ou de surprise partie. Dans notre collection, vous trouverez des gants en quatre longueurs et en 23 couleurs, des gants de luxe en coton, des gants élastiques et des gants de velours. Au nombre des personnes intéressées par ce type de gants, l’on peut citer les organisateurs de mariages, les troupes théâtrales, les compagnies de danse, les compagnies d'opéra et les magasins spécialisés dans la vente des vêtements pour mariés.

Notre gamme de chapeaux va des chapeaux les plus décontractés aux chapeaux cloches les plus recherchés. Nous avons également des chapeaux pour cowboy, des bérets, des chapeaux de paille, des chapeaux victoriens, des pare-soleil, des chapeaux de laine, des chapeaux de mariage, et des chapeaux décorés ici même pour les dames qui préfèrent les chapeaux de couleur rouge.
Pour ajouter un peu d'intérêt à vos mariages et à vos tea parties, nous disposons de nombreux parasols en dentelle et des parasols en nylon, avec de beaux éventails qui marient bien les couleurs choisies. Nous avons également en stock une gamme variée de mouchoirs en dentelle et de tabliers en dentelle très populaires.

Nous avons nos propres designs de gants, chapeaux, parasols, et socquettes sophistiquées produits par nos soins. Nous avons également la possibilité de confectionner des articles personnalisés, à la demande.

Nous vous invitons à visiter notre site web pour plus d’informations sur nos accessoires de mode pour femmes. Toutes les informations du site sont en anglais. En outre, toute correspondance doit se faire dans cette langue.

Cliquez ici pour entrer!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.fingerless_g.meta_description: Gloves have long been a staple in the fashion world.  In 1806, Napoleon was rumored to have owned more then 240 pairs.  During the early 1900s, New York actress and socialite Lillian Russell made quite an impression when she donned a pair of white opera length fingerless gloves as she rode her bike down Fifth Avenue.  Who could forget the '80s trend of lace fingerless gloves inspired by fashion icon and pop star Madonna?
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.fingerless_g.description:
Fingerless Gloves

Gloves have long been a staple in the fashion world. In 1806, Napoleon was rumored to have owned more then 240 pairs. During the early 1900s, New York actress and socialite Lillian Russell made quite an impression when she donned a pair of white opera length fingerless gloves as she rode her bike down Fifth Avenue. Who could forget the '80s trend of lace fingerless gloves inspired by fashion icon and pop star Madonna?

Fingerless gloves can be used for special events, costume parties and more. At Greatlookz.com, we offer plenty of styles and colors of fingerless gloves for formal occasions and all those times when you just feel like dressing up or doing something a little different with your look. If you're going for the Material Girl look, pick up a pair of fingerless fishnet gloves from Bum Equipment, or a pair of half-finger wrist length lace gloves.

Fingerless gloves are also quite popular for wedding attire. Our delicate wrist-length gauntlet-style gloves with woven lace edges are as elegant as they are sophisticated. If you're attending a special event, long fingerless gloves add a touch of class to any look.

We want to help you push the envelope when it comes to creating fun fashion. If you want to make a lasting impression, turn heads with a pair of our exclusive fingerless satin gloves with feathers. Make them do a double take when you show up in a pair of our 15-inch stretch lace gauntlet-style gloves at your next formal event. Order online or over the phone, at 1-877-755-4920.

Round Hat Boxes

Hats are a great investment. Not only do they display your individual style and fashion sense, but they are also functional in that they protect your skin from the rays of the sun! Since they help to protect you, it's important that you protect them when they are not in use.

At GreatLookz.com, we sell a range of round hat boxes in which you can store your hats, accessories, or knick-knacks. We have made these boxes beautiful and stylish, so that your hat storage can be just as interesting as the hats themselves. Stack them up for an impromptu nightstand, or simply keep your closet organized.

If you're a red hat lady, we've got a special deluxe designer red hat-themed box collection that features the famous logo. The largest of these boxes is 17 inches across, so even your largest hat can easily be housed inside. We also feature slick red hat boxes with a shiny cherry red exterior and extra large diameter for optimal storage space, as well as classic white round hat boxes. Our prices for these boxes are affordable, allowing you to complete your whole collection for a reasonable total. As well, our hat boxes are well-constructed and very durable, so they can protect your hats for many years to come.

Don't let dust, moths, and sun damage ruin your hat investment. Whether you have one hat or a dozen hats, protecting them is a very easy and important thing to do with our fabulous round hat boxes from GreatLookz.com. You can shop online and pay over our secure connection or give us a call directly at 877-755-4920.

.dressy_gloves.satin_gloves.meta_keywords: Satin Gloves, satin fingerless gloves, satin opera gloves, satin short gloves,
.dressy_gloves.satin_gloves.meta_description: Your source for satin gloves in every style and color.
.dressy_gloves.satin_gloves.description2:
Satin Gloves

Satin gloves exemplify the timeless elegance and grace that has been a hallmark of high fashion in any era. While the 1800s saw a proliferation of gloves worn by women, this tradition faded by the 20th century. However, in formal wear, gloves have been and will always be a stunning mark of class and refinement.

Whether you want to wear gloves for a wedding, prom, cocktail event, or even just as an innovative fashion statement with jeans, we've got you covered. At GreatLookz.com, we specialize in offering these sorts of hard to find accessories, so you'll find a wide variety of gloves of all lengths. We stock a large number of items so that you always have something to choose from.

When choosing your size for gloves, it is important to know how they are measured. Gloves are typically classified by length in buttons (even though modern gloves use spandex as a rule now instead of buttons!). The most popular lengths are one-button, two-button, six-button, eight-button, and sixteen-button.

To give you an idea of what this means, one-button gloves are those that hit just below the palm of the hand, and eight-button falls just below the elbow (a typical prom glove). Sixteen button reaches all the way up to the top of the arm, and should be reserved for extremely formal occasions such as black-tie balls or wedding bridal wear.

We also offer fishnet, lace, nylon, and other gloves in varying styles. Shop online and see for yourself what kind of gloves spark your fancy. If you ever have any questions about sizing, styles, or availability, feel free to call our friendly customer service representatives at 877-755-4920.

.z.greatloanz.light_industrial_propertie.meta_keywords: Light Industrial Commercial loan programs,offers conduit office loans, small balance commercial office loans, and office building loans for single, mulit-tenant, and credit tenant properties
.z.greatloanz.light_industrial_propertie.meta_description: Your one source for all your commercial loan needs.  The only loan we can't do is the one you don't send me.
.z.greatloanz.light_industrial_propertie.description2:
Structured as a privately held independent commercial mortgage banking firm, USA Mortgage Corp. offers a diverse mix of commercial real estate loans to meet the individual borrowing needs and investment objectives of its borrowers, for both investment and owner-occupied commercial properties.

Conforming Commercial Loan Program

USA Mortgage Corp. is a conduit lender for conforming, owner-occupied - bank based - commercial loan program. However, unlike traditional banks, USA Mortgage Corp's commercial loans are funded with off-balance sheet assets, which means borrowers get the low fixed-rates of traditional bank lending with less restrictive underwriting guidelines, higher LTVs, and 30 year terms.

  • From $500,000 - $10,000,000
  • 25% or Greater Owner-Occupied or Non Owner Occupied Properties
  • Traditional Commercial Properties Only
  • 15, 20, 25, & 30 Year Amortizations
  • 3, 5, 10, 15, 30 Year Fixed Rates
  • Up to 80% LTV / 90% CLTV
  • Rates based upon 10 year Treasury Bills
  • No Balloons or Calls
  • Cash Out to 80% of Loan Amount
  • Fixed Declining Prepayment Minimal Impound Reserves
  • Full Document - Personal Recourse
  • Minimum 640 Credit Score
  • 3 Years of Historical Income Req.
  • Low Minimum 1.25 DSCR

    Conduit Office Loan Program Overview

    USA Mortgage Corp's Conduit Office Loan Program provides permanent fixed rate financing and suburban single tenant, multi-tenant, and credit tenant office properties. Office loans are available in most market sectors for stabilized properties with a demonstrated ability to re-lease at market rates.

    In addition to the office conduit loan program, We provide office commercial loans through its traditional commercial loan program. For office loan sizes under $1 million please visit our small balance plus office loan program.

    For single tenant or anchor tenant properties, lease terms should extend past the fixed term of loan.

    • Loan Size Loan sizes starting at $1 million
    • Pricing Tiered pricing based on LTV and DSCR
    • 110-155 above comparable "on the run" Treasury rates
    • Rate buy downs are available
    • Location Located in mid to large market sectors and small market sectors with strong sponsorship.
    • Loan Terms 5-20 year fixed terms with 25-30 year amortizations
    • Prepayment Defeasance
    • Personal Guarantees Non-recourse with standard carveouts
    • Minimum DSC 1.25
    • Loan-to-Value Maximum 80%
    • Rate Lock 30-day forward lock available with U/W approval
    • 2% commitment deposit credited at closing.
    • Occupancy Requirements Stabilized properties with staggered lease expirations.
    • Impounds Taxes, insurance, tenant improvements, replacement reserves,
    • 125% for needed repairs.
    • Preliminary Submission Package For a Conduit Office Loan: Include the following in your request for a conduit office building loan quote:

      • 1. Property description and location map
      • 2. Representative color photographs
      • 3. Current rent roll and year-to-date operating statement
      • 4. Operating history - prior 3 years, if available
      • 5. Current year operating budget
      • 6. Existing debt and cost basis
      • 7. Sponsor resume
.z.greatloanz.light_industrial_propertie.description: Light Industrial Commercial Loans in All 50 States

.z.finale_gloves.zsizing.description:
Button Length:

In the "glove world" the length of the glove from the base of the thumb at the wrist to the hem is measured in a term called "buttons" where one "button" equals about one inch. This word is a derivative of a French unit of measurement. In other words, a four-button glove is not decorated with four buttons, it is merely 4 inches from the base of the thumb to its hem.

Glove Sizing: To determine your glove size, you will need a measuring tape. Place the beginning of the tape on your index-finger knuckle and bring the tape across the other knuckles. Continue moving the tape arround the palm side of the hand until the tape touches the point where you got started. Do not include your thumb. Gently make a fist . The point where the tape now meets is your glove size.

Typically, women wear numerical sizes 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5 or 8 in leather styles. Fabric gloves with a high degree of stretch such as satin and velvet are " one size fits all" size. Other fabrice styles with a moderate abount of stretch such as cotton and silk styles range to sizes (A and B) with Size A fitting numerical had sizes 6 and 6.5 and Size B fitting had sizes 7, 7.5 and 8.

A fine leather glove should fit snugly and should not bag on the hand. Fine, soft glove leather will stretch with the hand. This is wherre the phrase " Fits like a glove" originated! When removing a glove, never pull on the cuff. Fold back the wrist of the glove and work it gently over your fingers.
