.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_wear.meta_description: Your source for bridal wear and accessories
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_wear.description:
Bridal Wear

When most of us think of traditional bridal wear, we think of white wedding dresses and soft pink bridesmaid gowns. These days, just about anything goes when it comes to walking down the aisle. As long as your style is consistent and you're comfortable in what you're wearing, you can get away with just about anything.

At Greatlookz.com, we specialize in helping women create lasting memories. No matter whether you're looking for a shorter wedding gown that's bold and daring, or you're looking for a lavish full gown that would make a Southern debutante blush with envy, we have what you're looking for. Unlike many other online bridal stores, we custom-design gowns for our customers. Our dresses are designed to fit your measurements, and we'll make alterations to ensure a perfect fit before we send your dress to you. The end result is a stunning, elegant, and form-fitting dress that fulfills the wedding fantasy you've always dreamed of.

If you're looking for bridesmaids' dresses, we can help with those, too. According to tradition, buying those matching bridesmaids' dresses actually helps to ward off bad luck. According to the tradition, wearing matching dresses that are similar to the bridal gown makes it more difficult for evil spirits to find the bride and put a hex on her.

When it comes time to plan your wedding, check out our selection of bridal gowns, bridesmaid dresses, and accessories online. If you need help with sizing or you just prefer to place your order with a live person, we always pick up the phone when you call. Give us a call today at 1-877-755-4920!

.fancy_bobby_socks.lacy_bobbly_socks.meta_keywords: fancy bobby socks, ruffle socks, lace ankle socks,toe socks fishnet knee highs, sexy ankle highs, frilly, lace, beaded, fishnet
.fancy_bobby_socks.lacy_bobbly_socks.meta_description: Greatlookz:   Your source for women's socks for all occasions.  Fancy bobby socks, sheer knee high nylon socks, lace ankle socks, toe socks, fishnet socks, ruffle socks, sexy black socks, and more.
.fancy_bobby_socks.lacy_bobbly_socks.page_title: Fancy lace trimmed bobby socks in all colors
.fancy_bobby_socks.lacy_bobbly_socks.description2:
Lace Socks

Most of us pull on our socks in the morning, and don't stop to think about how we came to wear them. In fact, the history of socks is long and varied. In ancient Rome, socks were called "soccus," shoes worn by comic actors. In marked contrast, 8th century barbarians often wore brightly colored socks into battle. One of the precursors to the fancy ankle socks worn today was something called "clocks." During the 17th century, "clocks" were embroidered decorations added to the ankle area of knee high hose.

If you're looking to make your mark in fashion history, you can't go wrong with a pair of lace socks. At Greatlookz.com, we offer the best selection of lace socks you'll find online. Express your punk rock style with our exclusive fishnet ankle socks with lace trim, or show off your softer side with our ivory socks with satin and lace trim. If you're looking for a splash of color, our lace trim jersey socks are one of our most popular items.

Our lace trimmed socks are a great gift for women of all ages, perfect for women who collect socks. Our selection is second to none. You can find everything from nylon socks with marabou fur trim to frilly black-and-white polka dot trim socks.

If you're looking for a pair of socks to match that special outfit, let us help you find them. Unlike many other online retailers, we answer the phone when you call us with your questions. For more information, call us today at 1-877-755-4920.
.fancy_bobby_socks.lacy_bobbly_socks.description: Fancy and frilly bobby socks can be made with any of our laces or beads.  If you do not see the combination you are looking for, just call us at 877-755-4920.

Fashion trends for this year's seasons focus on personal style with elegant flair. Vintage lace gloves can now be paired with a three-quarter sleeve jacket and jeans, and formal wear for women is returning to high-class elegance. For example, the halter top neckline is very in right now. This style gives women of all sizes a boost in support and offers flattering lines for the bust and upper arm area.

As well, gorgeous fabrics in rich colors are very in right now, including dresses that come in a variety of fabrics and bountiful colors like fuchsia, burgundy, light blue, crimson, hunter green, cobalt blue, and more. Silks, satins, and anything luxurious on the skin is the best option for proms, weddings, and cocktail parties as well. The cuts, by far, are closer to the body in areas like the chest and waist, but forgiving in the leg and backside areas.

Variety is key to finding a dress to match your style. So, we've stocked up on stunning gowns here at GreatLookz.com. Shop online with us and find a truly one-of-a-kind gown that is great for any type of occasion.

We also sell wedding gowns and bridesmaid dresses, so even your most formal event can be outfitted through our custom fitted stock. We love talk to our customers, so give us a call with any questions or concerns you have at any time. We can be reached toll-free at 877-755-4920.

.z.finale_gloves.silk_gloves.meta_keywords: silk gloves, free silk gloves, free, free gloves, bridal gloves, wedding gloves, wedding fashion, fashion gloves, wedding supplies, leather gloves, leather fashion, metis leather, satin gloves, silk gloves, silk lined, cotton gloves, velvet gloves
.z.finale_gloves.silk_gloves.meta_description: Your online source for fabulous silk ladies gloves.
.z.finale_gloves.silk_gloves.description2:
The Silk Lovers Collection Finale's silk glove collection is ideal for bridal and formal wear. Our exclusive silk material is 95% silk and 5% lycra. The 5% lycra provides a better fitting glove with smoother seams--without lycra the fingers would not fit and the seams would pucker. Our specialty mill in France manufacturers this fabulous, high-end fabric based on our glove requirements and exclusive specifications. SILK LOVERS are only found at Finale - no other silk glove line offers the delicate sewing, finishing and fine, quality French made material.

It is important to be aware that there is no such thing as pure white silk, therefore a white silk gown appears off white in color. A pure white cotton or satin glove will not match this color. As a result, Finale's SILK LOVERS color white is a perfect match for all white silk dresses and gowns!

SILK LOVERS gloves are featured in Barney's Vera Wang Boutiques, most Nordstrom stores and leading bridal salons throughout the entire world.

We would like to know the actual date you will be wearing the gloves so that you will not be disappointed with a late delivery. Please provide an accurate WEAR DATE that allows us enough handling time to process your order. Not everyone is wearing their new gloves tomorrow.

.z.greatloanz.1arequired_documents_list.description:
Property Purchase Checklist

Below is a list of items we will need for a Multi-family property purchase.

  • Section I: Property (items with *** will be collected from the seller/ agents)

    • Complete copies of all Current Leases***
    • Current Rent Roll (details unit #, tenant name, and rents for occupied and vacant units at a minimum)***
    • Current Year-to-Date plus previous 2 years subject property Income and Expense Statements ***
    • Current Year-to-Date plus previous 2 years subject property Capital
    • Improvements Summary (estimate of cost for each improvement is acceptable for initial stage of loan) *** If property has undergone any type of rehab or special circumstances that have had an effect on the net operating income in the previous three years, then please inform us of the details *** Contact for proposed Property Insurance Carrier (Please have to us at least 2 weeks prior to estimated close date)
    • Copy of the Purchase Contract plus all addendums ***
    • Copy of the Preliminary Title Agreement ***
    • Digital Pictures of the subject property (5 minimum); if property is located in Phoenix metro area, we will take. ***
    • Property will need to have a wood infestation report (termite report) completed. If an infestation is found, please have the inspecting company do the treatment. ***
    • Completed USA Mortgage property questionnaire (see forms below) ***
    • Property Management information (see forms below) USA Mortgage Corporation 4150 North 12th St. Phoenix, AZ 85014 Phone: 602-435-8762 Fax: 602-254-3446

    Section II: Borrower
    • Completed and Signed Application (see www.greatloanz.com website forms page)
    • Signed Credit Authorizations (see forms below)
    • Signed Form 4506-T (see forms below)
    • Patriot Act Requirements: Legible copy of each borrowers drivers license or state issued ID
    • Completed and signed Schedule of Real Estate Owned (see forms below)

    • If a 1031 exchange is involved, then we will need a copy of the final closing statement and a copy of the exchange letter (lists account balance and specific details for the exchange)
    • 2 months most recent liquid asset statements for all accounts to show funds to close plus reserves (If 2 months not available, please send what you have so we can send out verifications)
    • For W-2 employment, copies of 2004 and 2005 and 2006 W-2s and 1 months worth of most recent pay stubs (each borrower).
    • Copies of 2004, 2005 and 2006 filed Personal Federal Tax Returns (all pages, please sign page 2).
    • If you have a Schedule C Businesses listed on the Federal returns, we will need a Signed 2006
    • Year-to-Date Profit and Loss statement for the business (one for each listed). P&Ls can be as simple as income expenses = total or as detailed as you like. If the 2006 Federal returns are not attached, then we will also need a signed 2006 and 2007 profit and loss statement
    • If you have Schedule E Entities (Partnerships or Corporations) listed on the federal returns, we will need a Signed 2006 and 2007 Year-to-Date Profit and Loss statement for the entity (one for each). P&Ls can be as simple as income expenses = total or as detailed as you like.
    • If you plan to take title in an entity and not in your personal name, please let us know as soon as possible so we can get you a list of items we will need for the entity.

      This list should cover the bulk of the items needed on the file, so additional paperwork should be minimal.

      Please call Greg Burckle at 602-282-3804

      FORMS:

      Application

      Borrower Authorization #1 and #2

      Borrower Authorization #3

      Capital Improvements Worksheet

      Capital Improvements Worksheet#2

      Certificate of Good Standing Request (Arizona)

      Form 4506-T

      Form 8821

      Inital Loan Disclosure

      USA Mortgage Property Questionnaire (K101)

      Loan Purpose Letter

      Management Letter Requirements (K102)

      Payoff Statement

      Property Questionnaire #1

      Property Questionnaire #2

      Rent Roll

      Schedule of Real Estate

      Wood Infestation Report Requirements

.scarves_shawls.designerscarves.meta_keywords: Silk scarf,velvet scarf,print scarf,designer scarves,silk scarves,velvet scarves,animal print,hand painted,Thai,silk,velvet,satin
.scarves_shawls.designerscarves.meta_description: Greatlookz: Find the perfect scarf from a selection of designer scarves, silk scarves, velvet scarves, hand painted scarves, floral print scarves, jungle print scarves, and exotic animal print scarves
.scarves_shawls.designerscarves.description2:
Designer Scarves

Scarves are a unique fashion accessory--they can be casual or elegant, and instantly elevate a simple outfit (such as wide-leg trousers and a nautical-striped tee) into a look worthy of old Hollywood. Scarves can tie different colors and textures together, or they can unify your accessories. Pair a basic black dress with accessories featuring leopard print, for example, and suddenly "basic" feels a lot more exotic.

A designer scarf is the perfect accessory for dressing up any outfit. With one single accessory, you can create a variety of different looks. To create a simple yet effective look, lay your scarf open on a flat surface. Roll the fabric up from one end to the other in a flat fold, gathering about an inch of fabric at a time. Next, make sure the tag (if the scarf has one) is tucked in, and tie the scarf in a simple knot. Place the knot at the side of your neck for a Continental flair. For an evening look, simply drape a beaded or sequin-trimmed scarf over your shoulders.

At Greatlookz.com we bring you the best clothes and accessories from around the world. We prowl the world's fashion shows, selecting the latest trends and the most beautiful accessories. We understand that great looks are built piece by piece, with quality fabrics and attention to detail. To create your signature look, simply order by phone at 1-877-755-4920.

We carry scarves from top designers like Kenneth Cole, Anne Klein and Liz Claiborne. Browse our selection of enchanting silk print scarves, or shop for a birthday gift from our wide range of antique and vintage-inspired scarves. You can never have too many scarves--expand your current collection by adding new textures, colors and embellishments into your collection.
.scarves_shawls.designerscarves.description: Greatlookz.com offers ladys scarves and shawls for every occasion. Please click the category links at the very top of the page to view our varied selection of scarves and shawls.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.lace_fans.description:
Lace Fans

Fans play an intricate role in both fashion and society. In Japan, folding hand fans date as far back as the 1600s. The inspiration? The folding wings of a bat. According to historians, Italian women were the first to carry hand fans as fashion accessories. During the 1700s, wealthy women in France and England commissioned artists to paint their fans with intricate patterns and designs. It was during this era that the fan first became a symbol of feminine frailty.

Although fans no longer symbolize gentility, they do add a mysterious air of romance to your look. Whether you're looking for the perfect accessory for that garden party or need the perfect bridesmaid gift for your wedding attendants, Greatlookz.com is your one-stop resource for lace fans. You can reach us immediately for a price quote by calling 1-877-755-4920.

When it comes to elegance, many of our customers prefer our Battenburg lace fan. This fan is intricately woven with delicate lace for an incomparable look of elegance and style. These fans retail for just under $15, an incredible price when you consider the attention to detail that goes into each fan. You can choose from deep, rich red fans to glorious purple fans, a range of colors that will compliment any outfit. This fan also comes in ivory and white for added versatility and for a classic, subtle look.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.velvet_glove.description:
Velvet Gloves

Gloves are delicate items that can make any woman's wardrobe look that much more feminine and beautiful. While there are typically rules about wearing satin gloves outside of formal attire (a no-no, as a rule), velvet gloves enjoy a little more freedom because of their material and recent trends in fashion.

Typically, velvet gloves can be any length, from one-button to sixteen-button, or opera length. They were very popular in the 19th century with formal ballroom attire, such as with Scarlett O'Hara's outfits in "Gone With the Wind." Even though it's well over 100 years later, velvet gloves remain a great choice to wear with gowns of today. One-button velvet gloves, however, can be both very formal and very sporty, depending on the setting and the rest of the outfit you're wearing.

Velvet gloves can be worn a little more casually, but can still be dressed up and worn with evening wear and even wedding gowns. Designers are currently pairing velvet with denim as well as satins and silks. It's all about mixing it up for the seasons this year and pairing standards with new materials and patterns, so feel free to grab a pair of velvet short gloves from GreatLookz.com and go wild!

We can be reached during business hours at 877-755-4920. We love speaking to our customers and look forward to hearing your opinions and thoughts. Shop today and get shipping straight to your door in just a few business days.

To purchase velvet gloves just click on the greatlookz logo below: Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.z.greatloanz.gas_station_loans.meta_description: Your source for all gas station and convenience store loans for new purchases and refinances.
.z.greatloanz.gas_station_loans.description2:
Opening a gas or service station is a popular choice for many small business entrepreneurs. Although not much money is made off of gas sales, many owners generate decent amounts of revenue from convenience store products and/or minor car maintenence services. Acquiring a loan for a gas service station can be difficult, as with most all commercial lending. Environmental insurance and local regulations can put a hamper on getting the business planned and started.

Many lenders tend to reject applications of this sort for those very reasons. Leasing agreements and predicted revenue can also be a burden. In recent years, gas station financing has become more and more difficult due to a dynamic and ever changing industry, environmental concerns, strict supplier agreements and other external factors negatively impacting the industry. USA Mortgage Corp. understands these challenges and has created special purpose gas station financing to meet the individual needs and requirements of its clients. Gas Station Financing.

Eligible Property Types - Properties eligible for USA Mortgage Corp.'s gas station commercial real estate loan program should be of above average condition, environmentally compliant and located in medium and above market sectors. Loans Must be Secured by Real Estate - No Business Only Financing - Brand or Non-Branded OK Owner Operated or Investor Gas with C-Store OK Programs Available for Full-Service Stations SBA and Non-SBA Programs Established Businesses Only - No Start Ups.

Gas Station Commercial Loans - Program Highlights

.

  • Minimum Gas Station Commercial Loan Size $500,000

  • 15, 20, 25, & 30 Year Amortizations Fixed and Variable Rate Options
  • LTVs Range Between 55% - 85%
  • Flexible Prepay Options Full Document
  • Only Minimum 640 Credit Score

  • 2 Year Seasoning for Refinances Full Recourse Guarantee Required

  • Initial Gas Station Loan Documentation Requirements To consider a request for financing, USA Mortgage Corp. requires the following documentation:
    • 3 Years Business and Personal Tax Returns
    • Personal Financial Statement Dated Within the Past 60 Days
    • Business Interim Financial Statements
    • Supplier Agreement Franchise Agreement if Applicable
    • Phase 1/Phase 2 Report AR/AP Schedules Purchase Agreement if Applicable Borrower's Credit Report
    • Borrowers may pull their own credit report and submit with loan application package. Report must show all three bureau scores. USA Mortgage Corp. will pull credit prior to approval.
    • Statement Addressing Negative Items on Credit Report if applicable.
.z.greatloanz.gas_station_loans.description: Gas Station and Convenience Store Loans Nationwide
.z.greatloanz.gas_station_loans.caption: Brokers Welcome. We pay commissions.

.pantyhose__tights__thigh_highs.thigh_hi.meta_keywords: Womens Fashion Accessories,Back Seam Thigh Highs,Beautiful Prom Dresses
.pantyhose__tights__thigh_highs.thigh_hi.meta_description: When you want to turn up the volume on your sex appeal, nothing compares to thigh high stocking with a seam running down the back.  Whether you wear a short skirt or something more formal, when you put on a pair of thigh high stockings, you can't help but feel the raw power of sex appeal.
.pantyhose__tights__thigh_highs.thigh_hi.page_title: Back seam thigh highs, knee socks, sheer pantyhose
.pantyhose__tights__thigh_highs.thigh_hi.description2:
Back Seam Thigh Highs

When you want to turn up the volume on your sex appeal, nothing compares to thigh high stocking with a seam running down the back. Whether you wear a short skirt or something more formal, when you put on a pair of thigh high stockings, you can't help but feel the raw power of sex appeal.

Thigh high stockings became popular during the late '40s and early '50s as the pin-up girl became the icon for feminine style and erotic mystique. While trends come and go, thigh high stockings remain a fashion staple from generation to generation. The back seam on thigh high stockings creates a focal point that says, "I dare you not to look."

Until the late 1960s, most stockings came with a seam in the back. The seam was essential for creating a longer lasting pair of stockings. Today, a pair of stockings with a seam in the back is one of the sexiest things you can wear. Throw on a pair of thigh high stockings with lingerie for a special night at home, or wear them out on the town, and you're sure to drive the men wild.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer a collection of the finest back seam thigh high stockings in the world. Our back seam thigh highs in black or fishnet are always popular. If you're looking to stand out in the crowd, we also offer thigh highs with unique back seam stitching and patterns. Take a look at our selection online, or give us a call today at 1-877-755-4920.

Bridal Gloves

When it comes to finding a pair of bridal gloves for your wedding, it's important to remember the ring. If you're planning on wearing full gloves, you either need to cut a slit in the seams, or you need to remove your left glove during the ceremony. Full gloves can come in handy, however; some women choose full-length opera gloves to keep their fingernails from snagging their dress material, or simply to keep warm at an outdoor wedding.

It may be more convenient to select a pair of fingerless gloves or gauntlet-style gloves, neither of which need to be cut or taken off during the wedding ceremony. Many women prefer the gauntlet-style gloves because they create an attractive line. These gloves feature a band that slips over your middle finger, with an upside-down V shape that frames the hands nicely.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer a wide selection of classic white gloves in fingerless styles. A hot new trend in wedding attire is embellished gloves; these gloves feature beads, rhinestones, pearls, lace, or embroidered details. If you're looking for something flashy, our short satin gauntlet-style gloves are perfect, while our fingerless long lace gloves are ideal for the hopelessly romantic bride.

When it comes to wedding gloves, many women prefer the subtle elegance of our wrist-length gauntlet gloves with lace trim. These gloves are delicate and delightful, suitable for both a playful look or high-intensity glamor. If you're not sure which style glove works best for your wedding dress, give us a call today at 1-877-755-4920.

Tra le categorie di persone che acquistano guanti troviamo i ricevimenti di nozze, i gruppi delle scuole di arte drammatica, le compagnie di danza, le compagnie operistiche e i negozi di accessori nuziali.

Abbiamo i nostri esclusivi modelli di guanti, cappelli, ombrellini, e calzini molto originali che vengono prodotti dalla nostra azienda. Su richiesta, possiamo anche confezionare articoli personalizzati.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.tea_towels.meta_description: In England, it's called a tea towel. In America, it's called a dish towel. When it's brought to America and crafted with fine linen materials, it's called a tea towel again. While this may sound a little confusing, the best way to distinguish a modern tea towel is with monogram use and the placement and function of the towel.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.tea_towels.description:
Tea Towels

In England, it's called a tea towel. In America, it's called a dish towel. When it's brought to America and crafted with fine linen materials, it's called a tea towel again. While this may sound a little confusing, the best way to distinguish a modern tea towel is with monogram use and the placement and function of the towel.

In English script or gothic fare, monograms on tea towels give these standard linens a unique and unmistakable look. They were originally used during high tea to add elegance to silver tea services. Today, though, tea towels are simply classy options for bath or kitchen hand towels. They can still be used with tea service as well.

At GreatLookz.com, we feature gorgeous linen tea towels for use or decorative purposes in your kitchen, no matter where you live or what you call it. Our linen tea towel in solid white measures in at 14 inches by 22 inches and is made of 100 percent pure linen. These towels can be used in the kitchen or in the bathroom as a guest hand towel. Either way, they are simply elegant items that add to the elegance and grace of any room in your home.

Excellently crafted and designed, these towels are a pleasure to view and use. They are very versatile and machine washable, making them supremely convenient and durable over time and repeated use. Our simple yet refined tea towels make a great housewarming gift as well. For relatively little cost, you can purchase a set and then quickly and easily have them embroidered for that extra touch. For beautiful tea towels, shop online or call us directly at 877-755-4920.

.z.greatloanz.a_and_d_loans.meta_description: USA Mortgage Corp. provides acquisition and development financing for apartments, office buildings, hotels, motels, office condos, income producing properties, gas stations, car washes, funeral homes and medical office buildings.
.z.greatloanz.a_and_d_loans.description2:
Land Acquisition & Development Loans

The purchase and development of real estate can be a daunting experience, and acquiring financing for it should not make the task even more challenging.

Through our A&D Loan Program, we at USA Mortgage Corp. can handle everything for you at one time and in one place. We are committed to moving quickly in order to keep you on schedule; no matter if your plans involve a single commercial building, an entire commercial development, or a residential community.

To us, the needs of the individual businessperson and the established real estate developer are of the utmost importance, We solve problems and do not cause them.

So if you are growing your business or launching your next major real estate project, USA Mortgage Corp. can tailor a loan program to fit your cash flow requirements, and help you bring everything in on time and within your budget.

We can also convert your A&D Loan into permanent financing if you wish, or you can roll your A&D Loan into permanent financing with your own lender. Not only do we provide the most competitive acquisition, development, construction, and permanent financing , but we also do it virtually anywhere in the United States with over three decades of know-how.

When preparing for submitting your loan request, please include the following information if possible:

  • An Executive Summary for the Project with Capital Requirement.
  • Construction Budgets and Plans.
  • Three Year Pro Forma for the Project.
  • Last Two Years Complete and Third Year Trailing Income Statements & Balance Sheets.
  • Resumes of the Principals.
    • Three Years of Tax Returns for the Organization and Principals.

    To see a sample of our commercial loan programs and rates, including Land Acquisition and Development Loans.

    There are also a credit and application forms that must accompany your submission, which we can email or fax them to you upon request. For answers to your A&D lending or any other commercial real estate lending needs, please call us at Greg Burkle at 602-282-3804.
.z.greatloanz.a_and_d_loans.caption: Brokers Welcome. We pay commissions.

.zzzzz2.description:
CUSTOMER SERVICE/RETURN POLICY

Whom do I contact for questions about my order? You can contact our customer service center by phone at 1-877-755-4920. Monday-Friday, 9:00am to 5:00pm PST. A message service is also available for all after hour calls. >p> Can I place my order by phone, fax or mail if I am not comfortable ordering online?

Yes, you can place your order by phone at 1-877-755-4920 or by fax at 1-888-709-8557. Monday-Friday, 9:00am to 5:00pm PST.

Can I change all or part of my order?

If you have already submitted and confirmed your order, you can change all or part of your order by calling our customer service at 1-877-755-4920. What payment options are available? Do you only accept credit cards? All major credit cards are accepted online. These include American Express, Visa, MasterCard and Discover. We also accept paypal and checks. School districts may use their purchase order system, but need to call to confirm the order. For questions please call 1-877-755-4920.

What is your return policy?

Return Policy Exchanges Exchanges are easy! Simply enclose a copy of your invoice with your unwanted items and a note indicating exactly what you would like instead. If you are unhappy with an item for any reason, we have hundreds of items from which you can choose an exchange. Merchandise may be exchanged under the following conditions. All merchandise must be exchanged within 30 days of receipt and in the original packaging as received, unused & undamaged. The customer pays return shipping to our location. There are no additional shipping charges or restocking fees for exchanges. *Please note that there are no exchanges on hosiery items or bodystockings. Returns Please enclose a copy of your invoice with your return. * Refunds will be delayed on packages received without invoices or order numbers. A restocking fee will be deducted from your refund for any returns. The fee is 15% of the price of the items that are returned. Refunds are issued within one week from the date we receive your return. The balance will be credited to your charge account. We do not offer refunds on formal dresses, sunglasses, hosiery, bodystockings, or clearance items. (All clearance items have CLEARANCE in the title). There is no refund for shipping charges. International Sales All Customs Fees, Duties, or Tariffs are the responsibility of the customer. This applies to the original purchase and shipment and to product return shipments. Packages that are undeliverable or refused by the customer will not be refunded for shipping charges. Damaged or Defective Merchandise All damage or defective claims must be made within 5 days of receiving merchandise. Toll free: 877-755-4920 Fax: 888-709-8557. Please send Returns and Exchanges to: Return/Exchanges Department7655 E Redfield Road Suite 1 Scottsdale, AZ 85260

How long will it take to credit my account after a return?

Please allow 2-weeks for the product amount to be credited back to your account.

How long will it take to replace my merchandise if I return/exchange it? Please allow up to 2-weeks for your merchandise to be delivered after a return/exchange.

Do you charge sales tax?

We only charge sales tax in our home state Arizona.

How can I tell if the products I want are in stock?

All of the products present on our websites are currently in stock unless otherwise indicated. If there is a problem you will be contacted by phone or email the day after the order is placed.

SHIPPING What shipping services do you offer? How soon can I expect to receive my order? All shipping options are offered after you enter your mailing address to which your order will be sent too. Most orders normally ship by the next business day. Exact transit times depend upon the method of shipment you choose.

US Mail - Standard Shipping

Fed-Ex 2nd Day Air: 2-business days

Fed-Ex Express : 3-business days

Fed-Ex Ground: 2-8 business days, depending on distance from Arizona

Fed-Ex Overnite- Next business day

Do you ship Internationally?

Yes, We ship via US Post Office. GENERAL If I leave your websites and return, will my items be saved in my shopping cart? Items will only stay in your shopping cart while you are shopping on one of our websites. After you close your shopping window or leave one of our websites, all of your items will be emptied from your cart. So please remember to confirm all of your purchases and check-out before leaving one of our shops. How do I remove an item from my shopping cart? Go to the Cart screen by clicking on the Cart link in the top right-hand corner of your shopping screen. You will be able to view all of the items in your shopping cart. If there are any items that you want to remove individually, click on the remove button in the shopping cart next to the item and it will automatically remove that item. If you would like to clear your basket completely, click on Empty Cart at the bottom of the list.

Can I change the quantities of the items in my shopping cart?

You can change the number of each item that is in your cart and then simply click the Update button below the list.

Do I have to register before I can place my order?

Yes, to place an order you must first register on one of our websites. This service saves your information and makes it much easier for you to shop again one of our websites in the future. How can I retrieve my password? When asked to provide your login information, just click on the Password link to retrieve your password. Then simply enter in your e-mail address, and your password will be e-mailed to you.

.z.greatloanz.international_loans.caption: Call Greg Burckle 800-254-9659 ext 101
.z.greatloanz.international_loans.description2:
International Financing Program .

Loan Amounts: $5,000,000 to $1 Billion Dollars and above.

Countries: Politically stable countries there is strong interest for projects in Central and South America including Mexico.

Types of projects: Hospitals, energy projects of all types including recycling projects, bridges, roads, power plants, and a wide variety of commercial real estate projects and business expansion projects

Information we need for initial submission:

  • 01. Brief description of the nature of the project and its location.

  • 02. Resumes required on the principals.

  • 03. How much capital have the principals invested into this project, and specifically how were those funds allocated?

  • 04. How much are the principals looking to borrow?

  • 05. What is the total amount of hard equity the principals are contributing?

  • 06. What are the other assets that the principals have or will contributed to the project?

  • 07. Do the principals have title to this property and what is the status of the appraisal?

  • 08. Do the principals have all the necessary entitlements?

  • 09. Specific breakdown of the funds.

  • 10. We need a projection, showing the anticipated annual revenue, and the net income of the project, for a three year period.

  • 11. Current financial statements are required from the principals or entity.

  • 12. Exit Strategy.

International Financing / International Project Loans:

Loan amounts: 5,000,000 and above. Geographic: International with emphasis on projects in North, Central and South America, Europe and Asia.

Types of projects: All types of large residential and commercial real estate developments, mergers and acquisitions financing for successful companies seeking to expand or buy out other companies, energy projects such as power plants, ethanol plants, oil and gas refineries, large infrastructure projects such as roads, bridges, railroads, cement plants, hotels, and casinos.

Types of financing: Loan terms and conditions would be dependent upon the perceived risk of the project and the strength of the principals; however the rates and terms are very competitive.

.scarves_shawls.description2:
A great scarf is the perfect accessory to any woman's outfit. For this year, more traditional and pretty items are replacing the long, skinny scarves. Longer lengths are still definitely in, though. The key is to find a gorgeous printed or knitted scarf with a great long length. The trend of this fashion also lends itself to a very functional style. The length of the scarves popular now give you many different ways to wear them. You can wrap the scarf around your neck twice and let the ends hang long. You can double the scarf and then wrap it once, pulling the ends through; this is a very pulled-together look that is incredibly "in" right now. You can also wrap the scarf in a long ascot style and layer it under a great jacket.

Whichever way you decide to wear your scarves, you definitely have options at GreatLookz.com. We offer more than 150 scarves to choose from, with colors, lengths, materials, and styles galore. What's more, our stock is affordable and well-made. You will be able to tell from our full color pictures that the detailing on our women's scarves is truly remarkable.

We choose our collections based on what women are really wearing, so you can count on finding scarves that will fit right into your wardrobe. After all, at any age, a great scarf can complete even the most formal outfit. However, we also carry a large selection of shawls and wraps that are popular right now as well. For more details, feel free to call us at 877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.silk_scarves.description:
Silk Scarves

Silk scarves are some of the most luxurious accessories a woman can own. As a virtually timeless piece of any wardrobe, they can last for decades without going out of style. This year, vintage silk scarves are making a comeback and traditional styles mixed with modern jackets and coats are very popular among women of all ages.

Silk scarves are typically made in China and Italy, with some of the finest manufacturers found in both of these countries. They are measured by square dimension or rectangular dimensions in inches. Square scares are usually for short neck ties and longer ones are typically for wear about the neck, shoulders, or jacket lapel.

We offer a plethora of silk scarves in our GreatLookz.com collection. What's more, they come from all over the world, made by the top designers for a fraction of the price. Our beautiful Beige and Cream Tulip scarf is made of 100 percent Chinese imported silk. It is designed with a light brown geometric pattern with vivid yellow tulips dancing across this scarf's 20-inch square surface.

From Italy, our flower print scarf in assorted colors is a fine choice. Classy and classic, these scarves by Charter Club remind of an era gone by of old Hollywood style and living. Each features a large flower in the center of the scarf with a stripe along each side for accent. They measure 20 inches square as well. We also carry scarves by designer Anne Klein, nautically inspired scarves, and much more. Call us today at 877-755-4920 to find out more about our selection of silk scarves.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.corset_tops.meta_description: Throughout history, corsets have played a role in boosting and trimming the female form.  In fact, when Disneyland first opened there was a corset shop on Main Street, complete with a show called "The Wizard of Bras."  If you think today's beauty standards are tough, during the Victorian Era the ideal waist size for women was just 16 inches.  The only way to achieve this look was with extremely snug corsets.  While corsets today aren't anywhere near as binding, they're still as popular as ever among women looking to capture the female form in all its beauty.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.corset_tops.description:
Corset Tops

Throughout history, corsets have played a role in boosting and trimming the female form. In fact, when Disneyland first opened there was a corset shop on Main Street, complete with a show called "The Wizard of Bras." If you think today's beauty standards are tough, during the Victorian Era the ideal waist size for women was just 16 inches. The only way to achieve this look was with extremely snug corsets. While corsets today aren't anywhere near as binding, they're still as popular as ever among women looking to capture the female form in all its beauty.

If you want to give your love life a boost, check out the selection of corset tops available from Greatlookz.com. At Greatlookz.com, we take pride in offering clothing and lingerie that brings out a woman's natural curves and accentuates all the beauty inherent in her shape. Whether you're looking for lingerie to help pull a look together or simply want a modern twist on sexy vintage lingerie, corset tops can fit the bill with their incredible versatility.

When it comes to buying corsets, many women prefer to buy matched sets. These sets come with a corset, matching garter belts, and a pair of thigh high stockings. When you buy one of these lingerie sets, you never have to worry about finding accessories that fit or colors that match. For a romantic twist, look for floral tapestry accents and classic hook and eye closures.

To turn up the volume, take a look at the long line satin flower jacquard corset. You'll feel just like a pin-up girl in this stylish and sexy lingerie set. Choose from stunning red and black, white, or solid black corsets and matching g-strings. If you've looking for something to wear on your wedding night or a sexy bridal shower gift, corsets are hard to beat. Order online or give us a call at 1-877-755-4920.

.fancy_bobby_socks.meta_description: Greatlookz:   Your source for women's socks for all occasions.  Fancy bobby socks, bobby socks, bobby sox, sheer knee high nylon socks, lace ankle socks, toe socks, fishnet socks, ruffle socks, sexy black socks, and more.
.fancy_bobby_socks.description2:
Socks and Hosiery

Socks and hosiery are perhaps some of the most underrated garments in a woman's closet. Typically, socks are appropriate under pants and slacks, while hosiery is a must for skirts. This fashion season, though, bobby socks are making a big comeback in trends for spring and summer.

Bobby socks, popular in the 1940s through the 1960s, are fun and flirty socks that are cut ankle-high, with a glimpse of decoration at the back or ankle of the sock. While they used to be worn with saddle shoes and poodle skirts, you can know sport these great items with capri pants, knee-length shorts or skirts, and even with boots.

We have tons of bobby socks to choose from in our collection at GreatLookz.com. We offer bobby socks with lace, organza, beading and more to give your outfit a taste of delicate pageantry. As well, our hosiery selection spans from knee-highs to body hose with fishnets, leggings, tights, and thigh highs all thrown into the mix as well. We recognize that the leg is one of the most beautiful parts of the body and it should be accented with fun and delicate items of socks and hosiery. Today's hosiery is meant to be seen, so have some fun and buy some great pieces today!

When you're ready to place your order, you've got two options. You can shop online and check out using our secure cart and verification process. Or, you can give us a call directly at our toll-free number, 877-755-4920. We love to hear your input, so feel free to call us anytime with questions, comments, or sizing issues. We're here to help!

.ztips.scarf_tying.meta_description:
Scarf Tying

Scarves are a timeless accessory that can make any outfit that much more stylish. Whether you're eight or 80, you can always find a scarf that works with your outfit to spruce it up! At GreatLookz.com, we sell well over 150 different scarves from designers from all over the world. We offer several patterns, colors, materials, and lengths. We believe that the way you choose to wear a scarf is a true expression of your individual style.

For shorter scarves, the ascot look is experiencing quite a resurgence this year. The scarf should be no more than 16 inches, and should be a square shape. Start by folding the scarf into an oblong shape. Then, place it around the neck and flip one end over the other for a bustle that rests at the nape of the neck. From there, you can layer this look with a high collared jacket or coat to achieve the classic look that's reemerging in popularity on the heels of the ladylike trend.

The knotted neck wrap is also another popular way of tying your scarves. For longer styles, this is a very sophisticated look. Simply fold your square scarf into a triangle. Place the point in front of you and cross the ends behind the neck and tie it off in the front with a square knot.

For a younger look, take a regular wool scarf and fold it in half. Wrap the folded scarf around your neck once, and pull the loose doubled end through the loop created at the top of the scarf when you doubled it. Rest the tail of the section you've pulled through on the side of your chest (to the left or right). This is probably the most popular way to wear scarves for people under age 35 this year. If you would like to give us your favorite way to wear your scarf, call us at 877-755-4920 and share your thoughts!

.z.greatloanz.warehouses.description2:
USA Mortgage Corp. provides commercial real estate mortgage financing loans for Warehouse Buildings and other industrial property types. We fund in all 50 states plus the District of Columbia. We understand the unique nature of the needs of these property types. We provide commercial property warehouse building loans for financing the acquisition, refurbishing or refinancing of this property type across the country. Our programs provide borrowers with fast flexible no income no asset verification options at low rates and fees. We offer stated income, no document, and full document programs to all borrowers depending on their individual requirements, goals and needs.

We respond very quickly and can get you a pre-approval and letter of interest within 48 hours of a complete application. This gives you the factual data you need to make an informed decision. Large and small balance financing for Warehouse Building commercial loans are designed for average and above average condition property types located in medium to large market areas.

Our stated income / stated asset commercial loan programs do not require income documentation and generally require fewer forms of documentation than traditional bank lending. Just an application form and credit report, 3 year's P & L on the business and 3 year's personal financial statements are all it takes to get started on a pre-approved program that can close in just weeks. It's unfortunate that many banks and other conventional lending sources nationwide will often turn down small amount requests for funding.

To qualify for an approval, the business must support a minimum 1.20 DSCR (Debt Service Coverage Ratio) and have reasonable financial statements or projections. 90% LTV commercial loans for Warehouse building financing programs with SBA backing is available. Stated income Warehouse building financing loans are available with a maximum LTV of 75% and a CLTV of 90%. This is where a seller might carry back a 2nd mortgage allowing the buyer to come in with 10% down. Perhaps you want to buy a building or industrial warehouses. Purchase financing loans make it easy.

We will work with you to provide the right investment loan structure for your property whether it is a purchase, refinance, or new construction. We can fund your loan based off the future values if property improvements are necessary. We fund many of these properties and other types of commercial real estate. We are experts in these commercial properties. If you will go to our quick application and request a prequalification, we can have full terms and conditions on funding a program for you within 48 hours of a complete application. We look forward to serving you and all your financial commercial needs.

.ztips.designer_fashion_for_full_figured.meta_description: Fashion tips for full figured women.
.ztips.designer_fashion_for_full_figured.description:
Designer Fashion for Full-Figured Women

Sometimes, all the money in the world cant buy your way to looking perfect but we can! As women (and men) we fuss over our figures everyday, trying to find the best way to maximize on our curvacious bodies. Fortunately, there are a few simple ways to completely re-shape the way you look without physically changing the way you look. Its as easy as choosing the right clothes when youre shopping. Here are some tips to help:

For those of you who are:

Bottom Heavy If you have been blessed with a Jlo-like bottom, there are a number of ways to work it to your advantage. First of all, stay away from bottoms that are too tight. These will make you look bigger and, as much as you want to show off your assets, you dont want to look out of proportion. Larger pants that stay wide all the way down the legs will help make your bottom look smaller. Also, choose tops that lie just above the waist, anything too long will also draw attention to the wrong places. If youre looking to take attention away from your bottom, choose bright colors on top and neutral colors like black on the bottom.

Top Heavy If you want to look a little smaller on top yes, some of us do you basically need to do the opposite of the directions listed above. Choose brighter colors on the bottom, neutral colors on the top and try to stay away from v-necks or low-cut shirts (these will only draw attention to your chest). The more you cover up, the less attention is drawn to that area. Also, you may want to stay away bulky necklaces, or scarves which will also draw the attention upwards. If you want to play up your look with accessories, you may want to focus your attention more on belts, which will keep the eyes at waist level.

Top Plus Size Designers

Fortunately for those of us who are looking to eliminate our curvier figures, there are a number of top notch designers creating fabulous plus size pieces. Liz Claiborne is one of the designers putting effort into designer complete lines of plus size clothing. Anne Klein is another amazingly talented designer who has been focusing on the development of sexy designs for full-figured women.

The most important thing to remember when choosing the best clothing for your figure is to choose articles that youre comfortable with. If youre confident in the clothes youre wearing, youre going to look good no matter what. Designer clothing sometimes costs a little more but is definitely worth the cost. Designers like Juicy Couture and Baby Phat are designing clothes to suit all body types. This will make it easier for individuals of all shapes and sizes to make the most of their bodies and feel good about their appearance, regardless of their shape.

By Angela Ayles, Editor for http://www.thinkfashion.com

GREATHAT/cart.bottomtext:
Most orders ship out the next BUSINESS day. For example, if you order on a Friday, your order will ship the following Monday (or Tuesday if Monday is a national holiday). We will notify you by phone or email if an item is out of stock. Please note that we cannot ship FEDEX to a post office post.

Standard Shipping is via First Class Mail. This will take from 5 to 10 business days, depending on location. (We ship from Phoenix, Arizona) Priority Mail takes approximately 3 to 5 days. If you need a package by a certain date, please choose one of the FedEx Express options as these are guaranteed to arrive in the number of days shown below:

If you would like to choose an express Fed Ex Shipping option, simply add the product called FedExShipping to your cart, add your zip code and update the cart and this will estimate the Fed Ex shipping costs for you. You can place your express shipping order online and the order will leave our warehouse the next business day, via your Fed Ex shipping choice. Please note that FEDEX GROUND is SLOWER than the post office.

International Customers - Please note that after you enter your address you will get an exact shipping quote BEFORE you are asked to pay for your order.
GREATHAT/cart.toptext:

If you order after this deadline and still need your package to be shipped that day, please call us - we will ship as many emergency orders as we possibly can. If you have any questions or concerns you may reach us toll free at 877-755-4920, or by fax at 602-218-5975.

Gloves aren't just for the winter, but for any time you want to look your best. Wearing a pair of stylish gloves can instantly change the look of an outfit and revitalizes your wardrobe. Rich colored gloves invigorate dull colored coats and dresses, while classic black and white gloves make your evening attire glamorous and elegant.




The must have accessory for weddings, proms, formals, and black tie events is the evening glove.  Take a page out of Audrey Hepburn's book by adding a pair of elbow-length gloves to your evening wear. .zmarion_s_fashion_articles.evening_shaw.description:
Evening Shawls

A shawl is a timeless accessory that's always in fashion. Shawls were extremely popular during the reign of Queen Victoria, when propriety dictated well-dressed women wear shawls outdoors. At one point, shawls had to be made with up to two square yards of fabric to cover the massive crinoline skirts that were popular in the 1850s.

When worn at night, a shawl does more than keep you warm; it also adds a touch of elegance to your ensemble. There are no hard and fast rules when it comes to finding a shawl to match your outfit. Think about contrast--if your dress is matte jersey, look for a shawl in a contrasting texture, such as velvet. If you're planning a big night out on the town, a silk or satin shawl adds an appropriate amount of glitz. At Greatlookz.com, we offer unique shawls with subtle feminine sensibilities.

One of our most popular formal shawls is our Victorian floral sheer black lace cape and shawl. The scalloped trim and ruffled neck pay homage to the era that inspired this garment, and the sheer black finishing adds a formal touch. This versatile piece can be tied in several different ways, making it ideal for dressing up, as well as for daywear.

Our collection of designer shawls has inspired many of our customers to venture out into the night in style. The sheer black shawl with beading turns even a plain dress into a dazzling spectacle. At Greatlookz.com, we know personal contact is important to you. While all of our shawls can be ordered online, you can also call us directly during business hours to place your order. Call 1-877-755-4920 today!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_glov.meta_description: Your wedding day is bound to be a momentous occasion, one that you'll surely never forget. When it comes to your wedding style, you can express your individual personality in any way you like. One great way to do this is with accessories, especially wedding gloves, available from GreatLookz.com.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_glov.description:
Wedding Gloves

Your wedding day is bound to be a momentous occasion, one that you'll surely never forget. When it comes to your wedding style, you can express your individual personality in any way you like. One great way to do this is with accessories, especially wedding gloves, available from GreatLookz.com.

Wedding gloves require special attention to detail. Typically, you want your gloves to match the color of your gown: white gloves with a white dress, ivory gloves with an ivory dress, and so on. As well, most brides prefer to match the material also, although some choose alternative fabrics like leather, silk, matte cotton, crochet (which is very popular this year!), velvet, and sheer.

Whatever your choice, gloves of any length can heighten the elegance and drama of any wedding ensemble, but there are rules of etiquette that must be followed. The bride should wear her gloves for the processional, but take them off for the ceremony if she is wearing short, wrist length gloves. Long, elbow length gloves, however, usually remain on during the ceremony and are often equipped with a open seam on the ring finger that allows the bride to expose just that finger for the ring ceremony. The ring should never be placed over the gloved finger.

As well, gloves should be worn immediately after the ceremony to greet guests in the receiving line. They should also be kept on for the wedding dance at the reception. After that, gloves should be removed for eating and dancing, so as to avoid stains and wear.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_pr.description:
Plus Size Prom Dresses

Prom is a formal dance for teenagers, typically held at the end of high school in the last two years. In England, prom is called a "ball," and in Ireland, they are referred to as "debs," or debutante balls. No matter what you call it, prom is a very special occasion in a young woman's life. It's important to get a great dress, as well as one that fits in your budget.

The best way to do this is to peruse current fashion magazines for looks that would be flattering to your shape and your wallet (or your parents' wallet!). This year, look for chocolate and burgundy dresses and interesting options for ladies of all sizes. For plus sizes, halters and full skirts offer pretty and form-flattering options for ladies over size 12.

At GreatLookz.com, we believe that girls of all sizes should have the most elegant gowns for the prom! We offer prom dresses in all sizes up to a 44 to accommodate the vast majority of girls. Fashion trends for spring and summer this year are suggesting elegance, grace, and great necklines. Our halter-top, flowing shimmer satin prom dress may be a great option for you. Its shiny organdy material may look delicate, but the dress is constructed with a fully boned bodice and extra large skirt to suck in on top and allow for extra room on bottom. It is available in black only, and features fashion's favorite neckline of this year--the halter.

And, if you are larger in the chest area, we offer matching shawls with many of our gowns to help draw attention to the dress, not your ample bosom (parents love this idea!). Our A-line standard gown comes in gorgeous colors, including white, ivory, black, burgundy, red, and light blue. You can order from us directly from GreatLookz.com or you can give us a call during business hours at 877-755-4920.

.ztips.how_to_tie_a_scarf.meta_keywords: Hat Boxes,How To Tie A Scarf,How To Wear A Scarf
.ztips.how_to_tie_a_scarf.meta_description: Scarves are the ultimate accessories for women who love to play around with color and fabrics.  Whether you're wearing a scarf for warmth during the winter months or you're wearing a fancy silk scarf to dress up an outfit, the way you tie your scarf says a lot about the kind of mood you're trying to convey.  Tie your scarf in a tight bow, and you convey a professional or formal mood; let your scarf drape loosely around the neck and you convey a playful sensibility.
.ztips.how_to_tie_a_scarf.description:
How To Tie A Scarf

Scarves are the ultimate accessories for women who love to play around with color and fabrics. Whether you're wearing a scarf for warmth during the winter months or you're wearing a fancy silk scarf to dress up an outfit, the way you tie your scarf says a lot about the kind of mood you're trying to convey. Tie your scarf in a tight bow, and you convey a professional or formal mood; let your scarf drape loosely around the neck and you convey a playful sensibility.

Before you get creative with scarf tying, it's important to understand some basic techniques for tying scarves. For a simple look, take a square scarf and fold it diagonally until you form a two-inch band. The simply wrap it around your neck, and tie it in a knot. A front knot is great for a blouse with an open collar, while a side knot gives you a sassy look for boatneck top.

If you have a larger scarf, you can turn it into a shawl by folding it into a triangle and draping it over one shoulder. You can either tie the ends at the opposite hip or create a slim look by belting the scarf at your waist. You can also wrap the scarf around both shoulders to add a splash of color to your outfit.

When it comes to tying scarves, there are no hard and fast rules. Check out the selection of beautiful scarves from Greatlookz.com, and experiment with them. You won't believe how many different looks you can achieve with this one simple accessory. We offer long scarves, square scarves, and shawls in a variety of different materials and patterns. Our silk scarves are always popular, and our designer scarf collection features all your favorites. If you have questions about your order, give us a call at 1-877-775-4920 today.

This is one of the few resources for purchasing or refinancing a Gentlemen's Club(Strip Clubs, Adult Video Stores, Adult Book Stores etc.) All loans must be attached to real estate. For years we were asked to provide financing and no lender would step forward because they were embarrassed to carry a strip club on their books. Now after much research we have made relationships with two lenders who will consider good business operations, regardless of the dress code. Minimum loan amount is $1,000,000 to $12,000,000: available only in Arizona, California and Nevada

To begin we will need the following information emailed to us:

Purchase or Refinance we'll need the past three years financials on the club Three years income taxes (all schedules) both personal and for the business

Digital photos of the property, front, sides, rear, and street views.

A Map Quest location with address

If this is a Purchase then we will need the purchase agreement.

Borrower's authorization to pull credit.

.clothing.petticoats.meta_description: Your source for fancy petticoats in lots of colors and styles.
.clothing.petticoats.description2:
Petticoat Slips     

Petticoat slips are undergarments worn beneath skirts, dresses, and saris. When you think of petticoats, images of Victorian era dresses and corsets may come to mind. However, these wonderful undergarments have many functional and decorative uses, even with today's most modern fashions.

Back in the 16th to 19th centuries, petticoat slips were made to be seen, such as Mammy's famous red petticoat in the movie epic "Gone With the Wind." They would protrude just enough to be visible when a lady would sit down or walk briskly--just visible enough to be flirty. Now, though, petticoats are typically worn only to make the body of skirt or dress seem fuller, and are often much shorter than the hem of the outer garment so as not to be seen.

At GreatLookz.com, we offer many undergarments and accessories with a historical flair that are infused with modern flavor, and our petticoats are no exception. For example, our stunning mid-length, double layer petticoat is precious and feminine. Made in pink, red, purple, white, and black, this petticoat is ideal for any type of skirt or gown, but goes great with mid-length square dancing fashions. It is made of 100 percent nylon and features a satin top elastic waist for extreme comfort.

Square dancers, brides, prom goers, and more can all benefit from modern petticoat slips. Dramatic and fun, these garments enhance any costume or outfit and lend that traditional peek-a-boo flirtiness they always have. When you're ready to order, simply shop on our website or give us a call at 877-755-4920 to place your order directly.
.clothing.petticoats.description: Try our fun and fabulous petticoats - both long and short.

.z.greatwritingcourses.prodheader: Learn how to write novels from the experts
.z.greatwritingcourses.description2:
Fulfill your dreams of writing a Romance Novel. Share your gift of story telling with the eager, reading public. Our courses, developed and taught by Dr. Pamela R. Goodfellow, will show you how to live a Writer's Life, for fun and profit. The Mini Writing Courses consist of Lectures on DVD, a three book library of examples of the best romance novels for you to read, class notes, and proven writing exercises developed by Dr. Goodfellow with an option to receive personal feedback from her, a story telling check list to help develop characters, plot, conflict and resolution, and a ten-step guide to better grammar and punctuation. In short, everything you need to get started wriitng your romance novel. Also, the course includes practical information on how to submit your manuscript to publishers and agents, how to self publish, and how to distribute, publicize, and promote your novel. You can do it!

Publishing is a business. Writing is an artform. Learn the craft from people who know the business and understand the artform. Our easy financing plan, money- back gurarantee and proven track record will help you awaken the author inside you.

Your course instructor is Dr. Pamela R. Goodfello, double PhD, author of fiction and non-fiction books, and the professor who developed the Crafting the Character-based Novel three-year program, formally taught at the University of Wasghington. Dr. Goodfellow owned her own publishing company, Goodfellow Press for twelve years, and published novels and anthologies from Northwest authors. Retired now and living in Arizona, Dr. Goofellow continues to help authors develop their skills. A recognised expert in publishing and writing, Dr. Goodfellow will help you gain success with your writing dreams.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_stoc.description:
Wedding Stockings

Wedding accessories like stockings should play an important role in your bridal wardrobe choices. Although many wedding gowns are very long and don't expose much of the leg, the proper wedding hosiery should still be a key part of your outfit on your special day. Especially if they are going to be seen, hosiery can really accentuate the beauty of your gown and your figure.

As a rule, wedding stockings should complement your gown in material, style, and color. This means that the construction (sheerness, sheen, pattern) of the stockings themselves should not detract from your gown and should actually accent it in a subtle way. Patterned hosiery is tricky, as elaborate designs can draw too much attention away from the gown. However, patterns in moderation can be very flattering, especially those with simple motifs near the ankle.

Shoe choice can also affect your hosiery selection. For ornate or very strappy shoes, wedding stockings should be as simple as possible to avoid looking too "busy." If a basic pump is worn, then the hosiery can be more complex in design.

A mistake many brides make is choosing the wrong color of hosiery. When in doubt, experts say to keep it simple. The best rule is to go with sheer hose in the matching color of your gown, be it ivory, white, or nude. You don't want to take attention away from your expensive gown and you definitely don't want your outfit affected by a poor hosiery choice. At GreatLookz.com, we offer dozens of choices in wedding stockings. Shop online or call us at 877-755-4920 for details and orders.

To purchase wedding stockings click on the greatlookz logo shown below" Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_hosie.description:
Bridal Hosiery

Your wedding day is the one day in your life when you want every single detail to be perfect. The average budget for a wedding in America is $20,000. With so much on the line, it's important to create a memorable look, from the wedding gown all the way down to the bridal hosiery. When it comes to finding unique hosiery with fine stitching, you can't beat Greatlookz.com.

When many of us think of wedding receptions, we think of the tradition of throwing the bridal garter out to the crowd of unwed male guests. This stems from a British tradition called "flinging the stocking." According to tradition, people would storm the couple's bedroom, take of their stockings, and fling them at the newlyweds. The first person to hit the bride or groom on the nose with a pair of stockings would be the next to marry.

Although this tradition has evolved over time, you still want to look your very best when you take off that garter belt. That's where our sexy thigh high bridal stockings come in handy. Besides, nothing makes a woman feel sexier underneath her clothes than a pair of thigh high stockings.

The lace top thigh highs in classic white are one of our most popular items for brides. If you want to go for something with a little texture, check out our sheer white floral lace diamond pattern stockings, and for a tiny hint of color, check out our white opaque thigh highs with red lace top and back seam. You'll find color photos and sizing information online, or you can call us directly at 1-877-755-4920 for more information on all of our bridal hosiery.

.dressy_gloves.custom_gloves.meta_description: Your source for unique gloves and custom made gloves.
.dressy_gloves.custom_gloves.description2:
Formal Gloves

Formal gloves have been a standard of well-dressed women for hundreds of years. In 1566, Queen Elizabeth I reportedly wore a pair of white gauntlet-style gloves that were 18 inches long, featuring elegant gold trim. During Napoleon's reign in the early 19th century, elbow length gloves became a fashion staple. Napoleon's first wife, Josephine, wore formal gloves just about everywhere she went, inspiring a trend that spread throughout Europe and over to America. Truth be told, Josephine wore gloves to hide her hands, which she considered unsightly.

When it comes to gloves, just about anything goes. If you like the sleek look and feel of long gloves, we have plenty of fabrics and colors to choose from. Our classic velvet opera length gloves can add warmth on a chilly night, or a sense of drama. Try to contrast the color of your gloves with your dress--if your dress is an A-line black satin ballgown, contrast it with elegant white gloves, for a look reminiscent of Audrey Hepburn in Roman Holiday. We also sell this style in dark brown, one of the hottest colors of the season.

To dress up a wedding gown, look for delicate fingerless and gauntlet-style gloves. Depending on the neckline and sleeve length of your dress, you can choose from wrist length, opera length or elbow length gloves. Selecting bridal gloves comes down to personal style and the overall mood or theme of the day. Is your wedding casual? Dainty lace fingerless gloves have a playful vibe, much more so than formal opera length gloves. This year, look for gloves with beading and lace trim.

If you're looking for a new twist on old favorites, we offer several different formal gloves that push the envelope. Show off your wild side with a pair of wrist-length satin fingerless gloves with a purple feather trim. Let them see your adventurous side with a pair of long black gloves with a red fringe or sequin trim. These are just some of the unique gloves you'll find when you shop online with us. Call 1-877-755-4920 to place an order!
.dressy_gloves.custom_gloves.description: Greatlookz.com can create the look of your dreams.

GREATSCA/cart.bottomtext:
Most orders ship out the next BUSINESS day. For example, if you order on a Friday, your order will ship the following Monday (or Tuesday if Monday is a national holiday). We will notify you by phone or email if an item is out of stock. Please note that we cannot ship FEDEX to a post office post.

Standard Shipping is via First Class Mail. This will take from 5 to 10 business days, depending on location. (We ship from Phoenix, Arizona) Priority Mail takes approximately 3 to 5 days. If you need a package by a certain date, please choose one of the FedEx Express options as these are guaranteed to arrive in the number of days shown below:

If you would like to choose an express Fed Ex Shipping option, simply add the product called FedExShipping to your cart, add your zip code and update the cart and this will estimate the Fed Ex shipping costs for you. You can place your express shipping order online and the order will leave our warehouse the next business day, via your Fed Ex shipping choice. Please note that FEDEX GROUND is SLOWER than the post office.

International Customers - Please note that after you enter your address you will get an exact shipping quote BEFORE you are asked to pay for your order.
GREATSCA/cart.toptext:
All FedEx Express orders must be placed by 1:00 p.m. Pacific Standard Time if you want your order to be shipped on the same day. If you order after this deadline and still need your package to be shipped that day, please call us - we will ship as many emergency orders as we possibly can. If you have any questions or concerns you may reach us toll free at 877-755-4920, or by fax at 602-218-5975.

All invoices will be processed through our parent site Greatlookz.com.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_brid.description:
Wedding Bridesmaid Dresses

As a bridesmaid, it is your job to make the bride's wedding experience comfortable and relaxed. It is customary to give the bride a small gift before the ceremony, typically at the rehearsal dinner the night before or the morning of the big day. This may also be when the bride presents you with a gift as a thank you for being in the wedding.

On the wedding day, etiquette calls for a cool head and helpful manner. You should get ready promptly, so the bulk of the attention can be paid to the bride. As well, keep tissue on hand for any tears that may potentially ruin the bride's makeup. Finally, one of the bridesmaids should pack the bride's bag and have it safely stowed away so that she doesn't have to worry about her personal effects.

A bridesmaid's job is very important, as is looking good. GreatLookz.com offers a wide selection of affordable bridesmaid dresses for every body type and shape. We custom tailor each of these dresses, so once the order is placed, it is final.

Our stunning Strapless Mermaid Style Bridesmaid Dress is a great choice. Regardless of body type, this well-constructed dress is ideal for any bridesmaid and it comes in a plethora of colors and sizes. Our Flowing Shimmer Satin Dress is a stylish option that incorporates the halter neckline that is so "in" this year. It also features boning in the bodice to give excellent support in the torso and chest. These and most of our bridesmaid dresses take a full three weeks to ship, so be sure to call us at 877-755-4920 before placing your order to ensure timely delivery.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.handkerchief.description:
Handkerchiefs

Handkerchiefs may seem merely decorative to the modern woman, but throughout history, they've had plenty of uses. Handkerchiefs actually date back some 400 years to Venice, where they were first introduced at a garden party. From there they spread throughout Europe, where they were worn exclusively by the royal family and the upper class. Over time, the handkerchief became a staple of everyday fashion, and the designs have changed to meet the demands of modern society.

Today, we place handkerchiefs in the breast pocket of our finest blazers to add an air of refinement. Women use handkerchiefs to add a splash of color or to give their outfits a delicate, romantic feel. Handkerchiefs come in all shapes and sizes, as well as a variety of different fabrics and colors as well.

Common handkerchief usage dictates a plain white handkerchief for everyday use, and a fancy silk or linen handkerchief for special occasions. At Greatlookz.com, we provide you with a wide selection of unique handkerchiefs for every occasion. If you're looking for something delicate or romantic, our cotton handkerchiefs with floral designs are quite popular.

For a more fun and frivolous look, check out our handkerchief featuring a bouquet of red hats tied with a purple ribbon. An embroidered handkerchief with your initials is always a classic, and you can't go wrong with a sheer white handkerchief with embroidered flowers. Handkerchiefs also make great gifts for mothers, sisters and girlfriends. You may place orders online, or give us a call at 1-877-755-4920.

Just the Right Word!
Such is the goal of QOTD subscriber Bob Kelly, his monthly KellyGram, and his website at http://www.wordcrafters.info/

I'm pretty proud of the QOTD quotation collection, including over 22,500 quotes in the database and over 30 printed volumes of quotes, but Bob has over 400 printed volumes comprising some 1.5 million quotes! Bob does copyrighting, ghost writing, speech writing, editing, and newsletters, and if your company needs any of those service I highly recommend him.

No, this isn't a paid ad, but Bob does host his website here. His monthly newsletter is always enjoyable as well. Visit the Newsletters page and read his hints on publishing newsletters, then subscribe to his. http://www.wordcrafters.info/

.z.greatfoodz.kosher.description:
Looking for delicious unusual foods, delectable specialty foods, or mouth-watering gourmet foods? Youve come to the right place. Greatfoodz.com! Greatfoodz carries a delightful variety of gourmet kosher foods, including Kosher Honey, Certified Organic & Kosher Mayonnaise, Kosher Yellow Star Honey, Marco Polo Peach Preserves, and more!

You may have noticed a small K insignia on product packaging. The K emblem is the trademark sign of kosher certification. "Kosher" is a Hebrew word that denotes something as "fitting" or "permissible" for use. Kosher guidelines have an impact on modern production and manufacturing practices. Because they result in healthful foods, kosher methods can benefit everyone - not just those with a religious or spiritual motivation for a kosher diet! We are building up a wide selection of Certifed Kosher products, if there is something you are looking for please let us know, and we'll make every effort to find it for you!
