.z.greatquotez.about_us.page_title: Quotes, quotations, qwotes,  quotation research service, great quotes, proverbs, axioms, idioms
.z.greatquotez.about_us.description:
Quotations? We Have a Million and a Half of Them!

More than Even the Library of Congress!

The Library of Congress is the largest library in the world, with more than 130 million items on approximately 530 miles of bookshelves. The collections include more than 29 million books and other printed materials. Yet, when it comes to volumes of English-language quotations, it comes up well short of our collection.

Where do you go when you're looking for just the right quotation for that article you're writing? Or the speech you're planning? Or are you looking for lots of quotes on a specific topic, or by a specific individual? Whatever the case, chances are you'll begin with an Internet search. Enter the word "quotations" on one of the popular search engines, as we did recently, and you'll find nearly ten million sites listed! Our patented quotation research service takes all the leg work of our quotation research and finding the quote you need.

Ten million sites! Well, if you have lots of time on your hands and can check out about 300 sites a day every day you'll cover about one hundred thousand of them by this time next year, but you'll still have about 90 years to check them all out. The only trouble is that, by then, there'll probably be several million more sites to check and you'll be too old to care. Don't have quite that much time to spare? Then you can start with the top 10 websites or so. Of course, you'll find Bartlett's there, near the head of the list. The only problem is that it's the 10th Edition, published in 1919 and containing a mere 11,000 entries. In the 88 years since then, seven more editions have been published. The most recent (the 17th), was published in 2002 and has more than twice that many entries.

Another popular site, #7, has about 25,000 quotes, and boasts of being one of the oldest and largest on the Web. After checking many other quote sites, we have no reason to doubt that claim. Most of the ones we found are in the 15-20,000 range.

By way of comparison, we have what is surely one of the rarest and most extensive collections in existence. Our library includes 400 published volumes, containing nearly 1.5 million quotes, plus thousands of other quotes collected from a wide variety of sources. That's 60 times as many as that #7 site we mentioned.We also provide an incredible quotation research service to our library, custom suited to your needs.

But that's only part of the story. In the 25 years since we began our collection, we've added thousands of quotes from a wide range of source selections you simply won't be able to find anywhere else. And we keep adding to them just about every day!

Regardless of the topic or the author you're interested in, we can usually find what you need rather quickly.Quotation research can be tough at times. However, from our site, you will find an assortment of individuals quoted, from Charles Abbott to Ulrich Zwingli, which represent virtually all of recorded history. They include the wisdom of such ancient philosophers as Aristotle and Socrates, and such modern-day ones as Yogi Berra and Casey Stengel.

One client recently requested about 25 quotes on a specific topic, which we provided the same day. Another asked for a quote that could be used for a Ph.D. study group presentation. To give her a choice, we sent along a half-dozen quotes.

The next day she wrote: the first one is right along the lines we're looking for, and asked for a few others that might focus on learning, achievement, or mastering difficult challenges. To her delight, we again quickly provided exactly what she wanted.

Sounds pretty easy, doesn't it? You could probably find lots of applicable quotes on the Web, or at your local library. Maybe so except for one thing. The quotes she wanted had to be in Latin! (And we threw in the English translations at no extra cost.)

The oldest volume in our collection was published in 1874, which is one of more than a dozen we have from the 19th century. Ten others are at least 75 years old, and one or more was published almost every year from 1929 to the present day. Our books were produced by more than one hundred publishers all across the U.S., plus others in Australia, Canada, England and Scotland

Why Use Quotations?

In the Introduction to her book, The Last Word: A Treasury of Women's Quotations, (Prentice-Hall, 1992), public speaker and political leader Carolyn Warner offered several good reasons to use quotations, including this one: I have never found a better way to enhance the communications process,she wrote, than by reinforcing the points or concepts I wish to make with timely, memorable quotations.

Justin Kaplan, General Editor of Bartlett's Familiar Quotations (17th Edition), one of the most highly respected sources of quotations, put it this way:We speak a language that draws on quotations. They are telegraphic. A form of shorthand. We use them to lend point and luster to what we say. Quotations have always been supremely effective rhetorical devices, instruments of one-upmanship, ways of supporting any position under the sun with borrowed or stolen authority.

Written by Bob Kelly, Editor in Chief

We'd like to hear your opinions on how you feel about quotations. Send us your comments and we'll post them on our blog, QuotationsKing.com. If you are looking to have us do some quotation research for you, check out our Special Research Services.

.dressy_gloves.meta_keywords: prom gloves, opera gloves, lace gloves, cotton glove, satin glove, fishnet glove, sexy, fingerless, velvet
.dressy_gloves.description2:
Formal Gloves

Formal gloves have been a standard of well-dressed women for hundreds of years. In 1566, Queen Elizabeth I reportedly wore a pair of white gauntlet-style gloves that were 18 inches long, featuring elegant gold trim. During Napoleon's reign in the early 19th century, elbow length gloves became a fashion staple. Napoleon's first wife, Josephine, wore formal gloves just about everywhere she went, inspiring a trend that spread throughout Europe and over to America. Truth be told, Josephine wore gloves to hide her hands, which she considered unsightly.

When it comes to gloves, just about anything goes. If you like the sleek look and feel of long gloves, we have plenty of fabrics and colors to choose from. Our classic velvet opera length gloves can add warmth on a chilly night, or a sense of drama. Try to contrast the color of your gloves with your dress--if your dress is an A-line black satin ballgown, contrast it with elegant white gloves, for a look reminiscent of Audrey Hepburn in Roman Holiday. We also sell this style in dark brown, one of the hottest colors of the season.

To dress up a wedding gown, look for delicate fingerless and gauntlet-style gloves. Depending on the neckline and sleeve length of your dress, you can choose from wrist length, opera length or elbow length gloves. Selecting bridal gloves comes down to personal style and the overall mood or theme of the day. Is your wedding casual? Dainty lace fingerless gloves have a playful vibe, much more so than formal opera length gloves. This year, look for gloves with beading and lace trim.

If you're looking for a new twist on old favorites, we offer several different formal gloves that push the envelope. Show off your wild side with a pair of wrist-length satin fingerless gloves with a purple feather trim. Let them see your adventurous side with a pair of long black gloves with a red fringe or sequin trim. These are just some of the unique gloves you'll find when you shop online with us. Call 1-877-755-4920 to place an order!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_forma.meta_description: Plenty of etiquette books have been written on the subject of wedding attire.  Advice columnists dish out answers to questions including what to wear to an outdoor wedding, what to wear if you're the mother of the bride, what to wear during the different seasons of the year, when it's okay to wear black to a wedding, and more.  Interestingly, white wasn't always the "in" color for a wedding dress.  Brides in the 16th and 17th centuries favored pink, yellow, or blue; white dresses became the standard during the early 19th century, based on the fashions Princess Charlotte and Queen Victoria chose for their nuptials.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.bridal_forma.description:
Bridal Formal Wear

Plenty of etiquette books have been written on the subject of wedding attire. Advice columnists dish out answers to questions including what to wear to an outdoor wedding, what to wear if you're the mother of the bride, what to wear during the different seasons of the year, when it's okay to wear black to a wedding, and more. Interestingly, white wasn't always the "in" color for a wedding dress. Brides in the 16th and 17th centuries favored pink, yellow, or blue; white dresses became the standard during the early 19th century, based on the fashions Princess Charlotte and Queen Victoria chose for their nuptials.

Today, brides are free to wear whatever they like. Whether you're planning on dressing in traditional white or are looking to mix things up with splashes of color, Greatlookz.com is your online bridal headquarters for all your wedding needs. With plenty of fabrics and colors to choose from and a selection of dresses to meet any price range, we'll help you find a dress for the big day.

If you're attending a wedding rather than starring in one, you can still feel like a princess. Upstaging the bride is bad form, but you can indulge in romantic fabrics such as silk, satin, or velvet. There's no reason to spend hours on end going from store to store or from site to site, when all your wedding planning needs can be met in one easy location.

If you like looking at photos online but you prefer to order over the phone, we can help. With so many companies competing for your business online, shopping for wedding attire can begin to feel like an impersonal process. At Greatlookz.com, we pick up the phone when you call, and we walk you through the ordering process when you need help. Call us today at 1-877-755-4920!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.wedding_brid.description:
Wedding Bridal Veils

For brides, the wedding veil completes your fabulous wardrobe on your special day. During the origins of arranged marriages in the Eastern hemisphere, veils were used to shield the bride's face until the ceremony was finished. When the groom lifted the veil, it would be the first time he'd set eyes on his bride.

Even now, traditions are still similar in that the bride is "revealed" to her husband once she gets to the altar (at least for the first time that day), so the veil still holds some ceremonial value. It also adds elegance and grace to your gown--it's a simple touch with regal quality. Choosing the right veil for your day requires taking into account your own personal style and the style of your wedding dress.

At GreatLookz.com, we carry a wide selection of hard to find wedding bridal veils and accessories. We have veils with faux pearls inset in the tulle, we have veils with satin edge hems, we have wedding hats, we have fun bachelorette veils, and much more. In addition to veils, we also carry hats, tiaras, and combinations of both. So how do you choose what's right for you?

This year, wedding fashion experts agree that classic elegance is in, but so is individual style. You should always go for one piece that expresses your personality, and your veil is a great place to do this. If you're a little country, add a cowboy hat instead of a veil. If you want to be a princess, one of our multi-layered tulle bridal veils is perfect for your magical day. Either way, it's all about you! Call us for more information at 877-755-4920.

To purcahe wedding bridal veils just click on the greatlookz logo shown below: Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.beautiful_pr.description:
Beautiful Prom Dresses

All the magic of prom night is encapsulated in a girl's prom dress. The glamour, the excitement, the romance. . .everything you've dreamed of comes together when you find that perfect dress. You can create a romantic fantasy with silk or chiffon, or go sleek with matte jersey or satin. Dream up a look that's worthy of a princess, an heiress, or a Hollywood A-lister.

Greatlookz.com is always one step ahead of the latest fashion trends. While retail stores carry a limited number of prom dresses, we have all the latest styles in the sizes you need. You'll find more variety and ways to express yourself with the wide range of styles available here at Greatlookz.com.

This year, the sky's the limit when it comes to dressing for the prom. If you're looking for a romantic night fit for a fairy tale, choose a flowing dress with a ruffled skirt or neckline. Couturiers such as Alberta Ferretti and Prada have embraced this romantic look wholeheartedly; layers of chiffon or crepe-back satin look lovely with softly curling hair and floral-themed jewelry.

One of the latest trends is celebrity-inspired gowns. Straight from the red carpet to the prom, these gowns are sure to make you feel like a superstar at your prom. Modeled after designs worn by J-Lo, Jessica Simpson, Renee Zellweger, and more, celebrity-inspired gowns let you showcase high style at affordable prices. Finding a dress to fit your personal style is the key to creating lasting memories. Order your dress online, or call us directly at 1-877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.cocktail_nap.meta_description: Nothing brings people together like a good old-fashioned cocktail party.  The great thing about cocktail parties is you don't need a reason to throw one.  Perhaps it's Friday and you want to catch up on old times, or you just moved into a new apartment in Manhattan, or you're celebrating a promotion at work. . .you could host a cocktail party for no reason other than you and your friends want to get together to wear extravagant red hats.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.cocktail_nap.page_title: Cocktail Napkins and linen cocktail napkins
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.cocktail_nap.description:
Cocktail Napkins

Nothing brings people together like a good old-fashioned cocktail party. The great thing about cocktail parties is you don't need a reason to throw one. Perhaps it's Friday and you want to catch up on old times, or you just moved into a new apartment in Manhattan, or you're celebrating a promotion at work. . .you could host a cocktail party for no reason other than you and your friends want to get together to wear extravagant red hats.

When it comes to throwing a cocktail party, it's important to remember the basic rules of etiquette. If you want to impress your friends, always pick up food and hold your drink with your left hand. This frees up your right hand for shaking hands when you meet people. Anything passed on a tray may be picked up with your napkin. Red wine is to be held by the bowl, while white wine is to be held by the stem.

If you're throwing a cocktail party, plan on the event lasting for two to three hours. You always want to have plenty of beverages on hand, and you always want to make sure to provide your guests with plenty of cocktail napkins. As a rule, it's a good idea to select napkins that match your theme or the formality of your event. For example, if you're throwing a garden party with cocktails, fine linen cocktail napkins are ideal.

At Greatlookz.com, we offer a wide selection of linen cocktail napkins to choose from. Our deluxe linen cocktail napkins in white are quite popular. With a classic design and elegant embroidered details, these napkins create a subtly elegant mood that is compatible with a wide range of themes. If you're throwing a Red Hat Society event, set out our darling red hat linen cocktail napkin. These linen napkins feature a signature bouquet of red hats with purple accents. To order these and other cocktail napkins, call us today at 1-877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.black_top_ha.meta_description: A top hat is the ultimate symbol of sophistication for men.  From Britain's Prince Albert in Victorian London to Fred Astaire in New York ballrooms of the 1930s, the top hat is one accessory you can't forget when you're dressing to impress.  To wear your top hat properly, tilt it forward and about 10 degrees to one side.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.black_top_ha.description:
Black Top Hats

A top hat is the ultimate symbol of sophistication for men. From Britain's Prince Albert in Victorian London to Fred Astaire in New York ballrooms of the 1930s, the top hat is one accessory you can't forget when you're dressing to impress. To wear your top hat properly, tilt it forward and about 10 degrees to one side.

If you're attending a black tie affair and you want to leave a lasting impression on friends and business colleagues, a black top hat is the perfect accessory. There's just something about a top hat that evokes the memory of a glamorous era of fancy ladies and fine gentlemen. The top hat is such a classic look, you never have to worry about being overdressed when you show up at a formal event with one on your head.

If you're looking for a top hat for a special event or a special occasion, we have an exquisite collection of felt hats to choose from. Who says you can't stick a feather in your hat? Not us. Our traditional black top hat is made of heavy wool felt, and it features a gorgeous quail feather for a classic look. Don't forget--traditional etiquette tells us that adornments to the hat band must be on the left side for men.

If you want to reach new heights, try Greatlookz.com's classic black felt top hat. Our Victorian Prince Charles wool felt top hat is a best seller, featuring a black grosgrain band and trim for an added touch of elegance. No matter the event, our top hats help you make the best-dressed list every time. Check out our hats online, or call us at 1-877-755-4920 to order today.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.waist_cinche.description:
Waist Cinchers

Similar to corsets, waist cinchers are undergarments used to create the illusion of a narrow midsection through the exaggeration of the hips and bust. The only difference between a waist cincher and a corset is that a cincher is only worn around the waist, and has no brassiere component to it.

At GreatLookz.com, we sell both modern lingerie waist cinchers and Victorian era waist cinchers that are more costume pieces than anything. Both can be worn effectively under most garments and can also be worn on the outside of a shirt like so many of the fashion designers are doing right now. Paired with a tank top or a crisp white shirt, these waist cinchers make just as popular outer garments as they do undergarments!

Our Satin Jacquard waist cincher comes in black and purple as well as varying sizes. The smooth look and feel of this item is more than enough to make you comfortable and supported while you're wearing it. It has a lace-up front with a hook and eye closure in the back for secure and adjustable wear.

We also have a more Victorian-esque waist cincher in the Handmade White Waist Cincher. This handcrafted classic is covered in white embroidered lace over white cotton, giving it a genuine historical feel. This piece is one size fits all, and adjusts to fit your body type with a unique fastening system. For more details, please call us today at 877-755-4920. We love to hear from our customers and can help you with any questions about sizing, pricing, and shipping.

To buy waist cinchers click on the greatlookz logo shown below: Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.dressy_gloves.slave_bracelets.meta_description: Your source for pretty slave bracelets.
.dressy_gloves.slave_bracelets.description2:
Slave Bracelets

Slave bracelets are hip pieces of jewelry that can be worn by women of any age. Originally, these bracelets were used in the Far East hundreds of years ago. They were made of gold, silver, and non-precious metals as well. As with many societies, the material used demarcated the woman's status and family wealth.

These bracelets could be very plain or highly decorated with jewels, patterns, and inscriptions. Today, slave bracelets offer a similar amount of variety and uniqueness. Made like a typical bracelet, they also feature a chain of string or metal that lays across the top of the hand and slips onto the middle finger through a ring attachment.

We feature several designs at GreatLookz.com, including gold and silver accented slave bracelets, as well as crystal reproductions. Our Crystal Floral Design slave bracelet glove in pink crystal is made with a cascading design that is worn at the wrist and extends to the middle finger, where it attaches with an adjustable ring.

If you purchase two of these bracelets, they can easily be worn as modern pair of gloves. In gold and silver, the same bracelet is available for a clean and sparkly look as well. Our Rhinestone Link Glove is another captivating slave bracelet. It features adjustable sizing and can fit virtually any hand and wrist.

Slave bracelets are very intricate and beautiful without being overbearing. You can wear them in everyday settings or for a night out on the town. For more information, feel free to give us a call today at 877-755-4920.
.dressy_gloves.slave_bracelets.description: Slave bracelets are a great accessory.  They do not come in pairs so if you need a pair be sure to buy two!

Our parasols are great for plays or performances, church groups or school groups, opera houses, drama groups, theatres, weddings, prom, christenings, baptisms, funerals, tea parties and even Halloween.

Parasols arenât just for decoration though; they also have a practical purpose. All of our parasols are great for keeping the sun off of you and some are also designed to keep you dry during rainstorms. It is the wonderful union of form and fashion.

We pride ourselves on our customer service. When you call us looking for a parasol, we go out of our way to make you feel welcome, from answering the phone in proper English to helping you picking out the parasol umbrella that will fit your needs.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.silk_shawls.description:
Silk Shawls

Silk scarves and shawls are outer garments worn primarily by women and mainly used as accessories. So what's the difference between a scarf and a shawl? Well, basically, the size is the main difference. Scarves are generally smaller, with the typical square scarf measuring 20 inches in diameter. A shawl can be much larger, anywhere from 36 inches to 76 inches or more.

Silk shawls are luxurious and highly sought after by women all over the world. Some of the most elegant are made in Turkey, where embellishment and unique fabrics are infused with native traditions in shawl making. They can be made of 100 percent silk or cotton-silk blends that are washable and durable over time.

At GreatLookz.com, we can help you create this classy look for much less than you might think. We stock dozens and dozens of silk shawls and guarantee your satisfaction with every item we sell. We've got silk shawls from all over the world, including China, Turkey, and other countries. Our gorgeous Floral Chinese Fringe Shawl is featured in a red and blue floral pattern. Made of 100 percent imported Chinese silk, this shawl is truly breathtaking. It features a satin sheen finish and long fringe that sways beautifully.

Shawls, because of their size, are made to keep you warm, but to also embellish the look of your wardrobe with their delicate designs and materials. Our ornate Turkish Floral Design silk shawl accomplishes this with ease. Made of shades of pink, gold, turquoise, ivory, fuchsia, purples, and other colors, these shawls are as unique as they are stunning. You can shop online today or place your order by phone at 877-755-4920.

To purchase silk shawls just click on the greatlookz logo shown below. Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.white_cotton.description:
White Cotton Gloves

When you played dress up as a little girl, the pink frilly dress and matching shoes were all you could think about. To finish off the outfit, a cute pair of white cotton gloves was the "piece de resistance." Do you ever wish you still had a pair? Well, you don't have to fantasize anymore as an adult, because we're happy to offer these precious gloves at GreatLookz.com.

Gloves for spring and summer are actually popular this year. As an homage to 1950s and 1960s semi-formal attire, white cotton gloves can be worn with a retro-style overcoat or suit with skirt today. We offer white cotton gloves with decorative pleats, ones with snap closures, and ones in longer lengths for different types of wear.

A pair of white cotton wrist-length (one-button) gloves is the simplest way to dress up a jacket or vintage outfit. For an inventive look, try pairing them with a modern outfit such as a three-quarter length fitted jacket and boot-cut jeans and heels. This throwback kind of style will look classy yet trendy on any body type and is an easy and effective way to stand out in the crowd.

When you're ready to order, simply add items to your cart online and check out using our secure server. Or, just give us a call and tell us what you'd like at 877-755-4920. We can ship your order right away and have white cotton gloves to your doorstep quickly.

.apparel.tea_length_dresses.description2:
Tea Length Bridesmaid Dresses

The length of bridesmaid dresses often depends on the time and/or month of the wedding. For an afternoon or summer outdoor wedding, tea length bridesmaid dresses are often the choice of many. When you're outside in the afternoon in July, you definitely don't want your attendants to be in floor-length, black gowns baking in the sun.

Tea length is a measurement that falls just below the knee at mid-calf. It is short enough to keep you cool during a hot summer outdoor wedding, but formal enough to look timeless and classy. Styles differ, but can include A-line tea length dresses, straight sheath dresses, and flouncy and fun tea length bridesmaid dresses with tons of flair.

At GreatLookz.com, we offer all these styles. Our bridesmaid dresses come in a variety of colors and materials. Colors include cherry reds, white, ivory, light blue, burgundy, black, and many more. The supple fabrics used for these dresses include the scrumptious L'Amour satin and others. We carry tea length dresses for bridesmaids in sizes up to 28 and offer matching shawls with many of them for a small additional charge.

Whatever your style, you are sure to find tea length bridesmaid dresses that fit your wedding at GreatLookz.com. We specialize in offering a plethora of wedding and bridesmaid dresses so that we can be your one-stop shop. Each gown is made especially to the measurements you supply and will be as unique as you and your bridal party. Call us today at 877-755-4920 for more details.

.ztips.wedding_tips.description:
Wedding Tips

The key to a beautiful bride is in her accessories. When you're looking for a dress, you'll always gravitate towards the one that reflects your personal style and body type (within your budget, of course!). You should also do this with your accessories. However, many brides don't give enough consideration to their accessories before marching down the aisle, so we're here to help!

At GreatLookz.com, we specialize in offering hard to find apparel and accessories for brides and their bridesmaids. We have tiaras, veils, wedding hats, hosiery, and more. Choosing the right items depends on your gown, and the look of your wedding. Is it formal? Will you be outdoors? All this and more should be taken into consideration when planning your personal accents.

Wedding etiquette rules in general call for the bride to be simple and classic, although your own style is important as well. For example, a garden wedding outside in the afternoon calls for small, non-detracting jewelry and perhaps a hat or parasol. A formal black-tie wedding in the evening, though, most likely would demand finer jewelry, and more accessories (such as gloves) would be appropriate.

Here's a suggestion that many experts agree upon: for simple ceremonies, stick with diamond stud earrings and maybe a pearl choker. For more elaborate weddings, it's perfectly acceptable to have the long veil, the crystal tiara, and the opera-length satin gloves. In either type of wedding, it is rarely acceptable to carry a handbag, so keep that one in the dressing room. For more wedding tips, give us a call at 877-755-4920 or browse our entire collection of wedding accessories.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.shawl_wraps.description:
Shawl Wraps

This year is all about mixing patterns. Solid silks with patterned shoes or accessories are what all the designers are previewing for this year's fashions. There's no better way to do this than to match your semi-formal or formal dress with a shawl wrap.

At GreatLookz.com, we sell matching shawls for many of our gowns in the same fabric and color as the dresses we carry. We also feature a la carte shawls that come in a variety of colors, designs, and fabrics. When paired with a simple black or red dress, these shawls make an ordinary outfit stunning.

They can be worn in a number of ways, and should be draped according to your body type. If you have a large chest or you're self-conscious about your arms, it's best to wrap the shawl around your shoulders and tie it in the front. Or, you can rest it on the napes of your elbows and pull it up to the bustline, wrapping the excess fabric around your forearms for security.

If your bottom half is your "trouble area," then you might want to wrap the shawl around your hips or stomach. Draped diagonally across either area and tied on the side will hide any figure flaws easily and gracefully. Unless you're ultra-daring, avoid tying a bow in the front or back of your dress or anywhere but on the side. Bows attract attention, so make sure to keep them in places you want to get noticed. For questions on these scarves or our other products, call us anytime during business hours at 877-755-4920.

To purchase shawl wraps just click on the greatlookz logo shown below: Your premier online fashion accessory store for women who love to accessorize.

.fancylinens.placemats___tablecloths.meta_keywords: lace aprons, lace handkerchiefs, placemats, tablecloths, lace collars,
.fancylinens.placemats___tablecloths.meta_description: Your source for fancy linens, lace aprons, lace collars, lace tablecloths, placemats and more.
.fancylinens.placemats___tablecloths.description2:
Table Placemats

Home decor is not something that is static with trends in fashion. On the contrary, table linens and placemats change regularly with the industry and have to adapt to what's current in home decor markets. Currently, casually elegant items are really in, as well as heavier, classic Battenburg lace pieces.

Battenburg lace, part of the "shabby chic" trend, is popular for table placemats and tablecloths. Also known as Renaissance lace, Battenburg lace is formed by securing loops of woven tapes together with yarn brides. It was a all the rage during the early 1900s in the United States, and is just now experiencing resurgence in tableware and bridal gowns as well.

GreatLookz.com is your one-stop shop for all things home decor and fashionable. Our collection of table placemats offers you choices in your home decorating scheme that other sites just can't offer. We specialize in hard to find items for our customers, including our gorgeous Battenburg Lace Applique Placemats in Spring Colors. These placemats are bright and colorful, with shades of blue, pink, and green leaping out from under your plate. They feature a cut-out design that is unique to this placemat in our collection.

We also offer our deliciously graceful Lace & Sheer polyester placemats. These placemats are lovely and yet functional. They are made with solid white lace and semi sheer polyester for a delicate look with a sturdy feel. All of our table placemats are 14 inches by 20 inches, large enough to accommodate even the biggest plates. Call us at 877-755-4920 to find out more about our table placemats and home decor items.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.fine_table_l.meta_description: Your source for fine table linens
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.fine_table_l.description:
Fine Table Linens

From marriage proposals to meetings between world leaders, the dinner table is where life's important moments happen. Table linens, however, have changed. In Greek and Roman times, table napkins were the size of bath towels. Since food was eaten with the hands, large napkins were needed to keep the hands clean between each elaborate course.

Today, table linens do more than keep your table tidy and presentable; they also say a great deal about your abilities as a hostess. Many hostesses select tablecloths and napkins that follow a certain theme or tone. If you're having trouble choosing table linens, selecting a theme or choosing a color scheme may help you narrow down your options.

Greatlookz.com offers an excellent selection of fine table linens, and we deliver them right to your home. Whether you're looking for something bold and bright or classic and elegant, let us help you dress up your next big event. We have two ways to order--online, or by phone at 1-877-755-4920.

For a time-honored look, choose the Battenburg lace solid white hand-embroidered set. This square tablecloth features exquisite embroidering and attention to detail, and comes with six matching napkins. If you're looking for something to impress your friends, our floral embroidered napkins and tablecloths are gorgeous and unique. Other standout options include our 36-inch square floral lace and applique tablecloth in white, or our floral embroidered tablecloth and napkin set.

At USA Mortgage Corp., our main goal is to work directly with our clients to identify the loan program that will meet their business goals and objectives and then create a competitive environment where lenders compete for the loan.

Here are a few of our most popular commercial loans:

  • 90% LTC Multifamily Development, Hotels, Shopping Centers - 30 year amortization
  • 85% LTV Multifamily Acquisition and Refinance Loans - 30 year amortization.

Why Work with USA Mortgage Corporation versus a Bank?

Our rates and terms are more aggressive than you will find at most major lending institutions. In an ever changing environment that we face today, relationships that you may have had with your lending institution in the past, have certainly changed, along with their guidelines.

Like you, we understand the challenges and hurdles associated with securing financing for your commercial projects. The low LTV's, excessive documentation, acronyms that don't make any sense and underwriting guidelines that are completely different than they were in the past.

We also understand that each project is unique and most don't fall within the general lending guidelines. Business owners and investors frequently need financing resources that are innovative and tailored to their individual projects. That's where we can help you.

GREATPAR/homepage.description:
Victorian parasols were derived from their Chinese counterparts in the middle of the 17th century in France and England. The original idea of the parasol was invented during the Wei Dynasty of Ancient China, though, more than 2,400 years ago. The western version was eventually called an umbrella by most people, but the term "parasol" today refers to the Victorian or Asian version of the umbrella, which is traditionally more feminine and more ornate.

At GreatParasolz.com, we sell a wide variety of parasols from different cultures and time periods. We have replica Victorian parasols as well as Chinese and Japanese reproductions. Each is crafted with high-quality materials and are best used to shield skin from the rays of the sun, not the rain or wind due to their delicate lace or paper construction.

Our parasols come in a number of sizes. Our beautiful White Floral Lace Parasol comes in small (13 inches across), medium (20 inches across), and large (33 inches across). They are great for parties and feature nylon construction for surprising durability and convenient weatherproofing.

Our number one goal is to provide you with great customer service and items you just won't find anywhere else. We offer parasols of every shape, color, and design, and can help you choose the one that is right for your needs. Whether it is for a costume, a wedding, an event, or just to have, our friendly fashion order representatives can help you pick out perfect Victorian parasols at 877-755-4920.

Babies:

Babies are bits of stardust blown from the hand of God. Lucky the woman who knows the pangs of birth, for she has held a star. -Larry Barratto

The first handshake in life is the greatest of all: the clasp of an infant fist around a parent's finger. -Mark Beltaire

A baby is born with a need to be loved and never outgrows it. -Frank A. Clark

Babies are such a nice way to start people. -Don Herold

A child is helpless in inverse ratio to his age. He is at the zenith of his powers while he is an infant in arms. What on earth is more powerful than a very young baby? -Aline Kilmer

Baby: a tight little bundle of wailing and flannel. -Frederick Locker-Lampson

Of all the joys that brighten suffering earth, What joy is welcomed like a new-born child! -Caroline Norton

A baby is God's opinion that life should go on...Never will a time come when the most marvelous recent invention is as marvelous as a newborn baby. -Carl Sandburg


Compassion:

Even if you can't prevent another's sorrow, caring will lessen it. -Frank A. Clark

To ease another's heartache is to forget ones's own.-Abraham Lincoln

Pity weeps and runs away; Compassion comes to help and stay. -Janet Curtis O'Leary

Compassion is almost never practical. -Kathleen Parker

What value has compassion that does not take its object in its arms? -Antoine de Saint-Exry

There never was any heart truly great and gracious that was not also tender and compassionate.-Robert South


Empathy:

Empathy your pain in my heart.- Jess Lair

Empathy feels these thoughts: your hurt is in my heart, your loss is in my prayers, your sorrow is in my soul, and your tears are in my eyes.-William Arthur Ward

Where is home? Home is where the heart can laugh without shyness. Home is where the heart's tears can dry at their own pace.-Vernon G. Baker

Home is an invention on which no one has yet improved.-Ann Douglas

A house is no home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.-Margaret Fuller

Home is the wallpaper above the bed, the family dinner table, the church bells in the morning, the bruised shins of the playground, the small fears that come with dusk, the streets and squares and monuments and shops that constitute one's first universe.-Henry Anatole Grunwald

.fancylinens.handkerchief.description2:
Wedding Handkerchief

Every bride tries to avoid crying on her wedding day, but few usually can fight the urge. The day is so special and beautiful that emotion often overwhelms even the best of us. A great thing to have on hand on your big day is a wedding handkerchief. You don't want to get caught with a raggedy piece of tissue balled up in your hand, smearing your makeup, after all. A handkerchief allows you to still maintain some composure and to look elegant the entire time.

Our wedding handkerchiefs at GreatLookz.com are made for brides of all ages and styles. Customarily, a handkerchief is a bridal shower gift given by an older female relative, such as an aunt, a mother, or a grandmother. The color should be light, ivory or white, and it should be made of a sturdy cotton or linen material.

As well, a nice touch is to personalize the handkerchief with the bride's new initials as the first symbol of her new name and marriage. These items can also make a great gift for the parents of the bride, as well as other special guests who are bound to shed a tear or two at the ceremony. We sell handkerchiefs made of sheer white cotton that feature hand rolled edges, ones that are embroidered with first initial only, and even ones that are embroidered with flowers and other ornamentations.

We specialize in offering a large selection of these and other hard to find items at GreatLookz.com. Shop online with us or give us a call directly at 877-755-4920 to find out what makes us so special. We are truly your one-stop wedding accessories shop.
.fancylinens.handkerchief.page_title: Lace handkerchief, wedding handkerchief, mother of the bride lace handkerchief

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_fo.meta_description: Fashion trends change all the time, but the current forecasts for plus size formal wear highlight timeless classics that can make any woman's wardrobe stunning every season. Experts in the industry are favoring V-neck halters, with deep chocolate, red, cobalt blue, and standard black as the colors of choice for larger women. Of course, the event you are attending should make a difference in your selection. Basic black is better for a formal evening wedding, while red or blue might be fun for a fancy afternoon gathering.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.plus_size_fo.description:
Plus Size Formal Wear

Fashion trends change all the time, but the current forecasts for plus size formal wear highlight timeless classics that can make any woman's wardrobe stunning every season. Experts in the industry are favoring V-neck halters, with deep chocolate, red, cobalt blue, and standard black as the colors of choice for larger women. Of course, the event you are attending should make a difference in your selection. Basic black is better for a formal evening wedding, while red or blue might be fun for a fancy afternoon gathering.

When you're looking for a plus size formal dress, it is important to keep your body shape in mind as well as fashion trends. If you have a large bottom, you might avoid light colors below the waist, as they tend to accentuate the backside. Instead, go for dark, rich colors on the bottom portion of your body. Also, make sure you're wearing the correct size. Even one size too small can make you look larger than you are.

Choose patterns only in moderation and make sure to complement your best features. If you have a large mid-section, try a formal dress with a shawl to wear elegantly in the nape of your elbows around your back and draped across your stomach. Not only does this camouflage a belly, but it also adds glorious drama to your ensemble.

At GreatLookz.com, we want you to look your best. Your satisfaction is guaranteed with every purchase or your money back. We're always around to answer your questions personally, so give us a call toll-free at 877-755-4920. We look forward to helping you with your order!

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.linen_cockta.meta_description: Your source for linen cocktail napkins.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.linen_cockta.description:
Linen Cocktail Napkins

Throwing a cocktail party is a great way to network with business associates, and it's also a fun way to bring friends together. If you want to avoid the cocktail party/dinner party confusion, etiquette experts recommend you end your party by 5 p.m. or start your party after 7 p.m. The typical cocktail party lasts two hours.

If you're hosting a larger cocktail party, you may be wondering whether it's appropriate to use plastic cups instead of glasses. There's no hard and fast rule, but the tinkling of ice in the glass is worth the extra effort if you want to create an air of sophistication and class for your party. Many hosts rent cocktail glasses for larger parties. You can rent them for as little as 25 cents per glass, if you shop around.

When it comes to the menu, it's a good idea to avoid serving anything that requires a fork to eat it. This helps to cut back on costs, and also helps reduce clean-up times. Finger foods that can be eaten in two bites are ideal. Get creative with your finger food, and incorporate healthy options like grilled meats and vegetables when possible.

Cocktail napkins are required when you're serving finger food. They'll also protect your furniture from stains and scratches, as guests set down drinks or plates. Cocktail napkins also help to keep hands warm and dry when drinking cold cocktails. At Greatlookz.com, we offer fine linen cocktail napkins with tatting lace trim. To order or ask questions, give us a call at 1-877-755-4920.

.ztips.prom_tips.meta_description: Prom is a momentous occasion in any young woman's life. It is a magical night that is sure to be memorable and fun. Can I take off my uncomfortable shoes at any point?
.ztips.prom_tips.description:
Prom Tips

Prom is a momentous occasion in any young woman's life. It is a magical night that is sure to be memorable and fun. However, it can also be a nerve-wracking night for many who are anxious about their manners and etiquette. Which fork do I use? When do I wear my gloves? Can I take off my uncomfortable shoes at any point?

Let's start with the meal. When eating at a nice restaurant, don't worry about all the silverware, just work from the outside in. Your first fork is for your salad, the next for your entree, and so on. The soup spoon is the largest one and the water glass is always placed to your right, so don't grab your neighbor's water and start chugging away!

Gloves are beautiful and elegant, so keep them that way. Remove them for meals and wear them for pictures and formal dancing. It is never okay to remove your shoes until you are home from the evening, so shop for a pair that will keep your mind on what a good time you're having, not your aching feet.

At GreatLookz.com, we offer a wide variety of dresses and accessories for the perfect night at the prom. In addition to stunning gowns, we have tiaras, beaded purses, shawls, and much more. In short, we've got everything you could possibly need to complete your perfect prom look! Shop online or give us a call free at 877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.lace_dollies.meta_keywords: How To Wear A Scarf,Lace Doilies,Lace Fans
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.lace_dollies.meta_description: Long before lace and crochet knit fabrics were all the rage on runways around the world, people were collecting doilies for practical use in and around the home.  Today, doilies are not only beautiful decorative items, they're also useful for protecting furniture. Place one of these fancy lace mats under lamps, vases and even drinking glasses, and you protect your wood furniture from being damaged due to water, wear and tear, and nicks and scratches.
.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.lace_dollies.description:
Lace Doilies

Long before lace and crochet knit fabrics were all the rage on runways around the world, people were collecting doilies for practical use in and around the home. Today, doilies are not only beautiful decorative items, they're also useful for protecting furniture. Place one of these fancy lace mats under lamps, vases and even drinking glasses, and you protect your wood furniture from being damaged due to water, wear and tear, and nicks and scratches.

In addition to protecting your furniture, doilies look great when placed in strategic locations around the home. Many men and women frame antique doilies and modern collectible doilies as well. Placing beautiful lace doilies in display cases or shadowbox frames is a great way to preserve the beauty of these fine linens over time. It's also a great way to show off your collection when people come to visit your home.

Doilies make great gifts for bridal showers and for housewarming parties. If you're hosting a fancy tea party, you simply must decorate with pretty lace doilies. If you want to highlight a special lamp or centerpiece, placing doilies underneath is a great way to draw attention to it.

At Greatlookz.com, our most popular doilies are handmade. They feature tatting, lace and intricate designs you won't find anywhere else. Check out our selection online, or call us at 1-877-755-4920 for more decorating ideas.

.z.finale_gloves.zzzabout_us.description:
The Finale Glove Company has been in business since 1954. The original owner ran the company for 52 years. He sold it to the current owner who had been a customer for a very long time. The Finale Glove Company is the world's leading supplier of FORMAL and BRIDAL gloves. The company provides elegant COTTON, SILK, SATIN and VELVET styles to the finest bridal stores in the USA and many overseas countries. High-end department stores including Neiman Marcus, Nordstroms and Barneys as well as designer bridal boutiques such as Vera Wang and Jessica McClintock carry their most beautiful and saleable gloves.

Quality is a top priority at the Finale Glove Company and your assurance is guaranteed in so much as the finest stores buy from Finale and come back season upon season for reorders. Our production is tightly controlled and no better glove quality exists for our product categories. The majority of our fabric gloves are manufactured in our Philippines factory which is known for their impeccable sewing and outstanding workmanship. Our superior leather factory in Italy specializes in "white leather" which is an art in itself!

A Glove Primer

When you purchase a pair of gloves, it is worthwhile to invest in a good, quality pair. Special occasion gloves should look as fabulous as the outfit they are accessorizing! Gloves are the perfect, and most often worn evening accessory. The color choice is up to you, although sophisticated black and elegant white are classics which coordinate well with everything. Four-button (midarm) lengths to over-the-elbow lengths are appropriate for evening wear. Such gloves are an integral part of an outfit therefore it is not necessary to remove them during the evening with the exception of the dinner table. For night-time drama, wear long gloves with bracelets (never rings) over them. Wrist length gloves are appropriate for evening in accordance to the specific outfit being worn. Classics and embellished styles are popular - some wearers like to add trims or treatments to a classic which match their particular dress.

Bridal gloves add the finishing touch to a wedding ensemble. Brides should choose a style and color that closely matches their wedding gown. Wrist-length gloves are always perfect - when in doubt they are a good choice and look perfect, regardless of the length of your sleeve.

During the ring exchange portion of the ceremony, lined gloves can easily be removed at the altar and held by the maid of honor until the time of the recessional, when she will help you replace them. Another option is top split the ring finger seam so that the wedding band can be slipped on without removing the entire glove. Brides should plan on wearing their gloves during the receiving line, but gloves are removed before eating.

.ztips.wedding_attire_ettiquette.description:
Wedding Attire Etiquette

We're all quite familiar with the tradition of brides wearing white, but did you know the tradition gained in popularity thanks to the rebellious action of Queen Victoria? According to tradition, members of the royal family wore silver wedding dresses. Queen Victoria preferred the symbolism of a white dress, and when she wore white at her wedding her loyal subjects followed suit.

During Victorian times, brides took considered it good luck to heed the following dress code: something old, something new, something borrowed, something blue, and a silver sixpence in your shoe. The "old" was typically the garter of a happily married woman, which was thought to bring good fortune. The "borrowed" item usually came from the bride's family, and the "blue" was a blue ribbon worn in the bride's hair to symbolize fidelity. Brides placed a sixpence in their shoes to ensure wealth.

These traditions are fun to follow, but there are no hard and fast rules for your wedding day attire. For example, the latest wedding trends call for more color, and outrageous accessories like shrugs lined with fur and faux fur.

At Greatlookz.com, we help you find all the wedding attire you need to pull off your look. Whether you're going for traditional white or you're looking for something a bit snazzier, we've got you covered. We stock a wide selection of bridesmaids' dresses and we even carry a complete line of wedding accessories. Check out the selection online, or give us a call today at 1-877-755-4920.

.zmarion_s_fashion_articles.party_gloves.description:
Party Gloves

You're headed out for a night on the town, but your outfit is missing something. You're not sure what it is until you watch an advertisement featuring a woman in a formal gown and a glorious pair of long black gloves. You don't have to wait for another big event to invest in a pair of party gloves. They're always great to have on hand, and they're always in style.

At Greatlookz.com, we know fashion trends come and go, and that's why we offer a selection of party gloves that fall into that special category of fashion staple. Put on a pair of long, shimmering black gloves and you can wear them to the opera one night, and a black tie fundraiser the next. Select a fancy pair of white lace tea party gloves, and you've got the perfect accessory for just about any outdoor event.

If you're looking for something a bit more outrageous, select a pair of silver or gold metallic party gloves. Wear these and you may actually be able to count the number of people who don't notice them. If you're looking for a little '80s nostalgia, pick up a pair of lace fingerless party gloves.

We also offer a wide selection of elegant gloves to wear on your wedding day. Our fingerless gloves and gauntlet-style gloves are perfect for wearing throughout the ceremony, and they give your wedding day a timeless and romantic beauty. You can even dress up the bridesmaids' gowns with elbow-length dress gloves in a variety of different colors. Check out the selection online, or give us a call at 1-877-755-4920.
